GSP28dhebta_u:268: tataś ca prakaraṇe pravṛttir arthinām iti prakaraṇasya prayojanaviśeṣaṃ pratyupāyatvasaṃśayaṃ pravṛttyaṅgakartum ādivākyam uktam iti mataṃ paścātdharmottarādināpy arthāt darśitaṃ yeṣām, tān kaṭākṣayann āha -- prayojane[2.17]tyādi |
GSP28dhebta_u:270: tasya tasmin vā upāyas tadbhāvastattā saiva[3]viṣayo yasya sa tathā |
GSP28dhebta_u:272: [3] asmābhiḥ "tadupāyatāviṣaye" iti pāṭhaḥ kalpayitvā mudritaḥ kintu ālokam āśritya "tadupāyatāviṣayaḥ" iti pāṭhaḥ kalpanīyaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:273: {p. 241} kasya tadupāyatety ekadeśākāṅkṣāyāṃ tu prakaraṇasya [2.17] iti śrutatvād draṣtavyam
GSP28dhebta_u:275: ata eva "janiḥ kartuḥ prakṛtiḥ" [Pā. 1.3.23] ity anena labdhāpādānasaṃjñakāt pūrvaṃ pañcamī
GSP28dhebta_u:284: [4] atrālokasammataḥ ṭīkāpāṭhaḥ "bījābījāvadhṛtaye" na tu yathā mudrite labhyate "bījādyavadhṛtaye" iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:288: asati vacane kathaṃ sambhava ity āha -- tatsādhake[1.20]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:291: "anumānavyutpattiḥ prayojanam asya" ity^4anabhidhāne viśiṣṭaṃ prayojanaṃ prati prakaraṇasyopāyatvaṃ katham iha sandigdhe vidagdha ity āśaṅkyāha --
GSP28dhebta_u:295: ayam atrabhaṭṭārcaṭasyābhiprāyaḥ -- yadvyutpattya yo 'rthīśrutatadupāyagranthasambhavaśca sa kasyacid granthasya darśanāt tasya cārthitva^5viṣayopāyabhāvaṃ prati sādhakabādhakapramāṇāpratisaṃvedī tathāvidhavacanam antareṇāpi arthitvamātracodito 'rthitvaviṣayopāyabhāvaṃ
GSP28dhebta_u:296: saṃśayāno jijñāsādita evānyatra ādivākyaviyukta iva granthe
GSP28dhebta_u:298: anyathā ādivākyavikale bhūyasi śāstre pravṛ^6ttir na syāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:299: tatra ca yad eva pravṛttinibandhanaṃ tad atrāpi bhaviṣyati |
GSP28dhebta_u:300: nāpi ādivākye saty apy āśvāso yujyate, anyatpratijñātavatām api anyavyutpādanadarśanāt
GSP28dhebta_u:305: anyathā tv ādivākyepi katham iva pravarteta śroteti? |
GSP28dhebta_u:307: tathāhi --yady arthasaṃśayaṃ prakaraṇe pravṛttyaṅgaṃ kartum abhidheyādīni abhidhīyanta ādivākyena, tatkaraṇād eva ca taphalam upavarṇyate, tarhi tatraivādivākye kathaṃ pravṛttiḥ^8 śrotṝṇām asati tasyādivākyasyābhidheyādyabhidhāyake vākyāntare' iti prṣṭodharmottarādirācaṣṭāṃ tāvat |
GSP28dhebta_u:308: kā pravṛttir ādivākya iti cet; tasya paṭhanaṃ śravaṇam arthāvagāhanam
GSP28dhebta_u:309: | anyathā prakaraṇepi kā pravṛttir iti tulyacodyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:310: vyākhyātṛvacanāt tatra pravṛttau prakaraṇe 'pi kā kṣatiḥ? |
GSP28dhebta_u:311: tadvacanaṃ krīḍādyartham anyathāpi [5a]^1saṃbhāvyata iti cet; samānam idam anyatrāpi |
GSP28dhebta_u:314: tatra tadantareṇāpi pravṛttir nānyatreti prativacanaṃ pratikṣiptam |
GSP28dhebta_u:315: tasmād dūram api gatvā tenedam abhidhānīyaṃ yad evāsmadabhimatam iti kim atinirbandhena [kṛ]taṃ bahutithena doṣeṇa |
GSP28dhebta_u:316: saṃśayasya ^2svarūpam upadarśayann āha -- kim asya [2.22] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:317: na vā kiñcidi[2.22]ty anena niścayenānyānusaraṇabījaṃ darśitam |
GSP28dhebta_u:318: saṃprati prayojanaviśeṣaṃ prati prakaraṇasyopāyabhāvasaṃśayaṃ tadabhidhānāt prāṇ nyāyaprāptaṃ pradarśya prayojanamātrāpekṣayāpi tasyopāyatvasandehas tadabhidhānasya purastāt sambhavī tato 'pi prakaraṇe pravṛttir avyāhateti darśayan ^3tatraivābhyccaye hetum āha -- api ca [2.23] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:319: evaṃ jijñāsoḥ [2.24] ity etajjijñāsāta ity arthāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:324: saprayojanatvānusaraṇe kadācid asmadabhimatam api prayoja^4naṃ sambhāvyata iti bhāvaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:325: ata eva vyanakti -- asmadabhimatena vā [2.24] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:330: yady evam artho vākyopanyāso vyarthas tarhi kim arthaṃvārtikakāreṇākārīty āśaṇkya tasmād [2.27]
GSP28dhebta_u:333: kartuṃ pratipādayituṃ vā nārabhyate [2.28] nānuṣṭhīyata iti yathāsaṃkhyaṃ sambandhaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:335: {p.243} itiḥ [3.2] pratiṣedhyasya tatkaraṇapratipādanānuṣṭhānalaksaṇasya vyāpakasyānupa^6labdher ākāraṃ kathayati |
GSP28dhebta_u:337: tasyā asiddhatā, yasyā udbhāvanaṃ pradarśanaṃ tad evārthaḥ prayojanam, tad yathā bhavatīty upanyasanakriyāyā viśeṣaṇam etat |
GSP28dhebta_u:339: asmāt khalu arthā ādāya ādāya vyākhyāyanta iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:340: syād etat -- vacana^7syāsya bahir arthe prāmāṇyābhāvāt katham asau tadvacanāt tadasiddhatāṃ budhyate? |
GSP28dhebta_u:342: 'rthasaṃśayaḥ pravrttyaṅgaṃ jāyata iti tad eva matamāyātam iti kim anena
GSP28dhebta_u:344: atrācaṣṭe -- kevalaṃ yaḥ pratipattā sati prayojanādau prekṣāpūrvakāriṇaṃ kartāraṃ ^8niyamena ādau tadvādinaṃ manvānaḥ tadarthaṃ vacanam asyāpy apaśyann aprekṣāvatprayuktatvagarbhaprayojanādikam atrāpi
GSP28dhebta_u:345: jānīte, taṃ pratipattṛviśeṣaṃ pratīdam akṛtādivākyaṃvārtikakṛd iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:346: anyathā katham asau niṣprayojanaṃ cedi(dami)tyādi niḥsandigdham abhidadhyāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:347: ādyasya tūktayā nītyā pravṛttir avyāhateti sarvam avadātam |
GSP28dhebta_u:350: etac ca sādhv asādhu vā madhyasthayā dhiyā sadbhir eva vijñāsyata iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:351: pūrvaṃ sāmānyena prayojanābhidhānam ākhyātam idānīṃ viśeṣeṇāvacchindann āha tatreti [3.5] vākyopanyāse |
GSP28dhebta_u:352: etad arthātmanopi saṃbhavāt prakaraṇātmana ity āha |
GSP28dhebta_u:355: kathaṃ punar vyutpādanaṃ "parokṣārthe"tyādiśabdarūpasya prakaraṇasya prayojanam ity āśaṃkya sarvaśabdasādhāraṇaprayojanopanyāsapūrvakam asya
GSP28dhebta_u:370: {p. 244} nanv etāvatāpi na jñāyate kotra samudāyārtho yasmin pratipādye amīṣāṃ parasparasambandhena vyāpāra ity āha tathāhi [3.8] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:371: nipātasamudāyaścāyaṃ yasmād ity asminn arthe sarvatra |
GSP28dhebta_u:374: yadi tacchabdena tat parāmṛṣyeta tadā tadabhidheyaṃ vyutpādyatayoktaṃ bhaved yāvatā tacchabdena tan na parāmṛṣṭam iti āha -- tasyaiva [3.9] iti
GSP28dhebta_u:378: yasmāt tacchabdena tasya sambandhaḥ svīkāraḥ tasmāt sambandhāt [3.9] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:383: syād etat -- ayaṃ khalu tacchabdo anantarapra^6kāntaṃ pradhānaṃ parāmṛśan dṛṣṭaḥ, anumānañ ca sāmānye(samāsārthe) guṇībhūtam |
GSP28dhebta_u:384: tat kathaṃ tasya tena parāmarśaḥ? Ity aśaṃkyāha -- yady api [3.9] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:389: [7] ṭīkāyāṃ prater atra truṭitatvātguṇabhūtam' iti kalpayitvā sthāpitaḥ
GSP28dhebta_u:393: pradhānasya saṃsparśaḥ svīkāraḥ sambandhaḥ iti yāvat |
GSP28dhebta_u:394: tena samaṃ vāstavasambandhāt tatparāmarśaḥ syādity āha -- śabdānām [3.12] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:396: athavā masa(śa)kasaṃkāśe kiṃ mahāstrākarṣaṇaprāye^8ṇeti manyamānas tadabhimataṃ prādhānyam eva darśayann āha -- pakṣe[3.13]tyādi |
GSP28dhebta_u:397: ayam asyāśayaḥ -- yady api samāsārthopasarjanaṃ pratyavamrasṭum aśakyaṃ tathāpi vyutpādyatayā śāstre prakṛtatvāt buddhyantareṇa gṛhītaṃ svatantraṃ satpratyavamṛṣyate |
GSP28dhebta_u:401: {p. 245} yady evaṃ tadvyutpattyartham iti vaktavye ṇicā nirdeśena kiṃ prayojanam ity āha -- ata eva [3.15] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:403: prakaraṇasya sādhyatvād eva prayojanaṃ nānyathā ataḥ asmāt kāraṇāt prakaraṇasya vyāpāras tathārthābhidhānaṃ tad darśayituṃ[8][3.16] |
GSP28dhebta_u:404: kiṃrūpaṃ tad datśayitum ity āha -- anumāne[3.15]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:405: anumānavyutpattiḥ viṣayaḥ sādhyatvād ya^2sya sa tathoktas taṃ darśayituṃ vyutpattiviṣayaṃ prayojakavyāpāraṃ darśayitum iti yāvat |
GSP28dhebta_u:412: evaṃ ca vyācaksāṇaḥ śiṣyasyānumānavyutpattau prakaraṇasya hetukartṛtāṃ darśayati |
GSP28dhebta_u:415: sati caivaṃ kartuḥ śrotuś ca karaṇa-śravaṇaprayojanam api sūcitaṃ bhavati |
GSP28dhebta_u:416: athāsati sādhyasādhanasambandhābhidhāne kathaṃ tatpratītir yena tasya tatprayojanaṃ siddhim adhyāsītety āha -- tataś ca [3.17] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:421: nanu ca praṇetur jñānastham arthaṃ pratipādayitum ucyate na (ṃuccaritena) śabdātmanā prakaraṇena tadabhidhānaṃ kartavyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:422: na hi anyathā tam arthaṃ pratipādyā(dyāḥ ā)kṛtyā darśayituṃ śakyante |
GSP28dhebta_u:423: tathā cārthābhidhānam evātra prayojakasya prakaraṇasya vyāpāraḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:426: tataś cāsyaivābhidhānārtham idam ārabhyata iti prasaktam |
GSP28dhebta_u:429: na tv asyaivābhidhānārtham iti codyaṃ pratividhātum abhyupagacchann āha -- yady api [3.18] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:430: śabdasya vṛttam vartanam pravṛttiḥ vyāpāra iti yāvat |
GSP28dhebta_u:433: etad uktaṃ bhavati -- śabdasya hi vyutpattiviṣayaḥ prayojakavyāpāro
GSP28dhebta_u:435: yadīdam anumatam eva tarhi kim artham evam abhihitam ity āśaṅkya pratisamādhānam āha -- tathāpi [3.19] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:438: {p 246}vastuvṛttyāpi kathaṃ vyutpatteḥ prādhānyam ity āha tasyā [3.18]
GSP28dhebta_u:440: ayam āśayaḥ -- sarvo hi prayojakavyāpāraḥ prayojyakriyārthaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:441: uktaṃ hi "vikledanopasarjanā viklittiḥ paceḥ pradhānārthaḥ" iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:442: tasmād vyutpādanārtham iti prayojakavyāpāravad vyutpattyartham ity uktaṃ bhavati |
GSP28dhebta_u:443: tadvyutpattyartham iti tūcyamāne anyais tadarthais bhojanā^8d iva
GSP28dhebta_u:446: sa kathaṃ nām gamyeta iti nyāyyo ṇiṅnirdeśaḥ iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:447: śābdīṃ gatim āśritya vākyasya prakaraṇaprayojanābhidhānapravṛttatvam abhisandhāya parokṣārthety āder ekadeśasya śābdyaiva gatyā guṇabhūtārthavācakatvaṃ da[6b] ^ 1rśayann āha -- parokṣārthe[3.23]ti śabdātmanaś cet prakaraṇasya prayojanam uktam, kṛtam arthātmanas tenābhihitena ity āśaṅkyāha -- na hi [3.24] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:448: tātparyārthapradarśanenaivaṃ vyācakṣāṇaś cārthena nyāyena abhidheyaprayojanam eva vaktuṃ pravṛttam idaṃ vākyam iti darśayati |
GSP28dhebta_u:452: kiṃ tad i^2ty apekṣāyāṃ brāhmaṇītyuktau strītvāvagatāv api yathā na tatra strīpratyayas tadvat sarvatra draṣṭavyam ity arthaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:453: ā samantād upyate 'nena iti āvapanam [4.5] kim ity apekṣāyāṃ iyam [4.5]
GSP28dhebta_u:456: nanu parokṣārthapratipatter anumānāśrayatvāt yadi tad vyutpādyate tarhi śabdāder api tannimittatvāt tad api kiṃ na vyutpādyate ity āśaṅkyāha -- anena [4.7] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:460: kasmād evam uktaṃ bhavatīty āha -- anyasmāt [4.8] iti uktatrirūpaliṅgād anyasmāt tatpratipatter avyabhicāriṇyāḥ parokṣārthapratipatter ayogād aprayujyamānatvāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:461: asaty avadhāraṇe ayam a^4rthaḥ kutastya ity āha -- avadhāraṇāt [4.10]
GSP28dhebta_u:466: uktād anyena prakāreṇānumānatve prāmāṇye sati iti yāvat |
GSP28dhebta_u:469: bhaviṣyati tatkahaṃ śabdādīnāṃ saty api prāmāṇye tathātvam ity āśaṅkyāha
GSP28dhebta_u:475: mā bhūt saṃvādikā, pramāṇaṃ tu kasmān na bhavati? |
GSP28dhebta_u:477: avi^6saṃvādanam[9]avisaṃvādakatvaṃ, tad eva lakṣaṇaṃ svabhāvo yasya tadbhāvas tattvaṃ tasmāt __________NOTES__________
GSP28dhebta_u:478: [9] ālokasammataḥ mūlapāṭhaḥavisaṃvādanalakṣatvāt' na tu yathā mudritaḥ
GSP28dhebta_u:480: svatantrāyā ayogāt, anyata eva sā bhaviṣyati kim etāvatānumānatvam? |
GSP28dhebta_u:481: na hi pakṣadharmataiva liṅgasya rūpaṃ yena tajjāyāḥ tathātvaṃ syādity āha
GSP28dhebta_u:485: [10] S' prater atra truṭitatvātyadi syā' iti pūritam asmābhiḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:486: ālokam anusṛtyaasambaddhāt yadi syā' iti -- pāṭhaḥ pūraṇīyaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:489: avyabhicāriṇī nānumānam ity āśaṅkyāha -- dharmyasaṃbandhepi [4.16] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:490: yady evam astu tatpratipattihetoḥ pakṣadharmatvam api |
GSP28dhebta_u:491: kim ataḥ ity āha -- evam [4.18] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:500: yatra tu arthaviśeṣe vartate sa prāyeṇa kathyate |
GSP28dhebta_u:501: syād etat -- utsūtro 'yam arthas tvayā vyākhyāyate na tv ayam
GSP28dhebta_u:502: atrācāryasya vivakṣita ity āha eṣa ca [4.19] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:506: vyāpta eva ca [4.22] iti samuccīyamānāvadhāraṇam idam |
GSP28dhebta_u:507: narañ ca nārāyaṇa[7a] ^ 1m eva cādau svataḥ sutau dvau janayāṃ babhūva iti yathā
GSP28dhebta_u:509: iti ca bhāvaḥ avadhāraṇāt [4.22] iti dhru(bru)vataḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:520: evam evācāryasya tathābhidhānaṃ saṅgacchate nānyatheti darśayitum āha
GSP28dhebta_u:523: anyathāpratyakṣavyavasthāyāḥ' iti viśeṣo(ṣyo)ktaṃ syāt na sāmānyenety
GSP28dhebta_u:525: atra prāmāṇyasya vastuviṣayatvād anyena sāmānyaviṣayatvaprakāreṇa tatra [4.27] svalakṣaṇe, nānyaviṣayā^3j jñānād anyatra pravṛttir yuktā,
GSP28dhebta_u:527: nanu sāmānyam api vastu, tena tadarthakriyārthitayaive pravṛttir
GSP28dhebta_u:531: tasyām evārthakriyāyāṃ pravṛttir bhaviṣyatīty āha -- tasyāś ca [5.2]
GSP28dhebta_u:536: pravartsyatīti ata āha -- na hi [5.2] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:546: abhyupetyāpi sambandham idānīm āha -- satyapi [5.5] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:548: dhūmārthinopi dhūmapratipattau dhūmadhvaje pratipattiḥ prāpnoti iti iṣṭam dharmam atikrāntaḥ prasaṅgaḥ atiprasaṅga[5.6]s tasmāddhetoḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:549: {p. 249} anavasitaḥ -- anavadhāritaḥ, vivekaḥ -- anyatvaṃ yena sa
GSP28dhebta_u:551: tadanavasāya eva kuta ity āha -- samavāyasya [5.3] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:557: nanu kim idaṃ samavāyasya sūkṣmatvaṃ vivakṣitam? |
GSP28dhebta_u:560: athāpy upalabdhijananayogyarūparahitatvaṃ tad api tadabhāvāt tad eva
GSP28dhebta_u:561: nopalabhyatām, na tu tasya tādrūpyeṇa sāmānyatadvetor bhedānupalakṣaṇam
GSP28dhebta_u:563: na ca samavāyo nopalabhyatenaiyāyikamate samavetaviśeṣaṇabhāvena tasyopalabdher iṣṭatvāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:566: iha hi sūkṣmatvaṃ samavāyasya samavāyinor bhedenānupalambhakatvaṃ vivakṣitam |
GSP28dhebta_u:567: eṣa hi samavāyasya mahimā yena samavāyinau nirluṭhitagarbhavadbhedena nopala^8mbhayati paṭatantvādivad iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:570: iha bhrāntes tvayāpy avaśyābhyupagantavyatvād bhrāntimātram evāstu [5.8] ity āha |
GSP28dhebta_u:571: vāsanādvayanibaddho hi vikalpaḥ svābhāsam evāgovyāvṛttaṃ pratiyan bāhyasyāpy agovyāvṛttatayā bhedam avagāhitum anīśāno bāhya eva gaur mayā pratīta ity abhimanyamā[7b] ^ 1naḥ prakṛtyaiva bhrāntirūpo jāyate |
GSP28dhebta_u:572: bhrāntir eva bhrāntimātram [5.8] vastubhūtasāmānyaśūnyaṃ svakṣaṇāśrayatayā anumānajñānāśrayatayopagatatvena ca tayor antarvartitvād
GSP28dhebta_u:573: anupayogitayā ca ghāṭāmastakāntarālavartimāṃsapiṇḍarūpagaḍusthānīyatvāt gaḍurūpaṃ [5.8] tena tadviṣayatayopagateneti prakaraṇāt kiṃ [5.8] na kiñcid ity arthaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:574: ayam asyāśayaḥ -- ^2yadi vikalpo dṛśyavikalpyāv arthāv ekīkṛtya lokaṃ pravartayituṃ na śaknuyāt yadi ca tadupagame 'pi bhrāntiḥ pravṛttinimittaṃ nopagamyeta, tadā tathā pravṛttau sāmānyam upayujyetāpi |
GSP28dhebta_u:575: yadi ca tat pramāṇaprasiddhaṃ bhavet gaḍuvadevānupayuktam api upagamyeta, upagamya ca tathā pravṛtti iṣyeta, yāvatā sarvam evedam asambhavīti |
GSP28dhebta_u:577: na ca vyaktiṣu sarvato vyāvṛttāsu anugatākārasya buddhipratibhāsasyārope kiṇcin nimittam asti
GSP28dhebta_u:578: tat kathaṃ bhrāntyā pravṛttikalpanā jyāyasīty abhiprāyavānāha -- nirbīje[5.8]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:580: yāḥ svahetubhyas tathotpannās tā vyaktayaḥ svahetusāmarthyāt tadekapratyavamarṣārthajñānādy ekaṃ kāryaṃ
GSP28dhebta_u:582: etad uktaṃ bhavati -- atatkāryavyāvṛttyā tadekakāryatvaṃ sarvasajātīyānugataṃ tāsu vidyamānam anugatākārasya buddhipratibhāsasyāropabījaṃ kin na bhavatīti? |
GSP28dhebta_u:583: syād etat -- tadekakāryatayā tathābhūtā api vyaktayaḥ tathābhūtāyā bhrānter bījam upapadyante
GSP28dhebta_u:584: sāmānyam ity asmatpakṣasyāpi na kiñcit pramāṇam ity abhi^5sambandham ākalayya parasparasāmānyābhidhānam unmūlayitum āha -- varṇe[5.10]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:585: varṇaḥ śuklādiḥ, ākṛtiḥ saṃsthānaṃ saṃyogaviśeṣaḥ, tābhyāṃ samāno 'viśiṣṭaḥ ākāra ābhāso yasya yatra vā tat
GSP28dhebta_u:587: varṇasamānābhāsam ākṛtisamānābhāsaṃ varṇābhāsam ākṛtyābhāsam iti yāvat |
GSP28dhebta_u:594: varṇākṛtiprayuktaṃ hi pratibhāsamānaṃ hi tadvarṇākṛtiyoginy aparatra bhrānter bījaṃ [5.11] nibandhanaṃ bhavet, nānyad itibhāvaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:595: yadi nāma sāmānya^7tadvator varṇādiyogābhyāṃ vaisadṛśyaṃ tathāpi
GSP28dhebta_u:596: sāmānyaṃ tatra bhramanibandhanaṃ kiṃ na bhavati ity āha -- sādṛśye[5.11]ti
GSP28dhebta_u:597: | asti hi kācidbhrāntir yā antarupaplavasambhave ity abhipretya paraiḥ [5.12] ity āha |
GSP28dhebta_u:598: yadi evaṃ bāhyasya buddhipratibhāsena sāmānyena kiṃ sādṛśyaṃ yena brāntir utpadyata iti āha -- vyaktaya [5.12] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:599: [17]sāmānyālambanaṃ yaj jñānaṃ tasya ya ākāro^8 vijātīyavyāvṛttarūpaṃ tasya sarūpāḥ [5.13][18]vijātīyavyāvṛttā [5.12] iti hetubhāvena viśeṣaṇam
GSP28dhebta_u:601: buddhipratibhāsasya vā atadrūpaparāvṛttatayaivāvabhāsanād iti ca bhāvaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:606: yairvaiśeṣikādibhir vyakter bhinnaṃ sāmānyam iṣṭaṃ tair apy avaśyam uktayā nītyā svalakṣaṇaviṣayam anumānasya prāmāṇyam eṣṭavyam iti pra[8a] ^
GSP28dhebta_u:609: sāmāṇyaṃ anumāne pratibhāsamānaṃ pravṛttiviṣayaḥ, tac ca vyaktisvarūpam iti svalakṣaṇaviṣayam eva prāmāṇyaṃ tasyāpatitam ity āśayaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:610: yady evaṃ bhavanmatavat tad api matam atiśobhanam ity āśaṅkya āha --
GSP28dhebta_u:611: taddeśopasargaṇajanmanīndriyajñāna iva ^2pratibhāsanaprasaṅgena śabdād api taṃ(tat)pratītau cakṣurindriyādivaiyarthyaprasaṅgena vyakter apratibhāsane tadātmakaṃ sāmānyaṃ katham iva pratibhāyād iti bhāvaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:612: nanu yady anumānasyāpi prāmāṇyaṃ svalakṣaṇaviṣayaṃ tarhi pratyakṣād asya bhedaḥ katham ity āśaṅkyāha --[19]parokṣa iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:615: [19] S saṃjñakahetubinduṭīkāyāḥ prater atra truṭitatvāt mūlapāṭhābhāvaḥ
GSP28dhebta_u:617: yasmād arthā[t]sākṣād anudaya^3mānam utpattuṃ liṅgam apeksate, arthañ ca na sākṣātkaroti tasmād ity arthaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:619: syān matam -- yady asyāpi svalakṣaṇaṃ viṣayaḥ, tarhy anyat sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ, so 'numānasya viṣayaḥ[NB I] itinyāyabindur virudhyetety āha -- tadeveti |
GSP28dhebta_u:621: kathaṃ tathā vaktuṃ śakyata ity āha -- lakṣyata iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:624: ta eva bhedāś ca avivecitabhedāḥ sāmānyam ity arthaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:625: punar uktāśaṅkām ity arthapunaruktāśaṅkā ity avaseyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:630: śabdapunaruktaṃ tu vidhitsādyabhāva eva yadā sa eva śabdaḥ punar uccāryate
GSP28dhebta_u:631: | viśeṣavidhitsādibhāve tad eva dvaidham arthānuvādaśabdānuvādātmanā dvaidhaṃ bhavatīti
GSP28dhebta_u:637: prabhedo 'pi dvidhā draṣṭavyaḥ -- anupalabdhyādibhedena pakṣadharmatvādyātmanā ca |
GSP28dhebta_u:639: anvayādipra(sva)rūpaprabhedaniścāyakaṃ pramāṇaṃ nokta^7m evaty āśaṃkyāha trividheti |
GSP28dhebta_u:643: evam abhidhānād eva cāsya prabhedasyety atrāsmābhis tathā vyākhyātam anyathā etan na saṃgaccheta
GSP28dhebta_u:644: syād etat -- liṅgalakṣaṇānumānasvarūpasya vyutpādanaṃ syād yadi lakṣyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tan nirdiṣṭaṃ bhavet |
GSP28dhebta_u:645: prabhedasya ca ^8tadā syād yadi tan nirdeśaḥ syāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:646: na cātra tadvācakam astīty āha tatra tredhāvyutpādane vyavasthite satīti |
GSP28dhebta_u:647: evañ ca nirdeśapradarśanaṃ paraṃ kṛtaṃ boddhavyaṃ na tu lakṣaṇānuvādena lakṣyavidhirdarśitaḥ
GSP28dhebta_u:648: hetur iti tu lakṣyamanūdya pakṣadharma ityādilakṣaṇaṃ vidheyam avaseyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:654: atra tu sāhāyakaṃkumārilasākṣiṇam apakṣipann āha tad uktam iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:657: sakṛjjātā tu vipakṣābhāvasaṃvittir adṛḍhā yatra, na tatra, yathāvadhāraṇam ity anena sūcayati |[20]hiryasmād indriyasya bhāvāṅge(vāṃśe)naiva saṃyogaḥ
GSP28dhebta_u:661: so 'pi kasmād ity āha -- yogyatvād iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:670: [20] bhāvāṃśenaiva saṃyogo yogyatvādi indriyasya hi' iti SV, abhāva 18 |
GSP28dhebta_u:672: anukrāntaṃ rūpaṃ [6.9] svabhāvo yasya tat tathā |
GSP28dhebta_u:674: hetvantaram api tathā bhaviṣyati ity āha -- yadi [6.9] iti sambhāvayati |
GSP28dhebta_u:683: na ca tasya cātyantāsato 'vikalakāraṇasya bhāvaḥ sambhavati iti bhāvaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:687: {p. 253} amūṣāṃ sambhavam abhyupapadyedānīṃ dūṣaṇaṃ datte -- sambhave
GSP28dhebta_u:690: nanu katham ayaṃ niyamaḥ sidhyatīti praśne kim idam akṛtaṃ niyamasiddhyanaṅgam abhidhīyata ity āśaṅkyāha -- evaṃ manyata [6.18] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:695: tadvipakṣasya [6.19] tasya niyamaviṣayasya vipakṣaḥ tadvipakṣas tasya vyāptau |
GSP28dhebta_u:697: ^6pratiṣedhyasya hetutvasya yaḥ svabhāvas tena yadviruddhaṃ hetvābhāsatvaṃ
GSP28dhebta_u:699: nanu hetūktalakṣaṇapratītikām(mo)hetor eva rūpaṃ pratīyatām, kathaṃ punaḥ parasparaparihāravattayā tayor virodhaḥ pratīyata ity āha --
GSP28dhebta_u:700: tasya hetor ya ātmā tatra niyato yaḥ pratibhāsas tasya yaj jñānaṃ saṃve^7danaṃ tasmāddhetoḥ viparītasya anyatayā tadanātmatayā sāmarthyāt jñātayā |
GSP28dhebta_u:703: tasmāt kiṃ bhavatīty āha -- parasparam iti [7.2]
GSP28dhebta_u:704: syād etat -- atyantāsato hetvantarasya na kenacit saha virodhāvagatiḥ
GSP28dhebta_u:707: a^8tyantāsat kathaṃ niṣidhyeta iti pūrvapakṣadvayam utprekṣamāṇa āha -- te ca [7.4] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:709: nāpi ca tena niṣidhyamānaṃ hetutvam atyantāsattayopagatam iti sambandhanīyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:710: tarhi kim atra tattvam ity āha
GSP28dhebta_u:712: anyatra [7.6] kāryādau prasiddhaṃ niścitaṃ vyāmohād ajñānāt tatra
GSP28dhebta_u:716: kiṃ kasmāt sāmarthyāt prakāśyamānam ity uktam |
GSP28dhebta_u:717: evam upalakṣaṇatvād asya kathaṃ niṣedha ity api draṣṭavyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:718: nanu kiṃ hetvantare hetutvaṃ bhavatvā[bhavat hetvā]bhāsatvabhāvān
GSP28dhebta_u:719: nivartamānam avagataṃ yena tasyānena virodho vakṣyata ity āha -- na ca [7.8] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:720: idānīm atyantāsattvam abhyupagamyāpi doṣābhāvaṃ pradarśayitum āha --
GSP28dhebta_u:722: {p. 254} kathaṃ punas tatraiva^2 tadavagamo na bhavatīty āśaṅkyāha --
GSP28dhebta_u:724: mā tatrāvadhāri virodho 'nyatrāpi katham atyantaḥ(tā)satas tadavagama ity āha -- sarvatra[24] [7.13] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:729: lakṣaṇaṃ [7.15] vastūnāṃ vibhaktarūpaṃ, tat prayojanam asya iti
GSP28dhebta_u:730: tathā[25]| niyatarūpapratītir eva sarveṇa samaṃ tasya virodhapratītir iti samudāyārthaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:734: prakaraṇaṃ nigamayann āha -- iti sthitam e^3tat [7.18] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:739: pramāṇayor dvaitāt dvayor aniyatarūpadarśane katareṇe[7.25]ty uktam |
GSP28dhebta_u:741: viśeṣapratiṣedhāt śeṣavidhānaṃ labdham ity abhiprāyeṇa pakṣadharmatāsadbhāve
GSP28dhebta_u:743: bhavatu avinābhāvābhāvo hetvābhāsatvan tu kasmād ity āha --
GSP28dhebta_u:747: saṃprati viśiṣṭena nāmnā sādhanam idam avacchindan āha -- iti [8.3]
GSP28dhebta_u:749: avinābhāvavaikalyam eva tu kutaḥ siddhim ity āha --
GSP28dhebta_u:755: tadanupalabdhir eva kuta ity āha -- trividhe[8.5]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:756: tadbhāve hi trividhāntarbhāvād eva tadvyatiriktatvam eva na bhaved iti bhāvaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:757: kiṃ tadvyāpakānupalabdhyā tatsiddhim adhyārohatīty āha -- tathāhi
GSP28dhebta_u:761: tasmād utpattis tatkāraṇād votpattiś ca tadutpattir iṣṭā draṣṭavyā |
GSP28dhebta_u:762: kutas tābhyāṃ tasya vyāptir ity āha -- tayoḥ [8.7] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:768: kiṃ punar anyathāpi na bhāvah ity āha -- atatsvabhāvasyeti [8.8] |
GSP28dhebta_u:769: pūrvoktata^7dutpattiniṣedhena yasya yasmād anutpattir yatkāraṇād vā tasyātadutpatter iti [8.8] boddhavyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:771: syād etat -- dṛṣṭacaram idaṃ yat atatsvabhāvena anutpannena ca kenacit kasyacid avyabhicāro yathā rasādinā rūpāder ity āha -- rūpādinā [8.15] iti
GSP28dhebta_u:775: tatkāraṇotpattir eva [8.16] ity abhidadhānas tadutpattiśabdena pūrvaṃ dve vidhe vivakṣite iti sphuṭayati |
GSP28dhebta_u:777: viśeṣābhāvo 'siddhaḥ, ekārthasamavāyitvam eva viśeṣa ity abhipretur vacanam ekārtha [8.19] ityādinā śaṅkate |
GSP28dhebta_u:778: ekārthasamavāya ity atra dvayī vyutpa[9b] ^ 1ttiḥ -- ekasminn arthe ekasmin samavāya ekārthasya vā samavāya iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:779: atra tu ekasminn arthe dvayoḥ samavāyaḥ iti vivakṣitam |
GSP28dhebta_u:780: sa nimittaṃ yasya avinābhāvasya sa tathā |
GSP28dhebta_u:782: "ayutasiddhānām ādhāryādhārabhūtānāṃ yaḥ sambandha ihapratyayahetuḥ sa samavāyaḥ" [Praśasta. p. 696) ityādāv ādhāryādhāragrahaṇād upavarṇyate
GSP28dhebta_u:783: astu tathāvidhayor asau kā kṣatir iti āha -- sa ca [8.20] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:789: tad eva tu nāstīti saṃprati pratipādayann āha --[27]yathā ca [8.22] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:792: [27] S prater atra truṭitatvāt "-samavāyo[vase]yaḥ" iti kalpanayā pūritaḥ
GSP28dhebta_u:799: bhavantas tarhi kiṃ kartāra ity āha -- kevalam [9.3] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:803: itiḥ [9.4] tasmāt na kasya cidva^4stunaḥ sa svabhāvo viramet |
GSP28dhebta_u:804: sarvasya sarvaḥ svabhāvaḥ syād ity arthaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:805: digādivad ahetoḥ sato deśakālaniyamo neṣṭa eveti vādini tu deśakālagrahaṇaṃ dṛṣṭāntārthaṃ draṣṭavyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:806: tena yathā deśakālaniyamo heturahitasya nāsti tathā dravyaniyamo 'pi na syād ityarthaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:808: ^5hir yasmāt tadgamakaṃ vastu kartṛ kiñcid gamyaṃ[29]kañcid(kvacid) dharmiṇyupanīyeta agnir vā na veti [9.5] tadviparītaṃ vā syāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:809: yasya [9.5] vastuno yatra [9.6] gamye kiñcid dravyam āyattaṃ, na veti asya vivaraṇaṃ anāyattam iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:819: na tu bhavadabhipretam ity āha tac ca [9.10] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:822: etad evācāryavacanena saṃsyandayann āha -- tathā cāha [9.11] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:823: syād etat -- asaty api tatsvābhāvye tatkāryatve vā kiñcid arthāntaram avyabhicaradṛṣṭam eva yathā ^ 7tape tarucchāyā |
GSP28dhebta_u:825: evam ādyasmābhirdharmottarapradīpe vistareṇa nirūpitam ity āstām tāvad iha |
GSP28dhebta_u:826: syād etad -- avinābhāvasya tādātmyatadutpattyor avyabhicāre nimittam na tāvat tādātmyatadutpattī sto yathā cāyaṃ tathā tadanyopi tadavyabhicārī ca syā^8n na ca tasya tatsvabhāvatvaṃ tatkāryatvañ ceti |
GSP28dhebta_u:830: kevalaṃ kayācid vyapekṣayā tato bhinna iva kathyate.
GSP28dhebta_u:831: na tu tāvatā vastuto bhinna eva. avinābhāvi ca rūpaṃ kiñcid avyabhicaritavyād arthāntaraṃ kiñcid anarthāntaram, tasya tatkāryatayāiva pratibandho 'narthānta[10a]^1rasya tu tādātmyena ata evāvinābhāvabhāvāt tādātmyatadutpattivyavahāraḥ sādhyate |
GSP28dhebta_u:832: tadabhāvaṃ tu tad api rūpaṃ nāstīti pratipādyata iti sarvam avadātam |
GSP28dhebta_u:833: atra [9.15] asminn arthe prayogo [9.15] dvyavayaṃ sādhanavākyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:835: syād etat -- yathā tādātmyatadutpattyabhāvo 'py anupalabdhiḥ sādhyāvyabhicāriṇī tathānyad api kiṃ na bhaved ity āśaṃ^2kyāha
GSP28dhebta_u:837: tādātmyaṃ [9.19] lakṣanaṃ nibandhanaṃ yasya sa tathā |
GSP28dhebta_u:838: tad apiācāryasyābhimatam iti darśayann āha taduktam [9.22] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:839: idānīm imam eva "pakṣadharma"ityādiślokaṃ anyathā vyācikhyāsuranena yāvanto 'rthā nirdiṣṭāḥ tāvataḥ parisaṃkhyātum āha -- tad evam [9.25] iti
GSP28dhebta_u:844: etac chlokavyākhyānasyāparām api vidhāṃ darśayann āha -- athavā [9.28]
GSP28dhebta_u:847: na tv avadhāraṇacintākṛteti tato bhinnam idaṃ vyākhyānam |
GSP28dhebta_u:848: katham idam uktam avadhāraṇam upapadyata ity abhipretya pṛcchati |
GSP28dhebta_u:852: avi^4nābhāva[32]bhāvād iti śliṣṭanirdeśam abhisandhāya trividhasya ca [10.3] ity uktam
GSP28dhebta_u:853: tathā hy avinābhāve niyamān niyatatvād ity ukte kasyety āśaṃkāyāṃ trividhasya ca śrutatvāt trividhasyeti yujyate vaktum |
GSP28dhebta_u:864: trivedhe ca hetāv ahetutām ācakṣāṇā nirastā bhavanti |
GSP28dhebta_u:868: [33] ālokasaṃmataḥ pāṭhaḥ samyak, na tu yathā saṃpūritaḥ
GSP28dhebta_u:870: {p. 258} asmin vyākhyāne "hetvābhāsās tato 'pare" iti vyākhyātuṃ pūrvapakṣaṃ racayann āha[35]tathaitat dvedhā hi tadaṃśavyāptiviraho viparyayavyāpteḥ viparyaye bādhakapramāṇābhāvād ity abhiprāyeṇāha te [10.17] buddhiniviṣṭā asiddhaviruddhānaikāntikā heturūpavikalatayā hetvābhāsā gamyanta eva |
GSP28dhebta_u:872: na tu tatsaṃjñayā jñātais taiḥ prayojana(naṃ) hetutvamātrajñāne^7na caritārthatvāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:873: evam api vā prajñāiḥ jñāyanta iti na kācit kṣatiḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:878: atrāpi vyākhyāne aṅgāṅgibhāvena pratipāditānām arthānām avacchedaṃ kurvann āha -- tad atreti tadubhayasya -- trividho hetur eva,
GSP28dhebta_u:879: trividha eva hetur ity asyāvadhāraṇadvayasya kāraṇam [11.1] upapattī dve ^8ity arthatvāt
GSP28dhebta_u:882: anantaroktās trayo 'rthā imau ca dvikāraṇalakṣaṇau dvāv arthāpattayaś caka iti ṣaḍarthā bhavanti |
GSP28dhebta_u:883: asminn eva śloke pūrvavyākhyānāparityāgenāvṛttyaivāparam api vyākhyānam abhyuccinvann āha kiñceti [11.4] |
GSP28dhebta_u:885: prabhedasya vyutpādanam" iti bruvatā sa hetus traidhā kāryasvabhāvānupalabdhibhedabhinna iti prakāśitam evaitat, kathaṃ vyākhyānāntaram idam iti cet |
GSP28dhebta_u:887: kevalaṃ "tridhaiva sa" ity atra vyākhyānāntaram idaṃ vidheyaṃ tac ca tadā sujñātaṃ bhavati, yady asya prākpravṛttaṃ vyākhyānam upadarśya pradarśyata ity abhiprāyeṇa tad vyākhyānam anūditam |
GSP28dhebta_u:888: etad apekṣeṇa tu a^2thavety anena kiñcaśabdārtham ujjvalayatā yat pradarśyate tad eva vyākhyānāntaraṃ draṣṭavyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:891: kāryādibhedabhinna eva pratyekaṃ pakṣadharmatvānvayavyatirekātmakas trirūpa eveti |
GSP28dhebta_u:892: etenaikadvipadaparyudāsena ṣaṭpakṣān pratikṣipya saptamapakṣaparigraheṇānumānalakṣaṇam abhipre^3taṃ vārtikakṛto darśayati |
GSP28dhebta_u:893: yata ekapadaparigraheṇa trayaḥ pakṣā, dvipadaparigraheṇāpi traya iti
GSP28dhebta_u:895: tathāhi pakṣadharmo hetur ity ucyamāne yasya sapakṣenanvayo vipakṣe ca pravṛttiḥ sopi hetuḥ syāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:899: yathā nityaḥ śabdaś cākṣuṣatvāt sāmānya{p. 259}vad iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:900: ya(ta)thā sapakṣavyatireka ity ucyamāne yo 'pakṣadharmaḥ sapakṣe ca nāsti sa hetuḥ syāt
GSP28dhebta_u:902: pakṣadharme sapakṣe ca yo 'sti sa hetur ity ucyamāne nityaḥ śabdaḥ prameyatvād iti^5 vipakṣavṛttir hetuḥ syāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:903: pakṣadharmaḥ sapakṣe nāstīty ucyamāne nityaḥ śabdo jātimattve sati śrāvaṇatvād ity ayaṃ sapakṣavṛttihīno hetuḥ syāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:904: sapakṣe 'sti vipakṣe ca nāstīty ucyamāne anityāḥ paramānavaḥ kṛtakatvād ity ayam apakṣadharmo hetuḥ syāt |

GSP28dhebta_u:952: yadā tv anumānatas tadā tad api teṣām anumānam adṛṣṭāntakaṃ kathaṃ syād iti sādhanaṃ duḥkham iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:955: na tu sahetunāśavādibhir buddhyāder apy utpattikṣaṇa eva bhāvo na tu dvitīye kṣaṇa iti evaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ kṣaṇikatvam eṣṭavyam, āśutaravināśitvābhiprāyeṇa kṣaṇikaśabdapravṛtter iṣṭatvād iti draṣṭavyam iti |

GSP28dhebta_u:1162: {p. 266} evam asau pratyavatastha iti kathaṃ jñāyata ity āśaṃkyāha tena hī[21.16]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:1163: hir yasmāt tenakumārilena| jyotiṣṭomādeḥ śreyaḥsādhanatvaṃ dharmo boddhavyaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:1164: yad āhaśabarasvāmī"ko dharmmo yaḥ śreyaḥsādhanaḥ" [Śābarabhā.1.1.2] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:1169: na tv īdṛśa evabhāṣyagranthaḥ| pramāṇasyeti vivakṣāyām anumānādina [21.18] iti nirdeśaḥ
GSP28dhebta_u:1170: kadā tatpūrvakaṃ tad ity āha yadeti |
GSP28dhebta_u:1174: vikalpanam antareṇāpi kathaṃ na tathā grahaṇam ity āha nace[21.20]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:1178: pratyakṣeṇāgrahaṇaṃ kasyety apekṣāyām āha liṅgāde[21.23]r iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:1183: kiṃ vikalpamātrasya tathotpattir ity āśaṃkyāha -- arthe[21.24]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:1186: nanu nirvikalpasavikalpabhedenārthavijñānasya dvaite satīdaṃ vaktuṃ yujyate |
GSP28dhebta_u:1189: vikalpāt pūrvaṃ bhāvāt prathamam [21.25] ādyam bālādiṣu tathā^3vidhavikalpāniṣṭer jñānaṃ dṛṣṭāntatayeṣṭam |
GSP28dhebta_u:1194: jātyādibhir viśiṣṭaṃ yayā buddhyāvasīyate sāpi na kevalam ālocanājñānam iti apiśabdaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:1204: yasmāt tenaivaṃ bruvatā sāmarthyād etat prakāśitaṃ tataḥ [22.3] tasmāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:1206: upada[46]rśito yo doṣaḥ "saugatānām eva pratyakṣeṇa liṅgādyagrahaṇām" ity
GSP28dhebta_u:1211: hī[22.4]tyādiphakkikāyāḥ samudāyārtham upadarśayann āha ayam atre[22.5]ti
GSP28dhebta_u:1212: nanu cāvikalpakaṃ pratyakṣaṃ neyato vyādhāna(vyāpārān)kartuṃ samarthaṃ
GSP28dhebta_u:1213: tat^6 kathaṃ tannibandhanas tanniścaya ity abhidhātari katham idaṃ
GSP28dhebta_u:1214: "sadhūmaṃ hī"tyādivaco na plavata ity āśaṃkāyām atre[22.5]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:1217: ekasya sākṣād itarasya sāmarthyāj jananāt vidhipratiṣedhavikalpadvayaṃ
GSP28dhebta_u:1219: kadācid vidhivikalpaṃ kadācit pratiṣedhavikalpaṃ janayatīty abhiprāyeṇa caitad uktam |
GSP28dhebta_u:1223: kim anubhūte 'rthe vikalpodayaḥ? naivam ucyata ity
GSP28dhebta_u:1225: yady anubhavānatikrameṇa vikalpodayas tadā sarvatrāṃśe tadudayaprasaṅgaḥ ity āha abhyāse[22.11]ti
GSP28dhebta_u:1231: asyāpy ayam arthaḥ -- nānubhava ity eva vikalpaṃ janayati |
GSP28dhebta_u:1232: kiṃtu kaścit punaḥ punas tatrotpadyamānas tādṛśo bhavati |
GSP28dhebta_u:1234: kaścit tu svabhāvātiśayalakṣaṇaṃ pāṭavam apekṣya janayati |
GSP28dhebta_u:1236: arthaḥ -- kaścid anubhavaḥ prakṛtyaiva paṭīyān jāyate yas tatra kṣamaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:1239: kvacit punar avidyānubandhāt sadṛśāparāparotpādavipralabdhaś ca sarvadaiva tiraskṛtapaṭimā yo naiva tatkṣamo bhavati |
GSP28dhebta_u:1244: syād etat -- sa^2mbandho 'yam iti niścayānanubhavanāt kathaṃ
GSP28dhebta_u:1245: sambandhaniścayas tannibandhana ucyata ity āśaṃkyāha tathāhī[22.13]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:1247: nanu sambandhasyādhārādheyalakṣaṇasyānanubhavāt kathaṃ tanniścayas tannibandhana upavarṇyata ity āha na ce[22.16]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:1251: ayaṃ saṃbandhaḥ sambandhinau caitau" iti vyavahāra ity āha --
GSP28dhebta_u:1252: yena tathābhūtavastudvayānubhavāśrayataḥ samāropitaḥ sanbandhaḥ tena kāraṇena vyavahāra[22.21]ś ca "ayaṃ dharmī ayaṃ dharmaḥ"
GSP28dhebta_u:1256: na tv ayaṃ paramārthiko vyavahāra ity arthaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:1257: nanu ca tathābhūtavastudvayād anyasya sambandhasyābhāvāt, tasya ca pratyakṣeṇa grahaṇāt sambandhaniścayas tathābhūtavastudvayakṛtos tu,
GSP28dhebta_u:1260: na ca viśeṣo liṅgam ity āśaṃkyāha
GSP28dhebta_u:1262: syād etat -- anugatasya vastuno 'bhāve 'nugatapratyayo nirhetukaḥ kathaṃ bhaved ity āha teṣām eva [22.23] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:1263: na svalakṣaṇasya vikalpajanane sākṣād vyāparas tasyātadviṣayatvād ity āha --
GSP28dhebta_u:1264: yadi te vijātīyasvabhāvās tathāpi kathaṃ ta^6tpratyayahetutvaṃ teṣām ity āha -- vijātīye[22.23]ti
GSP28dhebta_u:1265: ekākārasyābhinnakārasya parāmarṣaḥ, sa cāsau pratyayaś ca [tatra] hetutvāt
GSP28dhebta_u:1267: [ekasyā]bhinnasya pratyavamarṣas tad evedam iti sambandhāhāra (samanvāhāra) iti vigrahaḥ kāryaḥ na tv ekaś cāsau pratyavamarṣaś ceti |
GSP28dhebta_u:1268: evaṃ hi pratyavamarṣaś cā(syā)pi bhinna^7tvāt katham ekatvaṃ?
GSP28dhebta_u:1269: tadaparaika(parā)marśād iti yady ucyeta tadā tasyāpi tattvaṃ tata ity anavasthā |
GSP28dhebta_u:1270: tathā ca yāvad antimasya tathātvaṃ na jñāyate tāvad ādimasyāpi tattvavyavasthā na syāt, asatyāṃ ca tasyām ekadhīhetubhāvena vyaktīnām apy
GSP28dhebta_u:1271: abhinna[tvam a]rpāyituṃ na śakyetety alam iha vistareṇa |
GSP28dhebta_u:1272: yasmāt tair ayaṃ vikalpo janyate tataḥ [23.1] |
GSP28dhebta_u:1273: anubhūtālambanaṃ jñānaṃ smṛtiḥ, atra tu ^8sāmānyaṃ kenānubhūtam ayaṃ gṛhṇāti, yena smṛtitvaṃ syād ity āha tatpratibhāsina [23.1] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:1274: vijātīyavyāvṛttaṃ svalaksaṇaṃ pratyakṣeṇekṣitam, na tu vyāvṛttir ity āha nahī[23.3]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:1275: syād etat -- vikalpānām anarthagrāhitayā bāhyārthāsaṃsparśād eva kathaṃ gṛhītagrāhitvalakṣaṇaṃ smṛtitvam ity āścarya upasaṃhārāpadeśenāha
GSP28dhebta_u:1277: yady evaṃ dvaidham api vikalpaḥ pratipattur
GSP28dhebta_u:1278: adhyavasā[14b] ^ 1yavaśād gṛhītabāhyārthagrāhitayā smṛtir ucyate, tarhi paramārthataḥ kiṃviṣaya ity āha vastuta [23.7] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:1279: yato 'yaṃ vikalpaḥ paramārthato nirviṣayopi pratipantradhyavasāyānurodhāt smṛtir abhipretaḥ
GSP28dhebta_u:1283: abhedenābhinnākāraṃ yadvijñānaṃ tad etat smārtaṃ smṛtirūpa^2m iti yobauddho vadet |
GSP28dhebta_u:1284: tasyāivaṃvādino nūnaṃ niścitaṃ vandhyāsute 'pi viṣaye yatsmaraṇaṃ tatra
GSP28dhebta_u:1287: śakta iti yāvat kathaṃ tasyātyāntābhāvasmaraṇaśaktatopakalpyata iti āśaṃkāyāṃ cūrṇakenopapattim āha sāmānyasyānanubhūtatayā ananubhūtatvāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:1288: evaṃ bruvato 'pi (yaṃ) bhāvaḥ -- anubhūte ^3hi smṛtir bhavati |
GSP28dhebta_u:1289: yadi vānanubhūtepi smaraṇam upapadyate tadā vandhyāsutepy ananubhūtatvāviśeṣāt smārtā buddhiḥ kiṃ na kalpyata iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:1296: atra svātantryaparijihīrṣayā tatkārikā upakṣipann āha -- tathā cāhe[23.19]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:1298: tasya ekaliṅgini [23.28] gatir yugasahasreṣu bahuṣv api na vidyata [23.29] iti sambandhaḥ kāryaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:1304: asāmānyasya svalakṣaṇasya anavagatam eva liṅgaṃ liṅgijñānaṃ kariṣyatīty āha -- nace[23.23]ti
GSP28dhebta_u:1311: kiṃbhūtāl liṅgāt sāmānyajñā^6nasaṃhitāt sāmānyajñānayuktāt sāmānyātmanā jñātād iti yāvat |
GSP28dhebta_u:1313: jñāyamānasyānumeyatvam, pratyakṣeṇa tvanmate sāmānyāgrahaṇād iti bhāvaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:1314: tasya liṅgasya sāmānyasyodbhavas tadudbhavo [23.26] liṅgenāpareṇety arthāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:1315: tenāpi sāmānyarūpatayā anumānāntarād eva jñātena tathābhāvya^7m ity abhiprāyeṇāha -- anumānāntarād eva jñātene[23.27]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:1316: astv evaṃ kā kṣatir ity āha evaṃ ce[23.27]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:1317: nanv evaṃ liṅgānumānasyaivānantyaṃ na tu liṅgyanumānasya tat kathaṃliṅgyanumānānām ity uktam iti cet |
GSP28dhebta_u:1324: nanu ca sāmānyarūpasya liṅgatve tasya cānumānenaiva grahe na pratyakṣatas tanniścaya upapadyata ity abhidhātari katham idamācāryīyaṃ sadhūmetyādinā pratyakṣatas tanniścayasyopavarṇanaṃ yujyata ity āśaṃkyāha evaṃ manyata [23.30] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:1327: ayam artho -- vijātīyavyāvṛtter anyasya sāmānyasyābhāvāt vijātīyavyāvṛttyavagama eva sāmānyāvagamaḥ
GSP28dhebta_u:1328: vāsanādvayanibaddhaś ca vikalpaḥ svapratibhāsam eva niyataṃ bahīrūpatayā sādhāraṇatayā pratipadyamāno bāhya eva vijātīyavyāvṛttyā mayā pratīyata iti manyata iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:1332: atha yadi prakṛtibhrānto 'yaṃ vikalpas tarhi kathaṃ tasya atadvyāvrttavastuprāpakatvalakṣaṇaṃ saṃvādakatvam ity āha liṅgavikalpasya
GSP28dhebta_u:1333: kasmāt punar vikalpābhāsasāmānyasya liṅga(ṅgatvam) na tu dhūmādisvalakṣaṇasyety āha nahī[24.6]ti
GSP28dhebta_u:1337: avaśyaṃ hi kiñcid anumitsatā dhūmādisvalakṣaṇadarśanottarakālam -- "idaṃ sādhyam idaṃ sādhanam" iti saṃkalayitavyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:1338: sati cāsmin saṃkalpe sataḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgitayā vastudarśanābhāvāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:1341: tataś ca katham svalakṣaṇadarśanāśrayo ^4gamyagamakabhāvo bhaved yena kalpitadharmadvārako gamyagamakabhāvo [na bha]ved iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:1345: ata eva sa eva mūle sthāpitaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:1346: nanu yadi pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvināpi vikalpena sāmānyaṃ pratīyate,
GSP28dhebta_u:1348: viṣayaḥ" iti virudhyetety āśaṃkyāha yat tūktam i[24.9]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:1351: evam api kim artham avadhāryata ity āha svalakṣaṇeti [24.12] |
GSP28dhebta_u:1352: svalakṣaṇaṃ viṣayo grāhyatvena naiva bhavatīti pratipādayitum ity arthaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:1353: pūrvapakṣadvayapūrvakaṃ phakkikāyāḥ samudāyārthaṃ vyākhyāyāvayavārthaṃ vyākhyātuṃ tatra [24.13] ādi[?]śabdād ekavināśe sarvavināśādisaṅgrahaḥ "pratyakseṇa dṛṣṭavataḥ" {p. 271} ity asya tātparyārtham āha na tvi[24.26]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:1354: kathaṃ punar asya tathāmananam anupapannam ity āha nahī[24.27]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:1358: sābhāvasaṃvittibhantareṇa^7 natarāṃ prasiddyatīti kathaṃ pratyakṣeṇa tathāgrahaṇam upavarṇyata iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:1360: tathāhi bhinnam abhāvam icchatāpi vastūnāṃ svarūpaṃ parānanupraviṣṭam avaśyaiṣṭavyam, anyathā prātisvikām evaṃ tadabhāvasyaivāyogānām (?) |
GSP28dhebta_u:1363: tāvat khalv abhāvasaṃvittir nāsti tadā^8tmavad yāvat kevalagraho na bhavet |
GSP28dhebta_u:1364: tāvac ca kevalagraho nāsti yāvat nābhāvasaṃvittir iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:1365: kiñca yathā kevalo 'bhāvo 'paraṇābhāvena vinā pratīyate tathā bhāvopy antareṇāparābhāvaṃ kevalaḥ kiṃ na mīyeta |
GSP28dhebta_u:1372: tathābhā(tathā bhā)vopi naivañ ced anavasthā prasajyate ||" iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:1373: kathaṃ nirviṣayasya vikalpasya yathādṛṣṭabhedasya paramārthaviṣayatvam ucyata ity āha[49]niścayetyādi
GSP28dhebta_u:1385: evaṃ tubhaṭṭā^3rcaṭena kathaṃ na vyākhyātam iti na pratīmaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:1386: pramāṇalakṣaṇasāmānyena yogam upadarśya pramāṇaviśeṣasya pratyakṣasyāpi lakṣaṇena yogaṃ darśayann āha sad iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:1388: cakṣur indriyāpekṣayā granthasyāsya yojanāyāṃ tu indriyasya nāyanaraśmyavayavina indriyasyānu^4mānasiddhasya
GSP28dhebta_u:1389: saṃbhāradaṃśena saṃyoge saṃbandhe saty asya vikalpasya nītopanityātmano bhāvād iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:1393: na punaḥ pratipādyapratipādakayor buddhisāmyaviṣayo dṛṣṭānto bhavitum arhati |bauddhasyai^5vam aniṣṭer bādhakābhidhānāc ceti |
GSP28dhebta_u:1395: ādyami[25.12]ty etad vyācakṣāṇa āha ādau [25.14] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:1398: yasyārthasyetyādinā svalakṣaṇenāsādhāraṇasyaivopalakṣaṇād asādhāraṇaviṣayaṃ svalakṣaṇam iti vyācaṣṭe |
GSP28dhebta_u:1401: nanu ca tasyāsaṃkīrṇarūpatā [na] svataḥ kiṃ tv abhāvāṃśasadbhāvāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:1402: tat katham evam abhidhīyata ity āśaṃkya kāraṇam āha tathāhī[25.26]tyādi |
GSP28dhebta_u:1405: parābhāvo na siddhyet parātmava^7d iti bhāvaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:1407: sā [26.1] saṃkīrṇarūpatā kathaṃ na yuktimatīty āha svahetubale[26.2]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:1410: nanu tena tasya saṃkīrṇarūpasya vināśa[ne] parābhāvena sarveṣām eva
GSP28dhebta_u:1411: bhāvānām udayakṣaṇād ūrdhvam abhāvād abhāvaika^8rasaṃ jagat syād iti
GSP28dhebta_u:1412: prasaṃjayituṃ yuktaṃ na bhū(tu) tena saṃkīrṇarūpavināśena[50]varaṃ
GSP28dhebta_u:1418: iha khalu bhāvānāṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgitvepi sadṛśāparāparakṣaṇodayād vastusantānaviṣayā pratītir asti na tv abhāvaviṣa[16a] ^ 1yaiva |
GSP28dhebta_u:1421: udayottarakālam avyavadhānena vastuviṣayā ca pratītiḥ katham upapadyeta yadi sa evābhāvaḥ pūrvasiddhaṃ saṃkīrṇarūpaṃ vināsyād anyasaṃ(vināśyāty adasaṃ)kīrṇarūpam utpādayet |
GSP28dhebta_u:1422: sati caivaṃ varaṃ svahetor eva tathāvidhātām udayos tv ity ucyata iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:1423: hetutvenārthākriyākāritvena vasturūpatvād abhāva^2rūpataiva hīyetety etad upekṣe(kṣyai)va caitad uktaṃ draṣṭavyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:1426: prathamaṃ saṃkīrṇarūpāṇām utpādobhyupeyate paścād asaṃkīrṇarūpāṇām udayam upagantum -- kā punar atra hānir ity āśaṃkyāha kimi[26.5]tyādi |
GSP28dhebta_u:1427: kaścit kila parivrāḍaśucau patitaṃ {p. 279} modakaṃ karaṇa gṛhṇan kenacit sotprāsaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ " kim aśucer modakam udgrhṇāsi" iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:1432: yathā ca tatra tanmatam "atraiva tyaktavya evāyam" tadā kim aśucim
GSP28dhebta_u:1433: rakṣitasyānnasya grahaṇena, varam ayaṃ pūrvāvasthāne nai(e)vāstu ity upālambhas tathātrāpi
GSP28dhebta_u:1434: yadi tv abhāvata evāsaṃkīrṇarūpāṇāṃ paścād utpādo
GSP28dhebta_u:1437: tatas tathāvidho(dha)sya pramāṇaprasiddhau cāyam upālambhābhiprāyo draṣṭavyaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:1439: pratykṣabalena [26.13] ity asya tātparyārthaṃ darśayann āha -- yadi tu [26.13] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:1443: tathā saty api smṛtir na syāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:1444: vyāptigrāhakapramāṇānadhigatasya viśiṣṭadeśādivartitad asādhāraṇarūpasya grahaṇād iti bhāvaḥ
GSP28dhebta_u:1445: "anyarūpam idaṃ na bhavati" itya(tī)yam abhāvapratītiḥ kena pramāṇeneṣṭā yenāsyāḥ prāmāṇyam ācāryeṇa nivāryata ity
GSP28dhebta_u:1447: kasmāt punar etat pratītijanakatvenānyad a[bhā]vākhyaṃ pramāṇaṃ na bhavati, eṣā ca tatphalam ity āha nahī[26.20]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:1455: anadhigamād iti [27.10] vastuno viśeṣaṇatvenāgrahaṇād iti draṣṭavyam
GSP28dhebta_u:1458: a(nya)thā "nirvikalpakabodhena dvyātmakasyāpi vastuno grahaṇam |" (Ślokavā. p. 118) ityādi virudhyeta |
GSP28dhebta_u:1466: atha mā bhūt sāmānyam arthakriyāsādhanaṃ vyaktis tāvat tatsādhanībhavati |
GSP28dhebta_u:1467: [16b] ^ 1tadadhyavasāyitayaiva ca vidhivikalpaḥ pramāṇaṃ kiṃ na bhavatīty āśaṃkya na tatra prāmāṇyam iti [27.24]
GSP28dhebta_u:1475: yena tvayaivam ucyata ity āha tataḥ param i[27.19]tyādi |
GSP28dhebta_u:1478: tatoyam arthaḥ -- yasmād evam ucyate pūrvapakṣavādinety arthāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:1479: evam abhidhāne 'pi kathaṃ tadadhyavasāya ukto bhavatīty āśaṃkyāha tatreti [27.21] |
GSP28dhebta_u:1480: jātim atiriktām adhigacchato 'sya prāmāṇyaṃ bhaviṣyatīty āśaṃkyoktam
GSP28dhebta_u:1481: evārtham adhikavidhānārtham anuvadann āha jātes tv iti [27.24] |

GSP28dhebta_u:3086: 'py abhidheyasya niyamahetutvāt bāhyāṅgaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ cābhidhānābhidheyayor abhedavivakṣayā sākṣāt pāraraṃparye[34b] ^ 1ṇa
GSP28dhebta_u:3088: "tāvaddhi dhūmādivastu na liṅgaṃ yāvad vahnyādināntarīyakatayā na niścīyate, dharmiviśeṣe ca kvacin nopalīyate |

GSP28dhebta_u:3090: na ca pacamyantena "dhūmād" ityādinā śabde[na] tasya tannāntarīyakatvaṃ pakṣe ca sattvaṃ kathyate
GSP28dhebta_u:3092: ^2tat kathaṃ pratijñārthasādhanasamarthaliṅgābhidhāyitvaṃ tasya śabdasya yena "tadabhidhāyī śabdo hetuḥ" ity ucyate, sa tathā bāhyāṅgam iti cocyate "hetur anumānam" iti sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ tathā kalpeteti |

GSP28dhebta_u:3094: ata evāyaṃ na sarvaḥ pratyakṣa [72.12] iti |

GSP28dhebta_u:3108: atrāpy upamānaṃ niyamahetutva(tvaṃ) dharmiṇi vā sādhanadharmasya saṃbhavaṃ bodhayadasaṃbhavaṃ nivartayati yatpramāṇaṃ tanniyāmakam astīti upanayopi niyamahetumattvād bhāgāntaram" iti tad api pratyākhyeyaṃ dvividhasyāsya varṇitasyopamānasyāprāmāṇyād eva^7 kathaṃ niyāmakam? yenopanayanasya niyamahetukasiddhyā {p. 322} bhāgāntaratvaṃ siddhyet |
GSP28dhebta_u:3109: dharmiṇi ca sādhanadharmasya sambhavaṃ pariccheda(cchidya) pratyakṣam anumānaṃ vāsaṃbhavaṃ nivartayatīti atrāpi pratyakṣaṃ niyāmakam astīti dṛṣṭāntavad upanayopi pratyakṣam iti vaktavyaḥ kvacid anumānasyāpi tathātvād anumānam ity apīty alam atārkikavacanani^8rbandhena |

GSP28dhebta_u:3116: prayogo na tu dha[35a] ^ 1rmiṇi liṅgasya sattvapratipādanārthaḥ |

GSP28dhebta_u:3119: anityaḥ śabda iti pratijñopādānepi tadanantaram eva yad yad kṛtakaṃ tat sarvam anityam, yathā ghaṭas tathā cāyaṃ kṛtaka ity ukte sādhyapratītau kiṃ nimittākāṃkṣopaśa^2mo nāsti? yena pañcamyantasya liṅgābhidhāyina eva tadupaśamaḥ prayojanaṃ varṇyeta |
