GSP28dhebta_u:3226: sarvarūpaśūnyasya hy abhāvasya he^5tusa(ma)ttā virudhyate na tvasyeti bhāvaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:3227: yadīdaṃ bhavatām apīṣṭaṃ tarhi kasmād asmanmataṃ nābhyupeyata ity āha
GSP28dhebta_u:3230: etasmin parābhiprāyepy evaṃ bruvāṇo niyatam evaṃ [78.26] vakṣyamāṇakaṃ manyate [78.23]vārtikakāra iti cārthāt sarvasyendhanādeḥ [78.26] tathābhāvaḥ pradhvastatvaṃ ^6gavādes tathābhāvaḥ [78.27] pradhvaṃsarūpatvam iti draṣṭavyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:3231: dvayam apy etad yatrakurvan (?) paraḥ prāha |
GSP28dhebta_u:3233: anena dṛśyamānāṅgārādibhāvena sarvam indhanādi nivartata iti na sarvasya pradhvastatvaṃ nāpi gavādau satīndhanādi nivartata iti na gavādeḥ pradhvaṃsarūpateti pareṇa darśitam |
GSP28dhebta_u:3237: bhāvarūpāvyaktatābhāva [79.15] iti bruvāṇas tathātmakābhāvarūpatā yāvad vyavasthāpyatām abhāvaikarasatvāt pratipatteḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:3238: na tu bhāvarūpāvyaktatāpattau pramāṇam astīti darśayati |
GSP28dhebta_u:3239: etad eva darśayann āha yadi hī[79.16]tyādi |
GSP28dhebta_u:3244: "lakṣaṇahetvo[ḥ] kriyāyāḥ" (Pā. 3.2.126) iti hetau śatu(?)r vidhānāddhetupadam etat |
GSP28dhebta_u:3245: {p. 326} nanūktayā nītyā nāśasya tatkāryatopapatteḥ katham etad
GSP28dhebta_u:3246: ācāryeṇoktam ity āśaṃkyāha ayam abhiprāya [80.16] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:3247: syān matam pra[36b] ^ 1tītiviṣayopi na ca tatra pratītilakṣaṇārthakriyākārī |
GSP28dhebta_u:3248: yathā sādhyābhāve hetvabhāvarūpo vyatireko vikalpena pratīyamānaḥ na vikalpasya |
GSP28dhebta_u:3249: kārakaś ca katham ucyate? na hy akāraṇaṃ viṣayo atiprasaṅgād iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:3250: naitad asti sākṣāt kārapravṛttajñānābhiprāyeṇa tad ukter na tatra vyabhicāro 'sti |
GSP28dhebta_u:3253: ata evāha[106]tadviṣayasya [80.24] vā kathaṃ hetumattāvagatir iti vā sāmarthya[107]samaṃgitā sāmarthyayogitā bhāvatā [80.27] vastutā,
GSP28dhebta_u:3258: ^3anena jñātaheturūpatayā pratibhāsanaye cāmīṣāṃ pratiṣṭhitena rūpeṇa pratibhāsanam iti pareṇa darśitam |
GSP28dhebta_u:3262: sarvasāmarthyśūnyatālakṣaṇenābhāve doṣāntaram anvācinvann āha sarvarūpavivekasya ceti [71.9]
GSP28dhebta_u:3264: cakṣurādīnāṃ pratiṣṭhitarūpāvabhāsanasadbhāvāvabodhārtham teṣāṃ jñānaheturūpatayā pratibhāsanād iti pareṇeritaṃ tadabhāvepi śakyaṃ^5
GSP28dhebta_u:3266: pūrvaṃ tv atra gajanimīlikāṃ kṛtva anyad uktam |
GSP28dhebta_u:3270: yadi nāmāsya jñānaviṣayatā tathāpi na taddhetutā tat kathaṃ taddheturūpatayāvabhāsanaṃ tulyam ucyata ity āha ahetoś ce[81.12]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:3272: yady abhāvo nāma nāsty eva bhavanmate tarhi amūrabhāvabuddhayaḥ kamālamberann ity āha -- asmākaṃ tv i[81.12]ti
GSP28dhebta_u:3277: sad iti pratya^7yāviṣayasya na bhāvateti bruvatā yad asadātmakatvam asyopagataṃ
GSP28dhebta_u:3278: tatra kiṃ svarūpeṇāsan kiṃ vā pararūpeṇeti pakṣayor ekaṃ bhāvaṃ dūṣayitum āha -- na cāsye[81.24]ti
GSP28dhebta_u:3280: na ca {p. 327} bhāvābhāvayor yaugapadyam upapadyate kadācit |
GSP28dhebta_u:3281: na hi jīvata eva maraṇam iti
GSP28dhebta_u:3283: dhvaṃsena vināśaś ca kriyamāṇaḥ kiṃ tadātmā tato
GSP28dhebta_u:3284: 'nyo mṛṣā bhāvāntararūpo vā tuccharūpo veti tatra ye vikalpāḥ tatra
GSP28dhebta_u:3285: tṛtīyasmin vikayyaṃ bhavatu[108]cāyaṃ [81.26] tatas tadbhāvepi nimittīsyādi(kim itītyādi)dūṣaṇaparihārayor ābhīkṣaṇye cānavasthāv abhi(sthābhi)prāyavān āha tataś cānavastheti [82.6] |
GSP28dhebta_u:3289: dṛṣṭaṃ caitat sarvatra sahetuke 'nyatraiti darśayann āha śālī[82.9]tyādi
GSP28dhebta_u:3292: |kṣaṇabhaṅgasiddhau tu vistareṇa tataś ca vistararucina tata
GSP28dhebta_u:3294: sāpy asmadīyākṣaṇabhaṅgasiddhir apekṣitavyeti abhiprāyavān āha vistarataś ce[82.14]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:3295: syād etat "na bhavaty eva kevalam" ity anena^2 kim agnyādisaṃyogakāle tasya svarūpābhāvaḥ pratipādyate kim vā tadanuvṛttiḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:3296: na tāvat tadanuvṛttir akṣaṇikatvaprasaṅgād aśabdārthatvāc ca |
GSP28dhebta_u:3297: abhāvapratipādane ca pūrvoktā doṣāḥ prasajyerann iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:3299: parasaṃkucitakālasthāpyutpattikāla eva sa dvitīye kṣaṇe na kiñcid iti yadrūpaṃ bhāvasya tatpratipādyate^3
GSP28dhebta_u:3301: ata evāha nāsyābhavanam anyad vā bhavatīti [82.18] |
GSP28dhebta_u:3302: mā bhūd agnisaṃyogādir nāśasya kartā kiṃ naścchinaṃ yadi parahetur asti -- ity āha [a]kartur
GSP28dhebta_u:3303: sa khalu tasya karttā vyayate(paṭhyate) yaḥ prāgbhāvī sannarthāntaraṃ svānvayavyatirekāv anuvidhāpayati yathā cakṣurādi vijñānasya |
GSP28dhebta_u:3306: agnyādibhāve ca bhavanadharmaṇaḥ kasyacid bhā(cid abhā)vāt kartṛtvābhāve katham iva
GSP28dhebta_u:3307: tallakṣaṇam hetutvam eva saṃgamyata iti caivāṃvaditur abhiprāyaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:3310: sū[110]cyagreṣu sthātum aśaktaḥ sarṣapa [82.26] iti yojyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:3329: abhedasya vā [84.26] prasaṅga^7 iti prakṛtatvād yojyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:3330: nanu yadi bhedābhedau caikāntikau syātāṃ syād a[na]ntarokto doṣaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:3331: yāvatā tayor api kenacid rūpeṇa bhedaḥ kenacid abheda ity āśaṃkamāna āha -- tayor apī[84.26]ti
GSP28dhebta_u:3336: [85.1] anyathā yadi tābhyāṃ tasyābhedanimittasya rūpāntarasya kathañcid bhedo na syād aikātmyaṃ yadi syād ity arthaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:3337: sa cāsāv abhedanimittaikasvabhāvaś ceti tathā tasmāt [85.1] |
GSP28dhebta_u:3339: ekātmyapakṣe abhedanimitte rūpāntare vā tābhyām avasthātadvadbhyām anupraveṣṭavyaṃ tayor vā [37b] ^1tenābhedanimittena rūpāntareṇa |
GSP28dhebta_u:3340: tatra yadi tayor abhedanimitte rūpāntare anupraveśas tadābhinnarūpamātrasya bhāvād avasthātadvator abheda eveti bhedasya vārtāpi na syāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:3341: atha tasyābhedanimittasya rūpāntarasya tayor anupraveśas tadāvasthātadvantāv evāvasthitāv ity apagatam abhedeneti |
GSP28dhebta_u:3342: evaṃ tarhi tasyāstu tābhyāṃ kathañcid bheda ity āha -- ^2rūpāntarasye[85.3]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:3350: kathañcid bhedonyathā tadaparaikasvabhāvād atyanta^3m abhedād avasthāvasthātrabhedanimittarūpāntarāṇāṃ prāktanena nyāyenatyaṃtaṃ bhedābhedau prasajyeyātām |
GSP28dhebta_u:3352: 'vaśyaiṣitavye tannibandhanam aparasyāpi rūpasyāparaṃ rūpam upaitavyam iti
GSP28dhebta_u:3353: | tathā tadanyatrāpy evam evety aparimitarūpataivaikasya [85.4] syāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:3358: na pratyakṣā satī pratyabhijñā bādhyate kiṃtu bādhyamānā pratyakṣābhāsā seti |
GSP28dhebta_u:3368: {p. 329} na cā(ce)yam avasthā kāryavijñānātiriktaṃ jñānaṃ janayati yena jñānalakṣaṇāyām arthakriyāyām asyopayogāt sāmarthyaṃ kalpyety abhiprāyeṇa
GSP28dhebta_u:3375: ekarūpābhāve kathaṃ tattvādhyavasāyaḥ syāt sarveṣām ity āśaṅkyānyathaivāsyopapattim upasaṃhāravyājena darśayan^7 āha
GSP28dhebta_u:3378: tena nirantarasya sadṛśasyāparasya bhāva[86.3]s tannirantaranibandhanety arthaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:3382: nanu yadi ākārasya sāmyaṃ^8 sādṛśyaṃ nāma tvanmate kiñcit syāt tanmātrāpahṛtahṛdayāḥ pratyabhijānīyuḥ
GSP28dhebta_u:3383: na caitad asti, tat katham evam
GSP28dhebta_u:3389: trayāṇām api rūpāṇāṃ pramāṇasiddhatvāt [38a] ^1svataṃtrahetur iyaṃ vyāpakānupalabdhiḥ [87.7]
GSP28dhebta_u:3392: tāvad asya bādhakatvaṃ na bhavati yāvat pratyabhijñānasyāprāmāṇyaṃ na siddhyati, anyathā anenaiva bādhyamānaviṣayatvād asya kathaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ yena bādhakatvaṃ syāt? tāvac ca tasyāprāmāṇyaṃ nopapadyate yāvad anumānasyāsya prāmāṇyasiddhyābodhakatvaṃ na si^2ddhyati |
GSP28dhebta_u:3393: itarathā bādhavarjitatvādilakṣaṇasambhave prāmāṇyāpracyutir itītaretarāśrayatvaṃ doṣa ity āśaṅkyamānam āha
GSP28dhebta_u:3396: yadi vā liṅgasyety adhyāhāryam avacane ca pramāṇalakṣaṇayukte bādhasambhave tallakṣaṇam eva dūṣitaṃ syād iti sarvatrānāśvāsa ity ābhi^3prāyaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:3397: {p. 330} naivaṃ brūmahe [87.17] kintu pratyakṣābhāsā satī cārthād avatiṣṭhate |
GSP28dhebta_u:3398: anumānasya virodho bādhas tam aśruvānā [87.20] vyāpnuvatī bhajamāneti yāvat |
GSP28dhebta_u:3407: atha kiṃ "na ca sa pakṣe kvacid vartata [88.19]" ity asiddhatve kāraṇam idam uktam? evañ cet na tarhīyantaṃ kālaṃ bhavān buddhavān
GSP28dhebta_u:3408: asiddhalakṣaṇam, pakṣavṛttyādinā prakāreṇa hetos tathābhāvād iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:3409: yuktam avādīd idaṃ bhavān yadi paraṃ tadāyam asiddho hetur i[88.18]ti vaditur abhiprāyaṃ nājñāsīt
GSP28dhebta_u:3410: ayaṃ khalv asyābhiprāyaḥ ^5pratyabhijñā nāma vikalpaviśeṣa eṣaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:3411: sa ca vikalpasya viṣayo yaḥ śabdasya viṣayaḥ,
GSP28dhebta_u:3413: sa ca śabdasya viṣayo yaḥ saṃketasya viṣayaḥ, vācyavācakabhāvasambandhasya vāstavasya vyudastatvāt
GSP28dhebta_u:3414: na cāsāmārthyavaiyarthyābhyāṃ svalakṣaṇātmani saṃketaḥ kartum śakyata iti kathaṃ vastu^6to bhāvāḥ kecid abhi(pi) pratyabhijñānaviṣayātma(tmā)naḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:3416: yad yat pratyabhijñāyate tat tat pūrvāparayoḥ kālayor ekasvabhāvaṃ yathedam ititathāgatān pratipādayitum aśakyatvāt vyāptyasiddhyānaikāntikaś cāyam iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:3419: yad vā dūṣaṇāntaram anvācinvann āha -- na ce[88.19]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:3421: yadi sarveṣāṃ janakasvabhāvatā tasyāṃ cānyāpekṣitā syāt syād
GSP28dhebta_u:3426: prakṛte tava kim āyātam ity āha -- tadvad i[89.10]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:3428: bījādibhiḥ anekānta iti maulasya hetor iti draṣṭavyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:3429: {p. 331} na saha[89.22]śabdo yugapadarthavṛttirācāryeṇeṣṭo 'pi tu sahodaravad ekārthavṛttiḥ
GSP28dhebta_u:3430: api tu ekārthakaraṇam api [114.19] yadvarṇam iti kiṃ sahakārilakṣaṇaparvaṇi pratipādayiṣyate
GSP28dhebta_u:3431: na ca yugapatkāritvād eva bhāvānāṃ parasparasahakāritvaṃ ghaṭate |
GSP28dhebta_u:3434: tat kathaṃ "sahakāriṣu yugapatkaraṇaśīleṣu" [89.22] ity etadbhaṭṭārcaṭo vyācaṣṭa iti
GSP28dhebta_u:3436: na hi sahaśabdasya etad vyākhyānaṃ yugapad ity api tu bhāvikāraṇānabhyupagame avaśyam ekārthakāriṇām ekadā karaṇam ity ekārthaṃ buddhāvāropya vāstavaṃ rūpam idam anūditam |
GSP28dhebta_u:3438: ekārthakāritvam eva tu lakṣaṇaṃ na tu yugapatkaraṇam avaśyaṃbhāvyapi vyabhicārāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:3440: nanu lābho mahānayam iti, na ca kācid akṣamā |
GSP28dhebta_u:3442: kaḥ punas tatretareṣāṃ vyāpāra ity āha -- bhavaneti[90.3] |
GSP28dhebta_u:3453: rūparūpiṇor ananyatvād ity abhipretya rūpabhedalakṣaṇātvā^4d ity u[91.4]ktam |
GSP28dhebta_u:3455: yatra sthitena kāryaṃ janayitavyaṃ sa kāryadeśo [91.12]bhipretaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:3456: yaś cāsāv abhiprāyaś ceti tathā tadvatā [92.3] |
GSP28dhebta_u:3457: nanu sarveṣāṃ aṅkurotpāde sāmarthyāpracyuteranekāṅkureṇa niyatam utpattavyam eveti yat pareṇa prakaṭitam tat katham evaṃbruvatāpahastitam ity āśaṃkyāha ayam abhiprāya [92.4] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:3459: ukte sati kim nāma pratīyatām iti tatsvabhāvasya jananād ity asyānaikāntikatve maulasyāpi tathātvamanivāryam iti parasyāśayaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:3460: na kāraṇabhedāt kāryabhedaḥ syād i[92.18]ti prasaṅge kāryābhedasya bādhake pareṇokte katham etat tadbādhakaṃ bhavatīty āśaṃkyāha evaṃ manyata
GSP28dhebta_u:3475: dharmavacanasya saṃkaraśabdasya bhāvād asaṃkarād a[93.23]sāṃkaryād ity arthaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:3488: yadi vā vitarke nuśabdaḥ kiṃśabdas tu praśne |
GSP28dhebta_u:3491: anekasya bhāve teṣām anena(ka)janakatvam ity upagate hṛdayanihitaśaṅkarasvāmicodyaḥ kaścin nanv i[94.12]tyādinā codayati |
GSP28dhebta_u:3497: teṣām avāntarasāmagrībhedād bheda iti pratipādayituṃ teṣām
GSP28dhebta_u:3501: vijñānādi sahakārikāraṇam evam anyatrāpīty e^3kam upādānakāraṇam itarat sahakāri kāraṇaṃ kṛtvā sāmagrīṇāṃ vailakṣaṇyam īkṣitavyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:3510: samanantaraśabdaḥ samaś cāsau bodharūpatvenānantaraś cāvyavahiteneti vyutpattyāpi prakṛtatvānmanaskāra eva draṣṭavyo na tv
GSP28dhebta_u:3513: na cakṣurāder niyamena vyāpāra [95.4] ity arthāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:3516: janyatayā yat svavijñānaṃ tasya yogyatārthād utpattur yā yogyatā taddhetoh [95.5] |
GSP28dhebta_u:3522: uktayor lakṣaṇayor ādyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ durbodhatvād upasaṃhāravyājena spaṣṭayann āha -- tasmād
GSP28dhebta_u:3535: tato naivaṃ vaktum ucitam ity āśaṃkyāha na ce[95.16]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:3537: kecit punar atraivaṃ bruvate, naivedaṃ lakṣaṇadvayam upapadyate avyāpteḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:3538: tathāhi yadi yad ekākāraparāmarṣapratyayanibandhanatayā svasantatipatitakāryapasūtinimittaṃ tadupādānakāraṇam ity ucyate, tadā candrakāntādapāṃ prasave jyotsnā na syād upādānakāraṇam yadi
GSP28dhebta_u:3539: candrakānta[39b]ḥ 1ḥmaṇerupayatīnāmapāṃ candrikayā samam ekākāraparāmarśapratyayahetutvam asti yena tathā tayā tāsāṃ
GSP28dhebta_u:3542: evam vanaspatibhyaḥ phalaprasūtau tvagbhāvā[117]viśeṣasya na syāt tadupādānatvam |
GSP28dhebta_u:3543: ^2kiyad vā śakyate nidarśayituṃ diṅmātraṃ tāvad upadarśitam |
GSP28dhebta_u:3544: dvitīye 'pi lakṣaṇe 'nenaivāvyāptitvam unneyam, na hi candrikāder avādimātrotpattau niyamena vyāpāraḥ śakreṇāṣi śakyate
GSP28dhebta_u:3547: cakṣurāder api tādṛgvijñānotpāde niyamena vyāpāra iti tasyāpi tathātvaprasaktir iti yat kiñcid etat |
GSP28dhebta_u:3549: siddhasaṃtāna eva hi vastuni prāgavasthāpekṣaviśeṣahetutvaṃ kasyacit kalpyeta |
GSP28dhebta_u:3551: santānāpekṣakasya tu prathamakṣaṇasyotpāde katham evam abhidhānaṃ [na]
GSP28dhebta_u:3553: atra tu samādhānamatadbhi(naṃ mahadbhi)r eva vidheyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:3562: anyonyāsahitasvabhāvāni kāraṇāntarasahitāni [96.1] santi yāni kāryāṇīṣṭakādirūpāṇi [96.1] sādhayanti nirvartayanti |
GSP28dhebta_u:3563: mṛtpiṇḍasya carmakārādikāraṇapratilambhe satīṣṭakādikāryaṃ, kulālasya dātrādipratyayāntaraprāptau lavaṇa(nā)dikāryam |
GSP28dhebta_u:3565: tāny api kiṃ bhūtāni sādhayantīty āha tadanye[96.1]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:3567: vyagrāvasthāprāptakāraṇāntarasādhyebhyo vilakṣaṇam eva ghaṭātmakaṃ kāryaṃ samagrāṇi santi janayanti [96.3] mṛtpiṇḍakulālasūtrāṇīti sāmagryupalakṣaṇam uktaṃ na punar iyanti eva ghaṭasya kāraṇāni |
GSP28dhebta_u:3570: nany yadi^7 kulālādisahito mṛtpiṇḍas tadanyasamāgrīmadhyapraviṣṭamṛtpiṇḍakāryād aviśiṣṭaṃ kāryaṃ janayanti, na tarhi sāmagrivailakṣaṇyāt kāryavailakṣaṇye nidarśanam idam upapadyata ity āśaṃkyāha kulālādīti [96.4] |
GSP28dhebta_u:3571: tadātmakam eva [96.6] mṛdātmakam eva ghaṭādilakṣaṇam eva karoti |
GSP28dhebta_u:3574: kuto vilakṣaṇaṃ ^8karotīty āha tatkāryād apīṣṭakāder iti [96.7] |
GSP28dhebta_u:3576: kevalamṛtpiṇḍād bhinnaḥ svabhāvo yasya mṛtpiṇḍasya sa tathā tasya bhāvas tattā tayā [96.7]
GSP28dhebta_u:3578: na tu kāraṇāntarasāhityavyavacchedas tena tatkāryād i[96.7]ti
GSP28dhebta_u:3582: tasya kulālasyārthāt kulāla[kṣaṇa]lakṣaṇasya pratyāsīdato yatkāraṇaṃ prāktanakṣaṇas tenāhita utpādito viśeṣo [96.6] viśiṣṭaṃ rūpaṃ yasya sa tathoktaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:3585: | co [96.6] vyaktam etad ity asminn arthe |
GSP28dhebta_u:3589: janakatvaṃ pratipādya sahakāraṇasyāpy ubhayatra sahakāribhāvenaiva vyāpriyamāṇasya kulālāder upādānāntaraprāptau tadanyasahitakāryād vilakṣaṇakāryajanakatvam atidiśann āha -- evam i^3[96.8]ti
GSP28dhebta_u:3590: tadanyopādānasahitaṃ [96.8] mṛtpiṇḍalakṣaṇād upādānād yad anyad upādānaṃ tena sahitam |
GSP28dhebta_u:3592: tasmāt tadanyopādānasahitakāryād visadṛśam eva ghaṭādikaṃ kāryaṃ janayati [96.10]
GSP28dhebta_u:3593: | iti[96.10]r yathā mṛtpiṇḍādītyāder ācāryīyavākyasya yaḥ samudāyārthas tasyākāraṃ darśayati^4
GSP28dhebta_u:3597: pṛthu[96.15]śabdena viśeṣaṇasamāsaṃ kṛtvā tasyodarā[96.15]dīti tatpuruṣaṃ vidhāya tad iva tasyeva vākāro [96.15] yasyeti bahuvṛīhiḥ kāryaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:3598: ādiśabdāt tadavayavāntaraviśeṣasya bhinnajātīyasya kambugrīvāde^5r vā saṃgrahaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:3599: sūtrāt ta[96.17]syaiva ghaṭasya [96.18] cakrāder vibhaktaḥ svabhāvo bhvatīti [96.21] sambandhaḥ
GSP28dhebta_u:3605: anyad eva sūtrasāhi^6tyepi tayoḥ kathaṃ tajjananasvabhāva[tva]m ity āha tannirapekṣe[96.20]ti
GSP28dhebta_u:3606: tacchabdena sūtraṃ parāmṛṣyate,[118]bhinnasvabhāvatvād vilakṣaṇasvabhāvatvāt tannirapekṣāvasthāto bhinnasvabhāvataiva tayoḥ katham ity apekṣāyāṃ sūtrakāraṇopahitaviśeṣayor i[96.20]ti hetubhāvena viśeṣaṇapadam idaṃ
GSP28dhebta_u:3608: nirdiṣṭa^7kāraṇābhiprāyeṇa kāraṇatraya[96.24]grahaṇaṃ na tu ghaṭasya trīṇy eva kāraṇāni
GSP28dhebta_u:3609: tadupayogair bhinnasāmagrīvyāpāraiḥ kāryāpekṣasva(ye sva)bhāvaviśeṣāḥ kāryāṇāṃ viśiṣṭāḥ svabhāvās teṣām asaṃkaro '[96.24]sāṅkaryam |
GSP28dhebta_u:3610: tatra yadi te kulālādayah pratyekaṃ janakāḥ syus tadānukrāntakāraṇatrayajanya [96.21] ity ucyeta |
GSP28dhebta_u:3611: tathāpi kathaṃ sarvataḥ samutpa^8dyamānasyākhaṇḍātmanaḥ kāryasyāyaṃ viśeṣo 'smād ayañ cāsmād iti vyavasthāpyata ity āśaṃkyāh tasya caikaike[96.25]tyādi |
GSP28dhebta_u:3613: 'stu kāryasya tatsāmagrībhūtasakalajanyatvaṃ tadgatasya tu tatadviśeṣasya kathaṃ tajjanyatvavyavasthety āha tadekaikasa[jā]tīti [96.27]
GSP28dhebta_u:3615: 1 anenaitad darśayati -- naikasyām eva sāmagryāṃ tasminn evākhaṇḍātmani kārye tattadviśeṣasya tattajjanyatvam avadhāryate api tu tattadupacaye tat tad upacayatya tattadapodhāre tattadu(da)pacayasya
GSP28dhebta_u:3617: vyavahartāraś caivaṃ na vipañci(ści)ta iti tattvacintakai[96.29]r
GSP28dhebta_u:3619: teṣām apy evaṃ ^2vivecanena kiṃ prayojanam ity āha yata [96.29] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:3621: anekam api kāraṇaṃ kasmāt svīkurvantīty āha paraspare[97.1]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:3626: "yatra yadyogyaṃ rūpa^3m upapadyate sa tasya viṣaya" iti tadviṣayasya [97.14] ghaṭasyety arthaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:3631: "tajjanitaviśeṣabhedasye"ti mūlasya kārya[97.17]padaviśeṣaṇasya bahuvrīhau kartavye vigraho darśitaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:3637: tathāpi kasmān na yuktam ity apekṣāyām āha --
GSP28dhebta_u:3639: nāsti, ekatvād eva pramāṇasiddhād ity abhiprāyaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:3643: atha vijñānopajanane kim indriyādīni svalakṣaṇāntarāntarāprasavadharmāṇyapetasaṃtānāny eva yenaikasyaiva kāryasya karaṇam eṣām upavarṇyate |
GSP28dhebta_u:3645: nanu ekasāmagrī[98.6]śabdena yadi vijñānasya janakaḥ kāraṇakalāpo
GSP28dhebta_u:3646: 'bhipretaḥ, tadoktam eva kim apetaṃ(ta)saṃtānatā teṣām iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:3647: athaikam upādānam itaratsahakārikāraṇam abhisandhāya ekasāmagrīty uktaṃ na tad api caturasram, tasyā apy avāntarasāmagryāḥ kiṃ tadupādānopādeyasyāiva kṣaṇasya prasavaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:3649: haṃta tad api sarvaṃ svaṃ svam upādānam apekṣyopādeyam eveti tad avastho doṣa iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:3650: uttara(ukta) eva ekasāmagrīśabdārthaḥ kaivalaṃ bodhe yatraḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:3651: ekam upādānaṃ sad evetaratsahakārikāraṇasad eva vyāpriyate yadā tadā ekasyaiva vijñānasya manaskāropādānasya cakṣurādisahakārikāraṇasyaiva sata utpa^8ttir na tu cakṣuḥkṣaṇasyaivaṃbhūtasya sa[ta] utpattir api tu cakṣur upādānasya manaskārādisahakārikāraṇasya sata iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:3653: atra samudāyārtho manaskāropādānakāraṇacakṣurādisahakārikāraṇātmikā satī sāmagryekam eva kāryaṃ janayati |
GSP28dhebta_u:3654: tadaivānyajjanayantī tu naivam ātmikā satī ja[41a] ^
GSP28dhebta_u:3658: ata evaiṣām āntarasāmagrībhedaḥ kṛtaḥ parasparato bheda ity uktaṃ purastād iti sarvam avadātam
GSP28dhebta_u:3659: kasmāt punar iṣṭaikasāmagryapekṣayaivaitad ucyate, na ca sāmagrīmātrāpekṣayāpīty āha paramārthatas tv i[98.6]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:3660: tatsāmarthyantargatānā^2m i[98.7]ti sā ca sā cakṣurādisahakārikāraṇātmikā sāmagrī ceti tathā yatropādānabhāvenāntargatānām antarbhūtānāṃ yatra sāmagryāṃ sahakāritvena teṣāṃ vyāpāras tatra tatsāmagryantaraṃ tadavayavatvena |
GSP28dhebta_u:3661: kāryāntarasye[98.8]ti sopādeyakṣaṇāpekṣayā tadvijñānaṃ cakṣuṣaḥ kāryāntaram evam anyasyāpy anyat tasya kāryāntarasyāpi prārambhād ity anuvartate ^3anekakāryakartṛtvam iti ra(ca) śeṣaḥ kāryaḥ anyathā
GSP28dhebta_u:3664: tadā [98.10] tadvad anekapratyayajanitam apī[98.9]ty ekam ity asyānuvṛttes
GSP28dhebta_u:3670: kāryānekatvopagame 'pi na kācit kṣatir i[98.9]ti sambandhaḥ kāryaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:3671: kasmān na kṣatir ity āha -- tatsāmagryantargatānām i[98.7]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:3673: itis tv anantaroktānyopādānakāraṇāni sahakārikāraṇāni pratyavamṛṣati, tatoyam artha uktalakṣaṇakāraṇānekatvād
GSP28dhebta_u:3675: saṃprati prakṛtam upasaṃharann āha tata [98.10] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:3678: atha siddhasādhanatvaṃ hetoḥ ko doṣa iti cet
GSP28dhebta_u:3681: dravya[98.16]śabdena dravati paryāyān gacchatīti vyutpāttyā dharmo pariṇāminityo vivakṣitaḥ ^6paryāyaśabdena ca pari samantādetyeti dravyam iti vyutpattyā dharmāḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:3683: ghaṭo dravyaṃ rūpādayaḥ [98.19] paryāyā iti dravyaparyāyayor etad udāharaṇam itiḥ saṃkhyābheda[98.19]syākāraṃ darśayati dvitīyas tu saṃjñābhedasya |
GSP28dhebta_u:3688: cakṣurādīnām abhinno ya ātmā ekakāryajanakaḥ sāmānyabhūtas tajjanyatā tasya [98.26] |
GSP28dhebta_u:3690: sāmānyena pararūpāṇāṃ ātmābhedasya bo(syābā)dhakatvaṃ pratijñāya viśeṣeṇedānīṃ darśayitum āha -- saṃkhyābhedas tāvad i[99.7]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:3699: iti cet yatra bahuvacanaṃ "jātyākhyāyām ekasmin bahuvacanam anyatarasyām"
GSP28dhebta_u:3701: na ca paryāyarūpeṇa bhidyanta [99.16] iti bruvatā ca yadi saṃkhyābhedo 'nekatvasya sādhakaḥ syāt tadā tadabhedopy ekatvasya sādhakaḥ syāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:3703: na caivaṃ tasmāt saṃkhyābhedo na samartho 'nekatvaṃ sādhayitum iti darśitaṃ draṣṭavyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:3705: anena saṃjñābhedād ity asya saṃdigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttyānaikāntikatvaṃ darśitam |
GSP28dhebta_u:3706: saṃprati sādhāraṇānaikāntikatvam api darśayann āha ekasminn api ceti[99.19] atra gajanimīlikayā pūrvadoṣo draṣṭavyaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:3712: tattadavasthārūpeṇa pariṇamato 'vasthānaṃ pariṇāmanityatā tadupagamāt [100.1] sā ca [100.1] pariṇāmanityatā |
GSP28dhebta_u:3716: iyaṃ pariṇāmanityatā |[119]kūṭasthanitya^4tā dravye paryāyātirikte na saṃbhavati [100.4]
GSP28dhebta_u:3720: vibhaktapariṇāmeṣv i[100.12]ti pāṭhe vibhaktaḥ pariṇāmo yeṣām iti vigrahaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:3721: vibhakto viśiṣtakāryakāritvena niyukta iti cārtha iti pūrve nibandhakṛto vyācakhyuḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:3722: idānīm api kecit paṇḍitāṃmanyā anenaiva pāṭhena katham api vyācakṣate |
GSP28dhebta_u:3724: ^5vibhakti[kta]śabdasyānyārthatvāt, na hy ayaṃ vibhaktaśabdo viśiṣṭakāryakāritvena niyuktaṃ vakti |
GSP28dhebta_u:3726: kiñ ca kim asya śabdadāridyaṃ yena viśiṣṭakāryakāripariṇāmeṣv iti vaktavyaṃ vihāya idam īdṛśam avācakam ācakṣīta |
GSP28dhebta_u:3727: sarva eva ca pariṇāmas tadanyakāryāpekṣayā viśiṣṭakāryakārīti ko 'nyasmād a^6sya
GSP28dhebta_u:3728: paṭādipariṇāmasya viśeṣaḥ, kaścāsya niyokteti kim asthānaparākrameṇa |
GSP28dhebta_u:3732: paraprasiddhyā cedam ucyate tac ca dīrghatvākhyam utpādyam atra vivakṣitam
GSP28dhebta_u:3733: | tatra vibhaktaṃ vibhāgena^7 vyavasthāpitam parimāṇam yeṣāṃ paṭādīnāṃ teṣu vistāriteṣu dīrghīkṛteṣv iti yāvat |
GSP28dhebta_u:3734: vibhaktāyām ādikarpaṭādayaḥ kiñcid āvṛṇvate kiñcic ca dhārayanti kiñcid upabadhnantīti |
GSP28dhebta_u:3736: hetau ca śaturvidhānāt pūrvam abhāvā(bhava)t kasyacid bhāve bhāvā(bhava)d
GSP28dhebta_u:3738: bhavet kāryam iti tu pāpīyān pāṭhaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:3739: yadi^8 parasparopādānāhitarūpaviśeṣas tatsāmagryantargataḥ sarva eva kṣaṇaḥ pratyekaṃ samartha utpadyate |
GSP28dhebta_u:3740: yato vijñānādiprasūtis tena tāvad avaśyaṃ jñānajananasvabhāvenaiva bhāvyam, avijñānajananasvabhāvenaiva
GSP28dhebta_u:3741: na tu parasparaviruddhatadatajjananasvabhāvena bhedaprasaṅgādity abhiprāyavān paraścodayann āha nanv i[100.24]tyādi |
GSP28dhebta_u:3751: nanu tatsannidhau vijñānalakṣaṇakāryadarśanāt vijñānasyaiva ^2janaka ity avadhāraṇāt tadavasthe doṣa kasmād idam ucyata ity āha tatre[101.5]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:3752: anainaitad āha dharmamātrasya saṃdehād ayogavyavaccheda evātra nyāyaprāpto nānyayogavyavaccheda iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:3753: nanu ca yena rūpeṇa vijñānaṃ vijñānaṃ janayati yadi tenaikarūpeṇaiva rūpaṃ janayati tadā tenāvaśyaṃ tadvijñānavadbodhātmanā bhāvyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:3754: atha tadanyena rūpe^3ṇa janayati tarhi viruddharūpadvayānuṣaṅga ity āśaṅkyāha na cāta [101.7] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:3756: kasmān na syād ity āha -- ekasyaive[101.7]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:3759: anenaitad darśayati ekenaiva rūpeṇa tattajjanayati ^4kevalaṃ tad ekaṃ rūpamīdṛgvijñānāvijñānajananam iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:3760: etad uktaṃ bhavati tatsāmagryantargatānāṃ sarveṣām eva kṣaṇānāṃ svahetubhir idaṃ rūpam upanītaṃ yaduta yūṣmatprāgbhāve 'nekenaiva bodhābodhātmakena kāryeṇa janitavyam iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:3761: evaṃ tarhi vijnānābhinnahetujatvena {p. 340} sukhādīnāṃ bodhātmakatvaṃ duḥkhasādha[katva]māpanīya^5(pa)nnam
GSP28dhebta_u:3762: tatrāpi hīdaṃ śakyate vaktuṃ proṣitāgatapriyaputrādikṣaṇasya svahetusamūhād eva tathābhūtaṃ rūpam upa(da)pādi yena vijñānam avijñānātmakaṃ ca sukham anyac
GSP28dhebta_u:3766: avadhīritāvadhāraṇanirūpeṇā^6ktāv uktam adhunā puraskṛtāvadhāraṇoktāv iti bhedo draṣṭavyaḥ
GSP28dhebta_u:3771: bhinnapravṛttinimittayor ekasminn arthe vṛttiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam teṣāṃ tannimittānāṃ tadayogād ekatraiva vṛttyanupapatteḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:3775: pratibandhābhāva eva kuta ity āha -- tadgrāhaketi tadabhāvam eva
GSP28dhebta_u:3779: pratyakṣeṇaivam upalambhān na tāvat pratyakṣaṃ tatpratibandhasādhakam ity arthād darśitam
GSP28dhebta_u:3780: yenānumānena kāryabhedasya kāraṇānekatvapratibandhaḥ sādhyate tatrāpi [101.20] etac caikasāmagryantargataviśiṣṭaikaikakāraṇāpekṣayā draṣṭavyam na tu kāraṇamātrāpekṣayā kalāpāt kalāpotpatter iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:3783: ^1ekasyānekarūpatvam asmābhir abhyupetaṃ syāt pramāṇopapannaṃ tadā dharmisvabhāvatayaiva taducyetety abhiprāyeṇoktam ekasyānekasvabhāvatāyā eva cintyatvād i[101.25]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:3784: anyatheti yadi yenānekenaiva(ka)svabhāvatām anubhavati tad eva paraṃ bhidyate |
GSP28dhebta_u:3785: na tv asau dharmīti iti[102.3]r hetau |
GSP28dhebta_u:3786: ekaṃ kāryaṃ yasyānekasya tad ekakāryaṃ tasya bhāvas tattā [102.4]
GSP28dhebta_u:3788: tasyaiva kāryasya yadātmapuraskāreṇa dharmiparyāyavyavasthā tena bhedād evaikarūpatvābhāvād iti samudāyārthaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:3789: nanu naivāsmābhir ekam anekaṃ karotīty ucyate yena tvayaivam ucyeta,
GSP28dhebta_u:3790: kintu samagrāvasthāyāṃ tadekaikam eva tadekaikam upakalpayatīty āśaṃkya na caike[102.6]tyādi prathamato yojyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:3793: etaddoṣabhayāt parasparopādānakṛtopakārāpekṣatve ceṣyamāṇe teṣām ekaikena bhāvatastāvataḥ kṣaṇasyopakārāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:3794: katham ekam anekakāryakṛn n syād iti cānena darśitam |
GSP28dhebta_u:3796: gatārtham apy etat kaṇṭhoktaṃ kurvann āha |
GSP28dhebta_u:3798: anabhyupagamād evaikasyānekakriyāvirahād uktayā nītyānekasyāpy ekakriyāvirahād iti cārtho draṣṭavyaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:3801: nanu ca ekasyānekakāritvaprakārād anekasyaivaikakāritvaprakārāt kilānyaḥ prakāro nāstī^5ty abhimatam |
GSP28dhebta_u:3802: asti khalv anekam evānekaṃ karotīti prakrāntaṃ tat katham etat saṃgasyata iti cen na |
GSP28dhebta_u:3804: sarvvasyaivopādānasahakāribhāvena sajātījavijātīyaviśiṣṭakṣaṇārambhasya nyāyaprāptasyopagamād ekasyānekakriyopagamaprāpter ity abhiprāyā^6t sarvam avadātam |
GSP28dhebta_u:3807: tau caikasvabhāvāv ekaṃ vastv iti katham ekasyānekakāryakāritvam anunmattena pratikṣipyata ity abhiprāyavān āha
GSP28dhebta_u:3809: anyathā yadi ^7vastuno 'nyaḥ svabhāvaḥ syāt tasya [102.15] vastunaḥ evaṃ svabhāvasyāpy avastutāprasaṅgādity api draṣṭavyam yenābhiprāyeṇa kathaṃ nonmattaḥ [102.14] ity avādīt tam idānīṃ sphuṭayann āha ekasvabhāvatve ce[102.16]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:3810: yadā hi tūlapiṇḍādidravyaṃ dvipiṇḍakadravyanirmāṇasamaya eva kākatālīyanyāyena pavanāvadhūtatūlāṃśuprabhṛtinā svalpaparimāṇena ^8dravyāntareṇa saṃyujyate
GSP28dhebta_u:3815: karma ca tathābhūtāṃ kriyām ekadaiva karotīti dravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ samavāyikāraṇaṃvaiśeṣikair avśyaipitavyam ity abhiprāyo 'syaivaṃ vaditur avasātavyaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:3817: kintūtpanne kārye paścāt kāraṇād utpadyate ata evaikasmin kṣaṇe dravyam arūpam asparśam arasam agandham upagamyateyogaiḥ| tasya tu guṇasyotpadyamānasya
GSP28dhebta_u:3818: samavāyikāraṇaṃ tad evānantarotpannaṃ dravyaṃ na tu tatkāraṇaṃ dravyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:3819: evaṃ tāvad idam asmābhir yathā kathañcid upapāditam, ^2karmaṇaś caikasyeti tu saṃyogasaṃskārāpekṣayopapādayituṃ śakyate na punaḥ
GSP28dhebta_u:3821: na hi kutaścid api karmaṇo yugapat saṃyogavibhāgāv utpadyete kintu prathamaṃ vibhāgas tataḥ prācyasaṃyogavināśas tadanantaram u?arasayoga iti padārthavidaḥ prajānate |
GSP28dhebta_u:3824: | anyathā kim asti karma kim asti saṃyogādir yenaivam ucyeta |
GSP28dhebta_u:3826: abhinnakālaṃ ca kāryaṃ vicārayituṃ prakṛtaṃ na tu bhinnakālam iti kiṃ bahunā |
GSP28dhebta_u:3827: etac cavaiśeṣikaśailīmanupālayanto yadi kecana nipuṇā manīṣiṇo yathāśruti
GSP28dhebta_u:3828: samarthaya^4nti kāmaṃ samarthayantu na no hāniḥ kācid api tu mahāneva
GSP28dhebta_u:3831: na tu sajātīyā vijātīyāḥ samastā vyakrīrvyaśnuvīrann i[102.25]ty arthaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:3836: deśakālasvabhāvabhedānāṃ madhye deśakālābhedasyābhedasādhane sādhāraṇānaikāntikatvaṃ pratipādayann āha tathāhī[103.4]tyādi^5 |
GSP28dhebta_u:3839: dvitīyaḥ punar api [103.6] avadhāraṇe rūpatety asmāt
GSP28dhebta_u:3841: anuvṛttivyāvṛttirūpate[103.6]ti dravyasyānuvṛttirūpatā paryāyāṇāṃ vyāvṛttirūpateti yathākramaṃ yojyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:3842: pratyekam iti prativastvaty artho draṣṭavyaḥ na tu pratyātmeti |
GSP28dhebta_u:3844: tad ayam artho yadi prativastu dravyaparyāyayor anuvṛttivyāvṛttirūpataivopagamyata ity anyonyavyāvṛttisvabhāvadvayāviṣṭaṃ ghaṭapaṭavatpadārthadvayaṃ syān na tv ekaṃ dvirūpam |
GSP28dhebta_u:3849: anuvṛttivyāvṛttyos tatsvabhāvatvam upetyaitad uktam etad eva tu nāstīti darśayann āha -- na
GSP28dhebta_u:3851: ihābhipretam yad anantaraṃ vyaktīkariṣyate tatas tayos tatsvabhāvatvāyogāt
GSP28dhebta_u:3852: | tatsvābhāvatvam evānayoḥ kathaṃ na yujya^8te yanaivam ucyata ity āha --
GSP28dhebta_u:3856: bhāvayadvā(yan vā) utpattimān dharmas tattvena bhavitā dharmī tadadhīnatvāt na tu tattvād iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:3857: yady ekakāryakartṛtvād ekatvaṃ tarhi anekakāryakartṛtvād anekatvaṃ syāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:3858: anyathā tadyo(tadayo)gāt na caivam iṣṭaṃ yuktaṃ vā tasmād etad api viparyaye bādha[43b] ^ 1kābhāvān na vaktum ucitam ity abhiprāyavān āha ekasyāpīti [103.22] |
GSP28dhebta_u:3867: anantaroktayā vacanabhaṅgyā saṃdigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttyānaikāntikatvaṃ sūcayitvā sampratyekavijñānaviṣayatvād ity asya sādhāraṇānaikāntikatvaṃ khyāpayitum āha bahūnāñ ceti [104.1] |
GSP28dhebta_u:3868: nanu yady ekaṃ dvirūpanneṣyate kathaṃ tarhi tad ekaṃ vijñānaṃ bodharūpaṃ nīlākāraṃ cotpadyata ity ucyata iti parasya vacanam āśaṃkyā^3ha[123]kiṃtv iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:3871: anena vyāvṛttibhedam upādāya tathocyate na tu vāstavaṃ dvairupyam iti darśitam |
GSP28dhebta_u:3875: dṛṣṭāntam eva vighaṭayann āha sa hī[104.8]tyādi |
GSP28dhebta_u:3877: avayavinaḥ pramāṇabādhitatvād ity abhipretya paramāṇusaṃhā(ghā)tarūpa [104.8] ity uktam |
GSP28dhebta_u:3881: anenaiva saṃmūrcchitatvābhāvena śabalarūpatvāsiddheḥ sādhanaśūnyo dṛṣṭānta iti darśitam |
GSP28dhebta_u:3883: bhāgaśabdapravṛttir na tu paraprasiddhā tasyāvayavābhiprāyeṇa avayavyārambhasyānabhyupagamāt
GSP28dhebta_u:3884: saṃprati bhavatu narasiṃhabhāgābhyāṃ narasiṃhāvayavino nirmāṇaṃ tathāpi tasya śabalarūpatvāsiddheḥ sādhanaśūnya eva dṛṣṭānta iti darśanād darśayitum āha jātyantaraṃ ce[104.10]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:3886: tā^6su hy avasthāsu sa evāyaṃ nara ity anuvṛttipratyayahetor naratvajāter ūrdhvatāsāmānyaśabdābhilāpyāyās tāsu cāvasthāsu siṃhaḥ siṃha ity
GSP28dhebta_u:3887: anugābhipratyayahetoḥ siṃhatvajātes tathābhūtāyā anyā tāsu tāsvavasthāsu sa evāyaṃ narasiṃha ity anuvṛttapratyayahetubhūtā tathābhūtaiva jātir jātyantaram avaseyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:3888: ^7sa [104.10] iti sāmānādhikaraṇyena nirdeśaś ca tasya tadvataś cābhedavivakṣayā samudāyavivakṣayā vā draṣṭavyaḥ
GSP28dhebta_u:3889: |digambaramatasya ca prakṛtatvāt evaṃ vyākhyāyate tena hi tiryaksāmānyam neṣṭam upariṣṭāc ca etadbhaṭṭārcaṭenāpi sphuṭayiṣyate |
GSP28dhebta_u:3890: nāpi tiryaksāmānyam atra kalpayituṃ yuktam, narasiṃhasya tathābhūtasyaikatvāt anekavṛ^8ttitvāc ca sāmānyasyeti |
GSP28dhebta_u:3892: ayam asyāśayo yadi saṃmūrcchitatvaṃ tyaktvā yathā kathañcid anekarūpatvenāpi śabalarūpatocyate tathāpy ekatvābhāvasya nyāyaprāptatvān naikasya (śabalarūpatocyate) |
GSP28dhebta_u:3893: tathāpy ekatvābhāvasya nyāyaprāptatvān naikasya[124]) śabalarupatvaṃ iti [44a]
GSP28dhebta_u:3895: avaśyaṃ hi śābalyam icchatā vaicitryaṃ nānārūpatvam eṣtavyam ity abhiprāyeṇāha (vaicitryaṃ nānārūpatvam eṣtavyam ity abhiprāyeṇāha[125]) vicitryaṃ hī[104.11]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:3897: co(no)papadyate kathaṃ tarhi lokaḥ śabalam idam iti manyata ity āśaṃkyāha
GSP28dhebta_u:3907: dharmaś ca pūrvaṃ kṛtakavicāreṇa pāramārthiko nirastas tadapekṣo dharmy api vāstavo vyudasta ity abhiprāyeṇa dharmadharmīṇor niṣedhād i[104.18]ty uktam |
GSP28dhebta_u:3908: {p. 344} anantaroktam arthajātaṃ sātirekaṃ svakrtābhiḥ kārikābhiḥ pratipādayituṃ paramukheṇāha -- āha ce [104.20]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:3912: tatra saṃjñābhedasya tāvad bhedakatvaṃ pratibadhnann āha
GSP28dhebta_u:3915: bahuvacanena vyāptim āha tat tasmāt kena
GSP28dhebta_u:3920: śabdānāṃ vastugocaratvaniṣedhadvārā ca saṃjñābhedasyābhedakatvaṃ pratipādayato 'yam āśayo yadi punaḥ śabdā vastuvṛttyā indriyajñānānīva
GSP28dhebta_u:3921: bāhyaviṣayā abhaviṣyan niyatam ime anyonyabhinnarūpāḥ santo locanādicetāṃsīva rūpādīny arthān svasvaviṣayā^5n abhetsyanta iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:3926: tat ta[104.28]smād yadi saṃjñābhedād bhedaḥ [104.28] kalpitasyaiva bhedo bhaved iti yo^6jyam
GSP28dhebta_u:3927: kalpitabhede kiṃ vastubhedo na bhavatīty āha vyāvṛttibheda [105.1] iti
GSP28dhebta_u:3928: | arthākṣiptam eva kaṃṭhoktaṃ kurvann āha na vastuna [105.1] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:3929: nanu kim ekadvivacanabahuvacanāny eva saṃkhyā yena tadbhedaḥ saṃkhyābhedaḥ (saṃkhyābhe[126]da) ucyeta |
GSP28dhebta_u:3932: adyai(?)vaikatvādirūpā saṃkhyā tadabhidhāyakaṃ tu vacanam ata eva
GSP28dhebta_u:3934: syād evaitat yady ekādivyavahārahetuḥ saṃkhyā ekadravyānekadravyā vā pramāṇabādhitā na syāt
GSP28dhebta_u:3936: asti tu tathābhūtasaṅketānurodhād ekādivacanam evaikādivyavahāranibandhaham ity anenābhiprāyeṇoktam naivānyo mato vacanabheda [105.2] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:3940: kalpanāviparivartino rūpasya na tu vastuna [105.4] iti dūrastham iha
GSP28dhebta_u:3944: kutaḥ punaḥ siddham etad vacanabhedātmakaḥ saṃkhyābhedaḥ, sa cābhedaka ity āha -- yeṣām
GSP28dhebta_u:3953: yadi vā tadātmakā iti hetubhāvena viśeṣaṇaṃ tena tadātmakatvāt kiṃ kasmād dravyāvināśe nāśina [105.6] ity arthaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:3955: uktadoṣa(ṣaṃ) nirācikīrṣoḥ pa^2rasya vacanamā[śaṅkamā]na āha naṣṭā [105.7] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:3960: dravyasvabhāvato 'nyasvabhāvatā teṣāṃ kim asti? pṛcchataś cāyam abhiprāyo yaś.anyasvabhāvatā teṣāṃ bhavet svabhāvabhedena svabhāvābheda eva na bhaved iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:3962: siddhāntavādyevaitad doṣadarśino 'nyasvabhāvatāniṣedham āśaṃkamāna āha na ced iti [105.8]
GSP28dhebta_u:3966: paryāyāḥ paryāyarūpeṇa naṣṭā na dharmirūpeṇety evam ātmanā kathaṃ nāśaḥ [105.8] |
GSP28dhebta_u:3967: no ced iti tu kvacit pāṭhaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:3968: tatrāpi naṣṭāḥ paryāyarūpeṇa dravyasvabhāvena no^4 cet [105.8] na yadi prakṛtāś ca paryāyāḥ kartṛkatvenābhisaṃbadhyante |
GSP28dhebta_u:3969: etad āśaṃkya siddhānty evāha kim anyarūpatā teṣāṃ i[105.8]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:3971: śrutatvāt, dravyasvabhāvād anyasvarūpatā teṣāṃ kim astīty arthaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:3973: anugāmirūpaṃ dravyam udayavyayayoginas tu paryāyā aikātmyañ ca dravyaparyā^5yāṇām ahrīkaiḥ kiṃ neṣtaṃ?
GSP28dhebta_u:3983: hetau śaturvidhānāc ca paścād bhāvād ity arthaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:3985: {p. 346} anena ca prakāradvayena tādātmyahāpanena bhinnarūpāṇāṃ eṣāṃ
GSP28dhebta_u:3986: tena saha sambandhābhāvāt taddharmatvam eva ca na syāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:3987: tataś ca prakṛtakṛtidarśitam atraiva vaktavyāntaraṃ samuñcinvann āha bhūta... kim iti [105.10] tatra dravye bhūtaṃ jātaṃ kiṃ? dravyaparyāyayor aikātmyena dravyasthitau paryāyāṇām api niyatā sthitir iti na kiñcid bhūtam ity abhisandhiḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:3989: abhiprāyam aviduṣaḥ parasya vacanam āśaṃkamāna āha bhede[105.11]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:3990: bhidyanta iti bhedāḥ paryāyā eva ^8tadrūpaṃ bhūtaṃ yadāṣyate [105.11] |
GSP28dhebta_u:3992: hiravadhāraṇe bhinnam ity asmāt paro draṣṭavyaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:3995: paryāyāḥ paryāyarūpeṇa naṣṭā na dharmirūpeṇa, sthite ca tasmin bhedarūpaṃ bhūtam iti ceti
GSP28dhebta_u:3996: asaṃbaddhatvam evāsya pūrvasāmarthyoktaṃ kaṇṭhoktaṃ kurvann āha[128]evam i[105.14]ti naṣṭaṃ ca tad an[45a] ^ 1ṣṭaṃ ceti tathā |
GSP28dhebta_u:3998: tadaitat prasajyata iti pārśvasthasyāviditaprastāvasya praśnam āśaṃkyāha -- dravye[105.15]tyādi
GSP28dhebta_u:3999: yasmād uktayā nītyā lakṣaṇabheda eva siddhas tataḥ [105.16] tasmāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:4001: kāryabhedāt tayoḥ svabhāvasya bhedo yadi bhavet [105.17] |
GSP28dhebta_u:4003: svabhāvabhede sati avaśyaṃ hi bhedam icchatā svabhāvabheda evaiṣṭavyo 'nyathā bhedāsiddheḥ
GSP28dhebta_u:4004: sati ^2caivaṃ kim akiñcitkaraḥ kāryabhedo bhedasiddhyartham ucyata iti
GSP28dhebta_u:4007: svabhāvasya bhedaka iti kiñcitkara evāpi(evopa)nyāsārho 'pi ca tat kim
GSP28dhebta_u:4008: evam ucyata ityāsaṃkyāha na hi [105.20] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4009: hir yasmāt kāryāṇāṃ bhedaḥ paścāt prakaraṇāt svahetvāgatasyābhinnasvabhāvasya paścādbhavanasvabhāvasya tasyaiva svahetubalāyātasyābhinnasya na bhedakaḥ
GSP28dhebta_u:4010: [105.20] hetau śaturvidhānāt paścād bhāvād ity arthaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:4011: prāgbhāvī hi kāraṇaṃ tadbhinnaṃ svabhāvaṃ kuryād api, na tu paścād bhāvīty abhiprāyaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:4012: paścād bhavann api kasmān na bhedaka iti? āha svabhāvasyeti [105.21] |
GSP28dhebta_u:4013: nanu kāryabhedaḥ svahetusamutthaṃ svabhāvaṃ mā nāma vikārṣit tadavasthe vikārāyogāt, tam eva tu vināśayi^4ṣyatīty āha nāśeti [105.21] |
GSP28dhebta_u:4014: yadi cāyaṃ kāryabhedas tayoḥ svabhāvasya bhedakaḥ syāt tad ayaṃ doṣaḥ syād iti darśayann āha {p. 347} te dravyaparyāyātmake vastunī [105.22] |
GSP28dhebta_u:4015: syād etat -- syād ayaṃ doṣo yadi bhedaḥ paścāt
GSP28dhebta_u:4016: prakaraṇāt svahetvāvage(tvāga)tasyābhinnasvabhāvasya paścād bhavansvabhāvasya tasyaiva svahetubalāyā^5 tasyābhinnasya na bhedakas
GSP28dhebta_u:4018: yāvatāsty abhinnopi svabhāvas tatas tayor abhedopīty āha sa ceti [105.22] |
GSP28dhebta_u:4021: kutaḥ punar asau tayor na syād ity āha -- vibhinnābhyām i[105.23]ti parasparabhinnābhyāṃ dravyaparyāyābhyāṃ abhinnasyābhi^6nnasvabhāvasya kalpitasya tasya |
GSP28dhebta_u:4031: evaṃ pañcamādāv api saiva vārtetyādinā bhinnasvabhāvasyāsambandhaniścayaparipanthinya[na]vasthā syāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:4032: nanu kim a[na]vasthābhayād dṛṣṭānekasvabhāvāpalāpaḥ kartavyaḥ ity āha
GSP28dhebta_u:4034: syād etat syād ayaṃ doṣo yady abhinnasya svabhāvasya dravyaparyāyābhyāṃ bhedo 'py upagamyeta
GSP28dhebta_u:4035: kintv abheda^8 evety āha aikāntikas tv i[105.29]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4036: bhinnayor dravyaparyāyayor abhinnāsvabhāvād abheda aikāntiko yadi bhaved iti yojyam, bheda eva tayor viśīryeta
GSP28dhebta_u:4039: tasmād ekasmāt svabhāvād avyatirekas tayor ity arthāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:4045: kalpitābhinnasvabhāvayos tādātmyopagame tasya vā tayor anupraveśa eṣitavyas tayor vā tatreti
GSP28dhebta_u:4046: tatra yadi kalpitasya svabhāvasya dravyaparyāyayor anupraveśas tadā tāv eva svarūpeṇa vyavatiṣṭheyātāṃ na tv asāv iti so 'sankathaṃ tatsambandhī syāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:4047: nanu ca nāsau svabhāvas tayor upalīyamānas tadabhedā^2nubhāvī kiṃ tarhi teṣām abhedasiddhyartham abhinnasvabhāvo 'nyo 'bhyupagamyate ity abhiprāyasya parasya vacanam āśaṃkamāna āha teṣām atrāpi doṣāntaram upekṣyaivānavasthāṃ darśayann āha tathe[105.26]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4048: atha dravyaparyāyayos tasminn abhinne svabhāve 'nupraveśas tatrāha aikāntikas tv i[105.29]tyādi iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4051: kintu svata evābheda ity āha abhedasye[106.1]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4056: kasmāt punar bhedābhedāv ekātmakau na syātām ity āha anyonye[106.3]ti
GSP28dhebta_u:4058: ekasya bhāvo [106.4] vidhir aparasyābhāvā niṣedho yas taddhetuko yataḥ
GSP28dhebta_u:4060: yadi viruddhadharmādhyāso bhedavyavasthāṅgaḥ (ṅgaṃ) syān naikatra bhedābhedau bhavetām |
GSP28dhebta_u:4061: sa eva tu na bhedavyavasthānimittam ity āśaṃkyāha anyonyābhāvarūpāś ce[106.4]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4065: tenāyam artho yadi viruddhadharmādhyāso bhedavyavasthāṅgaṃ neṣyate, tadaivaṃ na syāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:4066: evaṃ ca kathaṃ syāt evaṃ ca kasmān neṣtavyam iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4067: tadrūpāḥ santopi na bhedino [106.5] bhinnāḥ syur virodhasya
GSP28dhebta_u:4071: dravyaṃ hi paryāyarūpeṇa naśyati, na tu dravyerūpeṇetyahrikair iṣyate |
GSP28dhebta_u:4073: sarvathaiva tasya vināśaḥ kinneṣyata ity arthaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:4074: kathaṃ nāma dravyam eṣtavyam ity ākāṃkṣāyāṃ ṣikṣayann āha kūṭe[106.7]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4080: pariṇāmanityatā dravyeṣu kasmād iṣteti sāmarthyād āveditam |
GSP28dhebta_u:4081: astu tarhīṣtā kūṭasthanityatety āśaṃkyāha tad iṣṭāv i[106.9]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4083: atra doṣāntaram upekṣyaiva etad āha kinne[106.9]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4084: yathottarottarasarvaparyā^8yānugāmisuvarṇatvādy ekaṃ sāmānyam iṣyate tattadbhinnadeśādisarvavyaktyanuyāyisuvarṇatvagotvādy ekaṃ kiṃ [106.10] kasmān neṣyate |
GSP28dhebta_u:4088: nanu yadi strītvasāmānyam abhipretyedam ucyate tadābhyupagama evottaram iti koyam
GSP28dhebta_u:4090: anyathā saṃketāvedinopi gāva iva tā api bhāryā ma[a]bhimatā vyaktyastenarūpeṇa sāmānyabhāsāṃ {p. 349} dhiyamādadhīran |
GSP28dhebta_u:4091: na caitad asti, tasmād ayuktam etad iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4092: śobhanam uktaṃ bhavatā kevalam evaṃ vaditur abhiprāyo na samyagjñāyi |
GSP28dhebta_u:4093: ayaṃ khalv asyābhiprāyo yenopādhyavacchinnena kenacid rūpeṇa tatstrītvaṃ tasyāṃ jāyāyāṃ vartamāna^2m enāṃ tathopabhogāṅgaṃ nopapādayati
GSP28dhebta_u:4094: vinaiva tāvad ātmanā jananyām api tena vartitavyamanyarūpābhāvāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:4095: sati caivaṃ tasyā api tathātvam āpadyeta; evam atrāpekṣayāpy ucyamānajāyāyā api tathātvam anivāryam |
GSP28dhebta_u:4096: yady evaṃ śābaleyabāhuleyādīnām apy ekagotvādiyogād ekatvaṃ kiṃ nāpādyata iti? priyaṃ priyeṇācaritam iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4097: udāharaṇa^3diṅmātraṃ tūktam etad upahāsāpadeśeneti sarvam avadātam |
GSP28dhebta_u:4098: evam uktayā nityā bhedābhedāv ekādhikaraṇau na yuktāv iti pratipādyādhunā bhavetāṃ tau tathā, tathāpy uktadoṣān na muktir iti pratipādayann āha bhedābhedoktadoṣāś ce[106.11]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4099: dravyaparyāyayor bhede hy ekāntena vibhinne te syātām |
GSP28dhebta_u:4101: suvarṇakuṇḍalādiparyāyayor aparasparātmatayā kuṇḍalādisuvarṇaviśeṣābhyāṃ tayor apratibhāsanaprasaṅgādayo doṣāḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:4105: sati caivaṃ viphalo 'yam ekasya bhedābhyupaga^5ma iti cārthād darśitam |
GSP28dhebta_u:4106: tayo[106.11]r bhedābhedayor iṣtau [106.11] kathaṃ vā na bhavanti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4107: pratyekaṃ bhāvān na samudāye bhavantīty āha -- pratyekam iti te [106.12]
GSP28dhebta_u:4109: nanu ca dṛṣṭam idaṃ yata ekaikabhāvino doṣāḥ samudāyāvasthāyāṃ na bhavantīty abhiprāyavān paraḥ prāha guḍaśceti [106.13] |
GSP28dhebta_u:4110: kevalo guḍaḥ ṣleṣmaṇor hetur nāgaraṃ śuṇṭhī ^6kevalaṃ pittasya kāraṇam [106.13] |
GSP28dhebta_u:4111: militayos tv anayos tau doṣau kasmān na bhavata iti prakaraṇād draṣṭavyamadhyāhāro vā kartavyaḥ
GSP28dhebta_u:4115: kevalāc ca nāgarād bhinnam eva viśiṣtā^7rthakriyākāri dravyāntaram idaṃ guḍanāgarā[106.14]khyam
GSP28dhebta_u:4117: na tu sa eva guḍo nāgarañ ca dve ime dravye |
GSP28dhebta_u:4121: viśiṣṭaśleṣmaharaṇādyarthakriyākāridravyāntaram idam udapādi tena pratyekabhāvī mama doṣo na bhavati |
GSP28dhebta_u:4122: bhavatas tu militāv api bhedābhedau dravyaparyāyalakṣaṇau tāv eveti kathan no(katham u?)bhayabhā^8vino doṣā na bhaveyur iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4123: athāstu dravyāntaram idaṃ tathāpi madhuratvāt kaṭukatvāc ca kathaṃ kaphapittakṛn na bhavatīti pārśvasthasya codyam pratikṣipann āha madhuram i[106.15]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4127: kena punar nidarśanena sarvaṃ madhuram eva(vaṃ) saṃbhāvayitum ayuktam ity ata āha yathe[106.15]ti
GSP28dhebta_u:4129: anena madhuratvād ity ayaṃ hetuḥ sādhāraṇānaikāntiko darśitaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:4131: kaṭukam vā sarvam iti neti syād iti cānuvartanīyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:4134: anenāpi kaṭukatvād ity asya sādharaṇānaikāntikatvaṃ darśayato 'yam
GSP28dhebta_u:4137: madhura(na) iva mādhuryaṃ kaṭukatvam api pippalyā ivānyad eva tena militāvasthāyāṃ na doṣadvayasambhava iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4138: yadi ca pratyekabhāvināṃ doṣāṇāṃ militāvasthāyāṃ guḍanāgarāder abhāvopadarśanenaitat pratiṣidhyate, tadā pratyekabhāvināṃ doṣāṇāṃ
GSP28dhebta_u:4139: samudāyāvasthāyām api bhāvadarśanāt kim asmad abhimataṃ
GSP28dhebta_u:4141: yadi vā samudāyāvasthāyāṃ teṣāṃ doṣāṇām asadbhāve sādhye pratyekabhāvitvād ity asya hetoḥ sādhāraṇānaikantikatvaṃ darśayitum āha -- pratyekam i[106.17]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4142: yat pratyetyekaṃ yasya kāryasya nidānaṃ [106.17] nimittaṃ svatas tad yadi svahetubalān mibhrama[106.17]nyasahitam evādhikaraṇam utpadyate tadā kiṃ ^4tatkāryakāri
GSP28dhebta_u:4143: tatra dṛṣṭam? [106.18] kṣepe kimaḥ prayogād dṛṣṭam evety arthaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:4144: sneho hi kaphahetur ūṣṇatvaṃ ca pittakṛddṛṣṭaṃ sahitāvasthāyām api te tatkāryakāriṇī dṛṣṭe yathā amūmāṣaṅgate, ata eva yathā māṣa [106.18] ity udāharati |
GSP28dhebta_u:4145: māṣo hi snigdhatvād ūṣṇavīryatvāc cobhayātmaka ubhayam eva kāryaṃ kaphapittalakṣaṇaṃ karotīti
GSP28dhebta_u:4146: nanu madhurarasād api madhuraḥ(naḥ) śleṣmā kasmān na jāyate kaṭukāyā api pippalyāḥ kuto na pittaṃ yenāsmad uktaṃ bhavatā vyabhicāryate |
GSP28dhebta_u:4147: tathāpy abhāve vā guḍānnāgarāc ca tau doṣau mā bhūtām iti parasya matam āśaṃkya dṛṣṭasyopapattiprakāraṃ darśayitum āha śaktyapekṣañ ce[106.19]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4148: yasmāt tena kāryeṇotpattavyam, tasya svopādānaśakti^6m apekṣata iti śaktyapekṣam [106.19]
GSP28dhebta_u:4149: kiṃ tatkāryaṃ mādhuryādi guṇamātraṃ nibandhanaṃ na bhavatīti praśne 'bhyupagama evottaraṃ kurvann āha -- guṇeti [106.19] |
GSP28dhebta_u:4150: ācāraviśeṣānavacchinnaḥ kevalo mādhuryādiguṇo guṇamātraṃ tad anibandhanam
GSP28dhebta_u:4152: śaktyapekṣatvepi kāryasya tasyāḥ sarvatra bhāvāt tadavastho [doṣa] ^7ity āha sarvatreti [106.20]
GSP28dhebta_u:4154: [106.20] śaktīnāṃ kiñcid eva kāryaṃ kasyacid eva janyatayā sambandhī bhavati |
GSP28dhebta_u:4155: ayam artho madhuratvāviśeṣepi kiñcid eva svahetusamudbhūtarūpaviśeṣaṃ yat tathākāryakāri na tat sarvam |
GSP28dhebta_u:4156: taddhetos tajjananaḥ svabhāvaḥ kutastya iti cet, svahetos tasyāpi tathety
GSP28dhebta_u:4159: vibha(bhi)nnatvādi^8doṣo hi bhedamātre prasajyamāno na bhedasya śaktiviśeam apekṣate |
GSP28dhebta_u:4160: na ca bhedasya {p. 351} viśeṣa eva saṃbhavati
GSP28dhebta_u:4163: tasmād guṇamātranibandhanaṃ yatkāryaṃ tad yathā sati tasmin bhavati |
GSP28dhebta_u:4164: tathā bhedābhedamātre saṃbhavino doṣā ye te tadbhāve kathaṃ na syur iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4166: sarvam idam uktam adhunā tu tādātmyād eva teṣām anivāryatvam āyātam iti pratipādayituṃ guḍanāgarādau pareṇa dṛṣṭāntīkṛte janyadoṣāṇām anyathaivānupapattim abhyupagacchann āha virodhī[106.24]ti virodhino nāgarādeḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:4167: sannidhis tasmād virodhiśunyād guḍāder janma yasya doṣasya sa tajjanmā na bhaved a[106.23]pi
GSP28dhebta_u:4170: doṣaḥ, sa tu tasminnātmabhūte bhede abhede cāniṣtopi na nivartate [106.24]
GSP28dhebta_u:4172: idam atrārthasatattvaṃ bhidyamānaṃ hi rūpaṃ bhedo viparyayeṇa cābhedaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:4173: vibhinne ca te syātām ityādinā ca vastutas tadātmaka eva doṣo darśitaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:4177: vyāvṛttikṛtas tu bhedo yadi bhaved bhavatu na tāvatā prakṛtakṣatir iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4178: tanmate 'vasthāntarāvayavinaḥ sattvam upetyaitad uktam idānī tu sa eva nāstīti darśayitum āha bhāgā eva ce[106.25]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4186: tadabhāvāc ca kena saha teṣāṃ bhedābhedacintā syād iti cābhipretam |
GSP28dhebta_u:4187: nanv asaty ekasminn avayavini dhāraṇākarṣane katham upapadyeyātām ity āha -- anyo 'nye[106.27]ti
GSP28dhebta_u:4189: eka sāmagryadhīnatvād anyonyakāraṇādhīnāpekṣāḥ santas tathāvasthitavapuṣo yenaikasyākarṣane dhārane vānyeṣām api te bhavata iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4190: na kevalaṃ dṛṣṭahetubalāt teṣāṃ tathāsthitir api tv adṛṣṭavaśād apīti darśayann āha -- karmaṇāṃ
GSP28dhebta_u:4193: nanu cākāraṇasya karmaṇaḥ sāmarthyopavarṇanam ayuktam ity āśaṃkyāha
GSP28dhebta_u:4196: {p. 352} iti vacanāt karmabhir janitā [106.30] ity āha |
GSP28dhebta_u:4197: teṣām eva prāṇināṃ sādhāraṇair asādhārarṇavau karmabhiḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:4198: tebhyaḥ [106.30] karmasya eva tadādhipatyād eveti yāvat |
GSP28dhebta_u:4200: athāsaty ekasminn avayavini ekoyaṃ ghaṭa ityādi vyapadeśaḥ kathaṃ syād ity āśaṃkyāha -- te te bhāgāḥ kathaṃcid ekakāryakāritvādinā prakāreṇa |
GSP28dhebta_u:4201: nanu caiko ghaṭa ityādi śabdajanmani śabdānuviddhe jñāne tāvatkiñcid ekatvena pratyavabhāsate tad eva ca svalakṣaṇaṃ svalakṣaṇatvenādhyavasāyāt ta katham abhe^8dino 'rthasyāpalāpaḥ kriyata ity āha na ce[106.32]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4204: ayam abhiprāyo yadi śabdagocaro 'rthaḥ svalakṣaṇaṃ syāt tadendriyaprabhavepi pratyaye tathaiva pratibhāseta |
GSP28dhebta_u:4210: evaṃ tarhi śabdapratyayagocara eva kiñcid ekaṃ tāvad āstām |
GSP28dhebta_u:4211: tato na sarvathaikasyābhāvaḥ sidhyatīty āha aspaṣte[107.1]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4215: ayam arthas tatrāpi jñāne ta eva bhāgā a[vi]vecitabhedāḥ pratīyante na tu
GSP28dhebta_u:4217: adhyavasāyānu^2rodhena ca ta evety uktaṃ draṣṭavyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:4218: yatau bhāgātiriktaṃ nirbhāgadṛśyam anupalabhyamānam asadvyavahāragocaraḥ tata[107.2]s tasmāt |[129]teṣāṃ bhāgānāṃ paryāyaśabdābhilāpyānām |
GSP28dhebta_u:4221: punar api nirbhāgamaṅgīkṛtya siṃhāvalokitanyāyena dūṣaṇāntaram āha |
GSP28dhebta_u:4222: bhinno deṣo yasya sa cāsāv aṃśaś ceti padasaṃskāraṃ kṛtvā paścād anekaśabdena saha ^3karmadhārayaḥ kāryaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:4224: ayam āśayo yadi tat sāṃśaṃ syāt,
GSP28dhebta_u:4226: na tu niraṃśaṃ sat tathā kartum utsahata iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4227: nanu pratīyate tāvad ekasyānekabhinnadeśāṃśayogitā tatra kiṃ katham etad iti vimṛṣṭena |
GSP28dhebta_u:4234: ity abhiprāyavataḥ parasya vacanam āśaṅkamāna āha pratīteś cedi[107.4]ti
GSP28dhebta_u:4235: yady apy atroktam eva dūṣaṇaṃ na nirvikalpe nāpi vikalpe jñāne tadekamanubhāsata ityadi |
GSP28dhebta_u:4239: ye paryāyāḥ sthemānaṃ [107.5] sthairyaṃ dadhataḥ pratīyante [107.5] yat tadornityam abhisaṃbandhātte ^5kṣaṇadhvaṃsānubhāvinaḥ kutaḥ kasmān matā
GSP28dhebta_u:4241: anenaitad āha pratītiśaraṇāś ced bhavantas tadā katham anyathā pratīyamānā anyathā anugamyanta iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4242: punaḥ parasya vacanam āśaṃkamāna āha -- anyata [107.6] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4243: anyato bādhakāt pramāṇāt tanmatā ity abhisambandhavyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:4244: iha prakṛte tad bādhakaṃ pamāṇaṃ samaṃ [107.6]
GSP28dhebta_u:4246: uktepi dṛśyānupalambhādau bādhake 'nyad api bādhakaṃ darśyann āha --
GSP28dhebta_u:4249: tayor anyonyānupraveśamukhena bheda evābheda eva veti niyamavantāv aikāntikāu syātām |
GSP28dhebta_u:4251: athaikātmyetpi paryāyā eva bhidyante na dharmī dharme (?) ca na bhidya^7te na tu paryāyā ity āśaṃkyāha --
GSP28dhebta_u:4253: viruddhadharmādhyāsasya ekatvabādhakasya bhāvād bheda eva niyato [107.8]vaśyaṃbhāvīty abhiprāyaḥ
GSP28dhebta_u:4254: ananyatvepi nāyaṃ doṣo bhinnarūpasyāpi bhāvād iti parasya vacanam āśaṃkamāna āha tayor apī[107.9]ti
GSP28dhebta_u:4255: apiśabdo bhinnakamo bheda ity asmāt paro draṣṭavyaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:4258: apiśabdadarśitam abhedam api dūṣayann āha dravye[107.12]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4263: tata ekasmāt svabhāvāt, abhede svabhāvānupraveśe tayoḥ svātmahāniḥ
GSP28dhebta_u:4264: [107.14] dravyarūpatā paryāyarūpatā ca hīyeta, tadātmavad iti bhāvaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:4269: svabhāvas teṣām eva trayāṇām abhedasiddhyarthaṃ kalpyate yadi tatrāpi sa eva doṣa iti punaḥ svabhāvāntarakalpane ca pūrva [107.18] iva prasaṅgo 'navasthāprasaṅgah syāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:4271: kuta evaṃ syād ity āha tattantratvād i[107.19]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4273: kayos tattantratvam ity apekṣāyām {p. 354} āha -- tad anyayor i[107.19]ti
GSP28dhebta_u:4274: | tasmād ekasvabhāvād anyayor dravyaparyāyayor bhedasyābhedasya ca
GSP28dhebta_u:4276: astu tarhi tasya tathātvam anekātmakatvaṃ ca vastunaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:4278: śakya ity āha -- na caivam i[107.20]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4286: avaśyamo bhā^4va āvaśyakam ity asya bhāvapratyayāntatvād apṛkkaraṇasyāvaśyakam iti prāpte yoyam āvaśyakam apṛthakkaraṇam i[108.1]ti
GSP28dhebta_u:4287: prayoge sāmānādhikaraṇyena nirdeśaḥ saḥ katham iti tu na jāne mahānta eva praṣṭavyāḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:4288: saṃyogavibhāgeṣu [108.11] kartavyeṣu anapekṣo [108.11] na kāraṇam iti rūpādivargābhiprāyeṇānapekṣa^5sya tat kāraṇamātraṃ vivakṣitam
GSP28dhebta_u:4292: | saṃyogavibhāgāpekṣayā tv anapekṣo na kāraṇaṃ kintu sāpekṣa eva kāraṇam
GSP28dhebta_u:4295: na tu kasyacid anyānapekṣasyaiva kāraṇatvam asti yenānapekṣo 'kāraṇam ity ucyamānaṃ śobheta
GSP28dhebta_u:4297: tad yathā tantuturīsaṃyogalakṣaṇo guṇaḥ paṭaturīsaṃyoge kartavye paṭaṃ paścādbhāvinam apekṣate
GSP28dhebta_u:4299: 'vayavāntarād vibhāgaḥ paścādbhāvinaṃ dravyavināśam apekṣya sakriyasyāvayavasyākāśādideśād vibhāgam ārabhate, yathā cāsau na kriyājo vibhāgaḥ kintu vibhāgaja eveti vibhāgajaṃ vibhāgam abhyupagacchadbhirvaiśeṣikair iṣyate tathā nehāprakṛtatvād ucyate |
GSP28dhebta_u:4304: "[133]yuṣmad asmadbhyām anyatarasyām khañ" ity anena khaña kartavyaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:4315: nanu ca manaskārādisamudāyajanyam idam ekam upadarśitam etatsāmagrīmadhyapraviṣṭaikajanyaṃ tu kiṃ na darśitam ity āha tadanyad i[111.13]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4316: ekajanyam iti tatsāmagryantaḥpatitakāraṇānapekṣaikajanyam i^2ty avaseyam, na tv ekajanyaṃ nāma kiñcit saṃbhavati |
GSP28dhebta_u:4318: dvicandrādivijñānam, samanantarapratyayād vijñānāc cakṣurvijñānasyopalambhāmahe(?)tyādyabhidhānād evaitad ūhituṃ śakyam ity ahiprāyeṇa ca sva[134]yam ūhyam i[111.13]ty āha |
GSP28dhebta_u:4319: nanu kiṃ bhāgato viśeṣavṛttir yena^3 bahuvacanena nirdeśa ity āha[135]tajjanyāpekṣayā
GSP28dhebta_u:4324: kutaḥ svabhāvabhedavattvaṃ tasyety apekṣāyāṃ yojyam kāryāntare[112.1]tyādi |
GSP28dhebta_u:4325: pṛthivyādīny upādāya vartanta ity upādāya rūpaṃ
GSP28dhebta_u:4332: nanūpakāraka ādhāro na tu janakas tat katham evam ucyata ity āha nahī[112.27]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4341: kathaṃ tatrākiñcitkaratvaṃ tasya sa^6hakāriṇo jñāpitaṃ bhavatīty āha --
GSP28dhebta_u:4348: kathaṃ tarhi saha yugapat kurvanta [114.12] ity ayaṃ vyācaṣṭeti cet,
GSP28dhebta_u:4349: uktam atra pūrvam iti na punar ucyate |
GSP28dhebta_u:4352: yāvate[115.8]ti tṛtīyāntapratirūpako 'yaṃ nipāto yasmād ity asminn
GSP28dhebta_u:4353: arthe, kiṃtv etasminn arthe vā anuvartate |
GSP28dhebta_u:4356: tadavasthāyā prāk pūrvaṃ paścād uttarakālaṃ[136]pṛthak tadvikalāvasthāyāṃ bhāvaḥ [115.10]
GSP28dhebta_u:4360: nanu yadi svahetoḥ samarthasyotpattis tarhi katham anantaram uktam --
GSP28dhebta_u:4361: "te samarthāḥ svabhāvataḥ [115.6]" ity ata āha paramate[115.16]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4362: bhavatyasmāt kāryam iti bhāvo hetus tasmād iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4363: tad api tvayā kasmān na vyākhyātam iti cet |
GSP28dhebta_u:4364: na, sa[49a]^1marthaḥ kuta utpanna ity asya vyāghātaprasaṃgāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:4366: camīmāṃsakamatāśrayaṇenāha na tunaiyāyikāevam icchanti yena tanmatopagraheṇāpy etat saṃgaccheta, sahakārisākalyasyaiva taiḥ sāmarthyarūpatveneṣṭeḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:4368: tadvataḥ sāmarthyaṃ vaikalyaṃ tv asāmarthyam" iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4372: āvaśyakaṃ[138]jananam i[116.11]ty asya śabdasya tu siddhiḥ[139]pūrvaṃ na jāne |
GSP28dhebta_u:4374: [138] avaśyaṃjanakatvam S [139] draṣṭavyam -- pṛ. 354 paṃ. 8 -- "avaśyamo bhāvaḥ ityādinā na jāne ityantena kṛtā", etadarthakaḥ pāṭhastruṭitotra bhāti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4375: kuśūlañ ca tadapanetṛpuruṣaprayatnaś ca kṣetranayanaṃ ca prakiraṇaṃ
GSP28dhebta_u:4376: [116.14] ca prakaraṇāt kṣetre prakiraṇaṃ ceti dvandvaṃ kṛtvā paścād ādiśabde[na] bahuvrīhiḥ kāryaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:4377: prakiraṇam ity ayam auṇādikaḥ śabdo na tu kiratirlyuḍanto draṣṭavyas tadā guṇasyāpratiṣedhena prakaraṇam iti prāpter asādhu^3tvaprasaṃgāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:4378: sametya [116.19] yogyadeśe sthitvā sambhūya ādyena saha militvā
GSP28dhebta_u:4380: nanu ca "ata eva tayor avasthayor" ityādinā pratyabhijñāyāḥ prāmāṇyam
GSP28dhebta_u:4381: apoditam eva tat kathaṃ na punar ukte(ktam i)ty āha -- pūrvañ ce[117.9]ti
GSP28dhebta_u:4384: tarhi kim arthaṃ punar uktam ity āha -- vipañcanārthaṃ tv i[117.12]ti tuḥ pūrvasmād asya kathanasya viśeṣaṃ darśayati |
GSP28dhebta_u:4386: paścād bāhyepi darśayitavyatvāt krame tāvac śabdam āha |
GSP28dhebta_u:4389: ^5tasya janane -- vyavadhānādipratipattau vyavadhānādisvīkāre, kathaṃ tādṛśo na bhavatīty āha anyādṛśād iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4390: anyādṛśāddhi bhavannanyādṛśasyāpi hetor hetuvyapadeśasaṃbhavāj jananahetur ity āha |
GSP28dhebta_u:4391: kathaṃ taddhetur ity āha tad iti tatsahakāribhiḥ parasparopasarpaṇādyāśrayahetusahakāribhir indriyādibhiḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:4392: ^6samarthañ ca tadvijñānajanane svasvakṣaṇāntaraṃ ceti tathā tasyārambhāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:4398: vijñānanirmāṇasamarthāś ca te hetavaś ca te ca te indriyādayaś ca teṣām upādānaiḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:4403: sukhasaṃvarditatvād iti vyācakṣāṇo mūle sukhaidhita ity asyānabhiyoganimittasyāpi sāmarthyāt krīḍana[119.12]śīla ity asya hetubhāvena ^8viśeṣaṇatvaṃ darśayati |
GSP28dhebta_u:4405: ca kimācāryeṇa niṣpāditam ity āśaṃkāṃ nirākurvann āha kṛtam i[119.14]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4406: na punar e[119.15]vam ācakṣāṇena dvir uktābhāvo darśita iti boddhavyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:4407: asyārthasyāsakṛduktatvāt ekavāraṃ prativihite punaḥ pratividhāpayitari avajñāsaṃbhavenopahāsāṃyogāc ca kṛtaṃ kṛtam iti nirdeśasya
GSP28dhebta_u:4409: nanu kiṃ kurvantaṃ kartuṃ prayuṅkte punaḥ pūrvapakṣavādī yena punaḥ pūrvapakṣavādī kārayatīty ucyata ity āha -- punar ityādi |
GSP28dhebta_u:4415: {p. 358} samprati prakārāntareṇāpi pratyabhijñāyā aprāmāṇyaṃ paramabhyupagamayituṃ bhūmikāṃ racayann āha -- vyāvasthitasyaive[120.12]ti
GSP28dhebta_u:4417: darśanāt sāmarthyotpādādikalpanā na punar iha tathā adarśanād iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4421: apratibhāsamāno viveko [120.14] yasya puṃ^3saḥ sa tathā |
GSP28dhebta_u:4422: yady api viveko 'sya pratyakṣato nāvagamyate tathāpy etasmāt pramāṇāt tatsvabhāvasya sāmarthyasyotpattiḥ kalpyata iti darśayann āha
GSP28dhebta_u:4423: anutpattiprasaṃgāt prāgasatsāmarthyaṃ cakṣurādisannidhāv utpadyata iti niścayaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:4428: apūrvasāmarthyasya yaḥ pratibhāsa ākāras tena vivikto rahito ya upalādis tadgrāhi |
GSP28dhebta_u:4429: yata evaivaṃ tata evāvikṛtam iti ca draṣṭavyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:4431: abhyupagamyatām evaṃ kā kṣatir ity āha tatheti tadvat |
GSP28dhebta_u:4433: dvividhaṃ hi sāmarthyaṃ prātisvikam āgantukañ ca |
GSP28dhebta_u:4435: anyathā śilāśakalam api kṣityādisānnidhye bījavadaṃkuraṃ kasmān na
GSP28dhebta_u:4436: niva(rva)rtayatīti paryanuyoge kim uttaraṃ vācyam iti hi teṣāṃ matam |
GSP28dhebta_u:4437: nanu sāmarthyam atiśayalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāryādheyaṃ tato 'nyad eva tat ka^6thaṃ "sahakāripratyaya[sānnidhya]lakṣaṇasye"ty ucyata ity āha
GSP28dhebta_u:4439: sānnidhyaśabdaparityāgena sahakāripratyayalakṣaṇasyeti te evetyādy apy uktaṃ draṣṭavyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:4440: ata evābhyupagamād i[121.3]ti upāgatābhyupagamād i^7ti pratyetavyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:4447: idaṃ śabdasya caitad iti etad darśanam [121.21] |
GSP28dhebta_u:4449: evaṃ niyuñjānamaho mahāsāmarthyam astu kā tavākṣamety āśaṃkya yadi nāmety avatārayituṃ na cātre[121.25]tyādy āha |
GSP28dhebta_u:4450: na cātra me kācid akṣamā [121.25] kiṃtv itīyam asmākaṃ cintā cittaṃ dunotī[122.3]ti
GSP28dhebta_u:4451: na cātra me [121.25] ity anena ṭīkākāravacanenaikavākyīkaraṇapakṣety a(pya)smākaṃ iti "asmado dvayoś ca"
GSP28dhebta_u:4453: evam asaṃbaddhavādiny apūjya eva pūjāvacanam upasaṃhāraparaṃ draṣṭavyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:4454: dainyodbhāvanam i[122.1]ty arthāt saṃbodhyamānasya dainyaprakāśanam iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4458: apeto 'pagataḥ saṃtānaḥ [122.2] prasūtiḥ paraṃparā yasya tathoktam |
GSP28dhebta_u:4460: śiraḥkampe cāsya satyam idam astī[122.10]ty asya śabdasya prayogam
GSP28dhebta_u:4461: ākalayya prayoktur abhiprāyaṃ varṇayan pṛcchatī[122.13]ty ācaṣṭe |
GSP28dhebta_u:4462: ata eva cedam āha -- kiṃ tvayāstitvena pṛcchyata iti pārśvasthaṃ praśnayann āha kiṃ tad i[122.13]ti
GSP28dhebta_u:4464: audāsīnyāpattir ity atreti śabdena idam āstitvenābhipretasya nyāyyavacana[122.17]syākāro
GSP28dhebta_u:4466: ata eva nyāyyavacanasyāstitvena darśyamānasya rūpaṃ darśayan satym idam apy astī[122.16]ti punar āha |
GSP28dhebta_u:4467: yady evam asya nyāyyavacanasya sadbhāvādanavadyam evāsmanmatam ity āśaṃ^3kyāha kiṃtv i[122.17]ti
GSP28dhebta_u:4469: pracyutam ajanakaṃ rūpam utpannaṃ janakaṃ rūpaṃ dvandvaikavadbhāvam abhipretya pracyutotpannam ity āha -- apracyuto(tā)nutpannatvenaiva ca
GSP28dhebta_u:4475: yaḥ svabhāvabhedo na bhavati svata eva yo bhāvabhedalakṣaṇatvād iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4478: svarūpeṇa kartṛtve vivakṣitasyāpi tādrūpya prasajyetety abhiprāyeṇāha
GSP28dhebta_u:4480: pararūpeṇa kartṛtve iti para eva kartā syāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:4481: tasya tu tathātvaṃ^5 harītakīṃ prāpya devatā
GSP28dhebta_u:4482: recayantīty anena tulyaṃ syād ity abhipretyāha -- pararūpeṇāpy akārakatvād i[124.3]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4483: asyottarasya [124.5] "sahitas tatsvabhāvo na kevala" ity asya |
GSP28dhebta_u:4487: purastād api tasya svarūpasya bhāvād iti bhāvaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:4490: ^6syād etaj janakam asya rūpam avasthitaṃ janakañ ca tad ucyate yasmin saty eva kāryam asti na tu yasmin sati kāryaṃ bhavaty eva, sati
GSP28dhebta_u:4493: nopapadyeta ity eva tasya kāryaṃ, tadbhāve tu bhavaty avaśyam iti ko(kvo)payogo 'sya |
GSP28dhebta_u:4494: tasmāt kathaṃ tadrūpabhāvepi kāryakriyā^7 prasaṃjanaṃ jyāya iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4496: kāraṇaṃ yadi kāryaṃ nopajāyate tarhi tatsvatantram āpadyeta |
GSP28dhebta_u:4497: tathā ca na tat tasya kāryaṃ syāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:4500: svatantraṃ kāryam eva syān na [tat]kāryaṃ tathā ^8sati ||" iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4501: kāraṇapāratantrye ca tatkāraṇaṃ tatkāryaṃ haṭhād eva janayet |
GSP28dhebta_u:4502: tathāpy abhāve na tasya kāryaṃ syāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:4503: tasmād a[kāraṇāt] kāraṇasya viśeṣaḥ kāryasyāvaśyaṃbhāva evāvaśyañ ca vaktavyaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:4504: nanu "tadbhā(tadabhā)ve na bhavati kāryam" ity akāraṇād asya viśeṣaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:4505: na hi tasyākāraṇasyābhāve tatkāryaṃ na bhavatīti, hanta kuta etad
GSP28dhebta_u:4507: yadi hi tadbhā(tadabhā)vasyābhāve tadbhāvalakṣaṇe kāryābhāvasyābhāvaḥ kāryabhāvalakṣaṇaḥ syāt tadā tadabhāvaprayukto 'syābhāvaḥ siddhyed itarathākāraṇābhimatābhāvaprayukto 'pi tadabhāvaḥ kiṃ na
GSP28dhebta_u:4510: tasmād yathā ^2tadavastha eva kāraṇe svayam eva kāryaṃ na bhavati svātantryāt, tathā tadabhāvo 'pi svayam eva na bhaviṣyatīti svātantryād eva |
GSP28dhebta_u:4511: yaś ca svayam eva na bhavati nāsau niyamyata tena paratantratve tasya kāraṇasya bhāve 'vaśyam eva bhavet |
GSP28dhebta_u:4515: "[146]tadbhāvepi na bhāvaś ced abhāve bhāvitā kutaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:4519: tasmāt tadbhāve bhāvas tadabhāve cābhāva iti viśeṣitaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'vaśyaṃ bhavatīti jñāpayati |
GSP28dhebta_u:4520: tathā ca kāraṇe saty avaśyaṃbhāvi kāryam āyātam iti kathaṃ kadācit kriyāvirāmaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:4521: kiñ ca tathāvidho hi kāryābhāvo nirhetukatvāt svayam eva bhavatīti yuktam api |
GSP28dhebta_u:4522: bhāvas tu hetuparatantratvāt sa^4marthe hetau na bhavatīti na yuktam |
GSP28dhebta_u:4524: "abhāvo hi padārthānāṃ svayam eva bhaved api |
GSP28dhebta_u:4525: bhāvas tu paratantratvāt kathaṃ hetor bhaven na saḥ ||" iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4526: {p. 361} nanu kāryābhāvasya svatantratvāt "kāraṇe saty eva na
GSP28dhebta_u:4529: kathaṃ bhavet kāryasya(kāryam[147]asya) tataḥ svayam e^5va na bhavati, yaś ca svayam eva na bhavati nāsau tena niyantuṃ śakyaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:4530: tato yathā svayaṃ na bhavati tathā bhaved api |
GSP28dhebta_u:4532: yadā tu kāraṇe sati bhaved eva tadā svarasanirodhepy aparāparakṣaṇotpattes tadabhāva eva saṃtānocchedas tadabhāva eva ca saṃtānākṣepakṣaṇānārambho vā su^6jñāta(na)
GSP28dhebta_u:4536: etena tad api nirastamyadāhur eke yathobhayādhīnanirūpaṇā vyāptir ayogavyavacchedena vyāpake nirūpyate vyāpye sati bhāva eva vyāpakasya nābhāva iti; vyāpyasya punar anyayogavyavacchedena vyāpaka eva bhāvo
GSP28dhebta_u:4538: evaṃ kārya^7kāraṇabhāvo 'py ubhayādhīnanirūpaṇopi kāraṇe 'yogavyavacchedena nirūpyate, kāryotpādasya purastād bhāva eva kāraṇasya nābhāva iti; kārye punar anyayogavyavacchedena kāraṇa eva sati
GSP28dhebta_u:4541: 'bhavatas tatkāryatāyā evābhāvaprasaṅgāt ^8svabhāve 'bhāvamata(?)ś cātata kāryaḥ kā(tatkāryakā)raṇatāyāḥ sa tu yā (?) abhisaṃbandhayata eva cātra
GSP28dhebta_u:4542: bhavataḥ (?) kāraṇasya mukhyasyānubhavo 'nyas tu tādarthyād upacaritakāraṇabhāvasyānubhava iti svayam upacaritakāraṇānubhavarūpatva eveti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4543: api ca yathā kāraṇe saty avaśyaṃ bhāvam anicchatā kāryasya kādācit kādanvayāt tatkāra[51a] ^ 1ṇam iṣyate |
GSP28dhebta_u:4544: tathā kādācit kādavyatirekād api kin na kāraṇam iṣyate yujyate vā |
GSP28dhebta_u:4545: tasmāt kāryakāraṇabhāvaṃ niyatam icchatā yathā vyāptimān vyatireka eṣṭavyas tathā vyāptimānn
GSP28dhebta_u:4547: kiṃ ca sahitāvasthāyāṃ tāvad asau bhāvaḥ kāryaṃ janayatītīṣyate |
GSP28dhebta_u:4548: janayatīti ca ko 'rthaḥ ? kiṃ kāryaṃ^2 sattayābhisambadhyate kiṃ vābhisaṃtsyate? kiñcātaḥ ? yady utaraḥ pakṣas tadā tasmiñ janayati na kadācit kāryaṃ satpratyayaviṣayaḥ syāt sattayā abhisambandhasya
GSP28dhebta_u:4550: athānya(dya) evopagamas tadā vikalpadvayam, kim anenaiva svabhāvena pūrvam ayam avasthito 'thānyena |
GSP28dhebta_u:4553: ^3anenaiva svabhāvenāvasthāne ca saṃpratīva tadāpi kāryaṃ sattayābhisambadhyata ity upetaṃ syāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:4556: atha bhavato 'pi kim idaṃ kāraṇatvaṃ? kiṃ prāgbhāva eva kiṃ vā prāg eva bhāvaḥ? yadi prāgbhāva eva, tadā sthirasyāpi evam eva kāraṇatve su[148]sādhitasya^4 nirākaraṇaṃ prasajyeta |
GSP28dhebta_u:4557: atha prāg eva bhāvaḥ, tad etatkṣaṇikatve siddhe siddhyati |
GSP28dhebta_u:4558: tad eva tu na siddham iti {p. 362} katham idam ucyamānaṃ śobheteti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4559: āstāṃ prāgbhāva eva kāraṇatvaṃ ko bādhaḥ? nanūktam evākṣaṇikasyāpi kāraṇatve sādhayituṃ śakye tadanirākṛtir eva mahatī bādheti ceti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4561: lakṣaṇenākṣaṇikasya sattvaṃtathāgatair nirākriyate yenedam api vaktum adhyavasitās tarkavidaḥ kathaṃ nāmeti cet |
GSP28dhebta_u:4563: prāgbhāva evāsau sthirarūpāt kramākramākhyasya vyāpakasya nivṛttyā nivartate |
GSP28dhebta_u:4564: yathā ca tasya tābhyāṃ vyāptir yathā ca tatas tayor nivṛttis tathānyatra niṛṇītam iti ne^6ha hetulakṣaṇakāle 'prakṛtatvād ucyate |
GSP28dhebta_u:4567: na tu hetulakṣaṇena tasyā nirākṛtir iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4571: na hi sa sāmī(hī)[tya]ity e[123.21]kena prakāreṇa vyākhyāyāpareṇāpi prakāreṇa vyākhyātum __________NOTES__________
GSP28dhebta_u:4573: nanūktam eva pratyayāntarāpekṣasvakāryajananasvabhāvo bhāvas tat kathaṃ pratyayāntarasāhityadaśāyāḥ pūrvaṃ kuryād ity āha
GSP28dhebta_u:4576: kecit punaḥ "svahetubhir evāyaṃ pratyayāntarasāpekṣakāryajananasvabhāvo janita [124.11]" ity atraiva vipañcyate |
GSP28dhebta_u:4577: ^8yady evaṃdharmo 'yaṃ svahetubhir eva janitaḥ syāt tadā na
GSP28dhebta_u:4579: tathā hi yāvat sahakāripratyayasannidhikālas tāvad akaraṇadharmāsau bhāvo 'nyathāsyā pūrvam api kartṛtvaṃ prasajyeta |
GSP28dhebta_u:4580: pratyayāntarasannidhikāle ca sa eva kiyatkālākaraṇasvabhāvo yaḥ prathame kṣaṇa āsīt |
GSP28dhebta_u:4581: tato naiva kuryāt ki[51b]^1yatkālākaraṇadharmatvāt tasya kriyāyāt (kriyāyāṃtu) sa eva svabhāvo na bhavet |
GSP28dhebta_u:4582: yadvā tāvatkālāpekṣajanakasya svabhāvasyānuvṛttes tādātmyaḥ(mye) tāvatkālam akriya eva |
GSP28dhebta_u:4583: punar ante tathaiveti katham ivākṣaṇikaḥ kadācid api janayet |
GSP28dhebta_u:4584: tasmān na pratyayāntarāpekṣajanakasvabhāvo bhāvaḥ svahetubhir janyata iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4587: bhāvaḥ syāj janito nāsau kiṃcij janayet tadā ||
GSP28dhebta_u:4589: tāvan nūnam akartāsau svabhāvas tasya vastunaḥ ||
GSP28dhebta_u:4592: tan na kuryāt kriyāyām vā svabhāvosya no bhavet (?) |
GSP28dhebta_u:4595: svabhāvasya tathāpy eṣa tāvat kālam asatkriyaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:4596: punar ante tathaiveti kuryād akṣaṇikaḥ katham? ||" iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4601: santānam apy āśritya katham ucyata ity āha -- pūrvottareti [128.8] |
GSP28dhebta_u:4602: kiṃ lakṣaṇaṃ nāma vastu^4tas tatra sahakāritvam ity āha --
GSP28dhebta_u:4607: ekatvenādhim uktasya [130.6] tad evedam iti niścitasya |
GSP28dhebta_u:4609: [152] tatsamānakālaḥ S [153] pradātura- ity api paṭhyate |
GSP28dhebta_u:4610: upanipatantīti upanipātās te ca kṣaṇāḥ [130.13] tathā kṣaṇo yato 'nyo
GSP28dhebta_u:4611: nāsti kālaḥ sovacchedakatvenaiṣāṃ vidyata ^5iti "[154]arṣa ādi"ty enad vidhātavyaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:4620: kiṃtu durvekena anyad eva kiñcid uddhata bhāti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4623: tadanāsādanam eva katham ity āha -- kṣaṇānām i[130.27]ti^6 |
GSP28dhebta_u:4624: ayaṃ niratiśayo 'yaṃ ca sātiśaya iti vivekasyābhāvāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:4626: yad uktam akṣaṇike tatsarvaṃ kṣaṇikeṣv api mamaṃ yata [131.10] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4628: yad vā kṣaṇānām i[131.13]tīdam ubhayatrāpi sambandhanīyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:4629: pūrvaṃ svadeśasthityā tā(te) eva parasparataḥ samutpannaviśeṣāḥ sannidhīyante [131.15] pratyāsīdanti |

GSP28dhebta_u:4704: uktam evārtham upasaṃhāravyājena sphuṭayann āha svahetubhir evāyam i[140.28]ti |

GSP28dhebta_u:4713: ko nāmāsya bhāṣitasyārtha ity āha kevalam i[141.10]ti |

GSP28dhebta_u:4730: pūrvoktena [142.3] "tadantepi sa evāsya svabhāva" ity anena nyāyena yuktyā tadayogā[142.5]n nāśāyogāt |

GSP28dhebta_u:4736: sā lakṣaṇaṃ [142.11] yasya tadbhāvas tattvaṃ tasmāt |

GSP28dhebta_u:4763: na tu yat sākṣād eva sādhyaṃ sādhayati |

GSP28dhebta_u:4765: ^6tathāhi ye yadbhāvaṃ pratyanapekṣās te tadbhāvaniyatā yathāntyā kāraṇasāmagrī svakāryotpādane

GSP28dhebta_u:4768: tasmād ayaṃ maulo hetur vaiyarthyam ātmanaḥ paśyan nai(śyan ne)vaṃ viparyaye bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ

GSP28dhebta_u:4772: kṛtakatvahetor vyāptiṃ samarthayituṃ pūrvācāryaiḥ kāmanapekṣāṃ bruvatoyam abhiprāyaṃ (?) prakāśayituṃ sahāmahe |
GSP28dhebta_u:4774: na tv etadai(d e)va bādhakaṃ pramāṇam |

GSP28dhebta_u:4817: i[146.3]ty eṣa eva pāṭhaḥ iti[146.2]śabdena hetvabhidhāne arthyata ity
GSP28dhebta_u:4818: artho dāhapākādis tatra sāmarthyaṃ tad eva bhāvalakṣaṇam āyātam iti saṃgatatvāt |

GSP28dhebta_u:4848: i[146.28]ti kramayaugapadyakāritvābhyām iti dra^5ṣṭavyam itarathā kāryadharmābhyāmābhyāṃ kāraṇadharmaḥ kāryakāritvaṃ katham iva vyāpyeta |
GSP28dhebta_u:4861: ta(ka)dā nivṛttir ity apekṣāyām āha akṣaṇi^7katva [147.2]
GSP28dhebta_u:4863: tatra evākṣaṇikatvād vipakṣān nivṛtter iti ca sāmarthyād apādānaṃ draṣṭavyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:4864: kathaṃ tayos tato nivṛttir ity āha --
GSP28dhebta_u:4866: virodhād ity anupapatter ity artha, na tu śāstranirdiṣṭalakṣaṇayor virodhayor anyataravirodhavaśād iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:4872: 'pi yāvat sambhavaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ pratividhānaṃ cāsmābhirviśeṣākhyāna eva

GSP28dhebta_u:4875: asti cākṣaṇike sati vyāpakānupalambhaḥ sattvahetoḥ sādhyaviparyaye bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ darśitaṃ veditayam |
GSP28dhebta_u:4878: cākhyātam iti tata evāvagantavyam iti. viruddhayoḥ [147.3] sattvāsattvayoḥ

GSP28dhebta_u:4893: vivṛṇvatā cānena kāryadharmatvaṃ kramayaugapadvayor vyaktam upadarśitam |
GSP28dhebta_u:4894: ata eva kramayaugapadyābhyāṃ kāryakriyāvyāptety asmābhir vyākhyātaṃ tathā
GSP28dhebta_u:4897: bhavatv evaṃ, tataḥ kim āyāta^4m ity āha -- tasya ce[147.18]ti |

GSP28dhebta_u:4902: kāryāntarasahitāsahitāvasthābahirbhāvas tābhyāṃ prakārāntaraṃ tasya niṣedhe dṛśyānupalambhakṛte sati hy ani(sati ni)ṣedha ity āha -- kayościd
GSP28dhebta_u:4903: deśāntarādau (147.24) bhāvepī[147.25]ti tasyāṅkurāder iti prakaraṇāt na kācit kṣatiḥ [147.25]
GSP28dhebta_u:4904: kiṃ bhūte deśāntarādāv ity āha krameṇetyā[147.24]di |
GSP28dhebta_u:4907: ayaṃ cāśayo deśāntarādir apy etad deśāntaravat kramena vā tadbhāvavān yugapad vā bhavitum
GSP28dhebta_u:4910: na kācit kṣatir i[147.25]ti bruvataś cāyam abhiprāyaḥ -- kāryasya caikatraikadāvasthādvayabahirbhāvo niṣi^7ddho 'nyadāpi tena bhavatā pramāṇaparidṛṣṭātmanaiva bhavitavyam anyathā tat kathaṃ deśāntarādau
GSP28dhebta_u:4916: nanu saṃpratyevoktaḥ svabhāvānupalambha evetyādi tat katham idānīm ucyate pratyakṣa [147.25] ityādīti cet |
GSP28dhebta_u:4917: naiṣa doṣaḥ pūrvaṃ hi mūḍhaṃ pratipattāraṃ prati tathoktam adhunā punar amūḍhaṃ pratī^8ti ko vyāghātaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:4919: sakṛtapratyupalakṣaṇena yaugapadyaśabdenākramasyaiva vivakṣitatvāt anyathānyo 'nyavyavacchedarūpatā durupapādāpadyate tataḥ sarvatraivākramārthī(rtho) yaugapādyārthaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:4922: [55a]^1ubhayaniṣedhātmakam eva prakārāntaraṃ kiṃ {p. 372} na bhavati yenaikaniṣedhanāparavidhānāt tasya niṣedho bhavatīty āha --
GSP28dhebta_u:4924: ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- kramo na bhavatīti ayam evākramavidhiḥ |
