GSP28dhebta_u:5158: ^8śālikodravāder na tatku(kṛ)to bhedo 'nyādṛśatvam api tv evam evety āha -- nimittam antareṇe[163.13]ti
GSP28dhebta_u:5159: kalpanāyāṃ bhedakalpanāyāṃ viśeṣābhāvān nirmittatvena viśeṣābhāvāt [163.16] śālyantare 'pi kiṃ na kalpyata iti śeṣaḥ prakaraṇa laṃbhyam vā |
GSP28dhebta_u:5161: nāpi hetubhedaḥ kitv evam evābhedo bhaviṣyatīty ā[58a]^1ha -- nimittam
GSP28dhebta_u:5163: viśeṣābhāvāc chālikodravayor api bhe(abhe)daḥ kiṃ na kalpyata iti pūrvavat |
GSP28dhebta_u:5164: syād etat pratibhāsaniyamanibandhanoyam abhedo nānyanibandhanas tat kim evam ucyate ity āha pratibhāsasya bhedas tādṛśatvam |
GSP28dhebta_u:5166: paramārthato bhede 'py atādṛ^2śatvepy upalakṣaṇād darśanānaivam iti
GSP28dhebta_u:5169: pratibhāsabhedād bheda iti pūrvapakṣe pratibhāsabhedasya ca kutaścid bhrāntinimittāt paramārthato 'bhedepy upalakṣaṇād iti vaktavyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:5170: ubhayatrāpi tu yadi pratibhāsabhedābhedāv apy aparapratibhāsabhedābhedanibandhanau tatrāpi tatpratyanavasthā tasmād
GSP28dhebta_u:5171: ā^3dyayor api tathātvaṃ vyavasthāpayituṃ na śakyata iti doṣo darśayitavyaḥ tayoḥ [163.21] bhedābhedayoḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:5175: tebhyāṃ bhāvasvabhāvabhedābhedebhyo 'nyaḥ sa cāsau sambandhaś ceti tathā tasya kalpanā [163.23] tasyām |
GSP28dhebta_u:5176: sopi teṣāṃ kuta ity ākāṃkṣāyāṃ sambandhāṅgīkaraṇaṃ tatrāpi tatparyanuyoge tad
GSP28dhebta_u:5179: bhāvo yadi bhāvasvabhāve tayor anupraveśas tadā sa evāvatiṣṭheta na tu tau |
GSP28dhebta_u:5180: atha tayos tasyānupraveśas tarhi tāv avatiṣṭheyātāṃ na tv asāv iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:5181: punar bhedapakṣa eva doṣāntaraṃ samuccinvann āha anupakārāc ce[163.25]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:5182: yau bhedābhedau tādṛśatvātā^5dṛśatvalakṣaṇāv asau pratipadyate tāv api yadi bhinnau [164.1] tato vyatiriktau |
GSP28dhebta_u:5184: na bhinnaṃ nāpy abhinnaṃ yat tadavastham, yadavasthaṃ bhedābhedapratipattikāle |
GSP28dhebta_u:5188: tata eva hetubalāyātāt kutaścid bhinnābhinnād rūpād viśeṣasāmānyātmano[164.11]r ity atra viśeṣaśabdena
GSP28dhebta_u:5190: tasya bhidyata iti vyutpattyā bhedarūpatvāpatter ayogāsiddhiprasaṅgān nāpi viśeṣpadārthas tasya vināśārambharahiteśve vāṇavākāśādiṣu pravṛtteḥ pareṇa bhedaśabdenābhipretatvāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:5193: ^7apekṣayā hī[164.18]ty atrasthasya hiśabdasya maulasya vyākhyānam etat yasmād i[164.18]ti
GSP28dhebta_u:5194: ṭīkākṛtas tu "apekṣayāhi" ity atrasthahiśabdo 'vadhāraṇe, yad vā hir yasmād apekṣayā tasyeti yojyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:5196: sādhanānāṃ kāraṇānāṃ sādhanāya [165.2] niṣpādanāya kathaṃ neṣyata ity āha |
GSP28dhebta_u:5199: ^8yathādṛṣṭaṃ kāryaṃ yathādṛṣṭād eva kāraṇād utpadyeteti vartate |
GSP28dhebta_u:5200: vilakṣaṇayāpi vivakṣitasāmagryā anyādṛśāpi tallakṣaṇaṃ vivakṣitasāmagryā jāyamānakāryasarūpam
GSP28dhebta_u:5201: tatsāmagrīvailakṣaṇyāviśeṣādyasyāḥ kasyāścit sāmagryā jāyamānaṃ kiṃ tallakṣaṇaṃ na bhavatīti
GSP28dhebta_u:5202: tathā ca sa eva doṣa ity āśaṃkya para evāha kasyāścid eve[165.23]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:5203: atrāsmi[58b]^1n pūrvapakṣe [165.25] yādṛśī śakti[165.28]r iti yojyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:5209: tasyāvilakṣaṇasyāgnyādikāraṇakalāpasya ya ātmātiśayaḥ śaktiśabdavācyas tasyāsaṃbhavād a[166.4]yogāt
GSP28dhebta_u:5211: tadātmātiśayayoge 'pi katham agnyādirūpatvaṃ tasyety āha sa eva hī[166.4]ti dhūmaṃ janayati sahakārikāraṇatvena |
GSP28dhebta_u:5216: vyavaharāmo bhavantas tu śakramūrdhādisaṃjñayā vyavaharante ato nāgni saṃjñāyām eva vivādaḥ syāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:5217: [166.7] kathaṃ punar nāgny eva vivādo nānyatrety āha arthābhedam i[166.7]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:5220: dhūmādikaṃ kāryaṃ kartṛ kathaṃ niścitam ity āha -- atadrūpe[166.9]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:5222: kṣaṇāpekṣāpakṣe tu kāraṇam indhanādi kṣaṇarūpam ity avaseyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:5226: kāryaṃ hetuṃ vyākhyāyādhunānupalabdhiṃ vyācikhyāsuryatas tatas tadutthānaṃ tadupadarśayituṃ tad evam i[167.3]tyādinopakramate |
GSP28dhebta_u:5227: bhavad utpadyamānaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ niścitaṃ sakṛd i[167.3]ti sakṛd apīti jñeyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:5231: avadhāraṇena pratīyamānam apy atathāvidhāj janmaniṣedhaṃ kaṇṭhoktaṃ kurvann āha --
GSP28dhebta_u:5234: yādṛśyuktā yathoktā [167.7] tasyāṃ dṛśyatvaviśeṣaṇāyām ity arthaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:5236: svarūpa[167.8]grahaṇam upalakṣaṇaṃ tena vyāpārepīty api pratyeyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:5238: krame tāvac chabdaṃ prayuñjāno 'nupalabdhisvarūpaṃ ^7tāvad darśayatīti vakṣyati |
GSP28dhebta_u:5240: yathāśruti vyākhyāne tu tathetyādi vakṣyamāṇam asaṃgataṃ syāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:5244: tajjñānādhāratvapratiṣedhamātravivakṣayā ca pakṣāntaram iti pramāṇāntaratvam eva tadanyavijñānāśrayeṇopapādayann {p. 381} āha
GSP28dhebta_u:5253: tadindriyajanmani jñāne yadavabhāsate sa tasya viṣayas tatpratipattijanakatvena labhata ity abhisaṃbandhād dvitīyā sādhana[167.18]padasaṃskāravelāyām anupalabdhir nāpekṣiteti tathā nirdeśaḥ
GSP28dhebta_u:5254: | kathaṃ tarhi sa sidhyatīty āśaṃkāyām ācāryadeśīya^2syaivābhiprāyaṃ
GSP28dhebta_u:5257: etadbhūtalam" iti pratītir nātiśete "tadghaṭo nāsti" iti jñānam pratiyogismaraṇasahāyenendriyeṇa janyamānatvāt tajjñānā[na]ntarabhāvi
GSP28dhebta_u:5258: saṃyuktaviśeṣabhāvalakṣaṇāt indriyārthasannikarṣāṭ jāyamānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ sad eva pramāṇāntaram anumānādeḥ pramāṇād anyat pramā^3ṇam |
GSP28dhebta_u:5260: kiṃ bhūtaṃ sad etat pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇam ity āha abhāvasya [167.21] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:5261: tuccharūpasya [167.21] iti bhāvarūpaśūnyasyeti boddhavyam na tv avasthā(tv astv ā)tmana iti tanmatenābhāvasyāpi vastutvāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:5262: nanu ca nedaṃ pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ, api tu sannikarṣasya
GSP28dhebta_u:5263: pratyakṣapramāṇasya pramāṇarūpaṃ phalam etat tat katha^4m evam uktam iti
GSP28dhebta_u:5265: kevalaṃ hānādibuddhirūpaṃ phalaṃ pradhānam idaṃ pramāṇam abhipretam |
GSP28dhebta_u:5266: paricchedātmakam i[167.21]ti ca paricchidyate 'neneti paricchedas tadātmakam |
GSP28dhebta_u:5268: yadi vā pramāṇaśabdenopacārāt phalam evābhipretam iha evaṃbhūtaṃ pratyakṣapramāṇaphalāntaram āca^5kṣāṇaiś ca sāmarthyāt yata etad bhavati tat pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇam iti darśitam iti sarvathāvadātam teṣām eva bauddhaṃ prati vakroktiṃ darśayann āha -- tad eva [167.21] iti tad eva
GSP28dhebta_u:5270: prativādināṃ tīrthakānām ācāryadeśīyānāṃ ca tannirāsārthaṃ [167.24] buddhibhedanirāsārthaṃ, vipratipattinirāsārtham iti yāva^6t |
GSP28dhebta_u:5273: tathokto vārtikakṛtety āśaṅkyopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptim abhipretāṃ darśayann āha upalabdhī[167.25]ti
GSP28dhebta_u:5277: samananatarapratyayaḥ prāktanaṃ vijñānam, adhipatipratyayaś ca cakṣurādiḥ,
GSP28dhebta_u:5278: ālambyata iti kṛtvā ālambanapratyayo nīlādiḥ sa |
GSP28dhebta_u:5279: kim artham sā tathārūpā śāstrakṛtā [167.28] {p. 382} anyatra vyākhyātety āśaṅkāyām āha --
GSP28dhebta_u:5281: vipratipattim eva darśayann āha -- te hi [168.1]
GSP28dhebta_u:5283: dra[178]vyāṇām u[168.2]palambhakānīti vadatā ca yatraitāni santi tadupalambhe nimittaṃ dravya eva ca santīti dravyasyaivolambhe nimittam
GSP28dhebta_u:5284: amūni nopalambhamātra iti darśitam, anyathā abhāvasamavāyayor upalabdhir
GSP28dhebta_u:5286: na ca nāsti saṃyuktasamarthatayā viśeṣaṇabhāvena tayor upalambhasyanaiyāyikair iṣṭatvāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:5289: evam eṣāṃ abhidhānaṃ kuto jñāyata iti āha
GSP28dhebta_u:5291: vacanādi[168.3]ty ācaṣṭa iti draṣṭavyam anyathā asaṃgatam uktaṃ
GSP28dhebta_u:5293: asyāyam artho mahattvayukte mahatyupalabdhir bhavati na dvayaṇukādau |
GSP28dhebta_u:5294: yadi mahattvād upalabdhis tarhi paramamahattvepy avakāśādau sā kiṃ na bhavatīti paryanuyogāśaṃkāyāṃ tadvyavacchedārtham uktam anekadravyatvād iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:5295: athavā anekadravyāvayavās tadvattvam avayavino mahata eva na dvayaṇukasyety utpattyānyanirapekṣatvaṃ mahattvānekadravyatvayor iti lakṣaṇavikalpa evāyaṃ vivakṣitaṃ boddhavyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:5296: anekaṃ dravyam ārambhakatayā vidyate yasya tadbhāvas ta^3smāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:5297: anekadravyavattvād iti pāṭhe sarvadhanāder ākṛtigaṇatvena gaṇapāṭhād asya bahuvrīhipratiṣedhena śatur vidhe draṣṭavyaḥ (matuvidhiḥ dṛṣṭaḥ) anyathā karmadhārayamattvarthīyāt bahuvrīhir lāghaveneṣṭa ity anekaṃ dravyaṃ
GSP28dhebta_u:5298: [yasya] sa tathā tadbhāvas tasmād iti nirdeśaḥ prāpnoti
GSP28dhebta_u:5299: anekadravyavattvā(vyatvā)d iti pāṭhe tu na kaścid āyāsaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:5301: ^4mahattvād anekadravyavattvād anyata[ra]smād vā upalabdhir vāyāv api sā syāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:5305: [178] durvekānurodhena "dravyāṇām upalambhakāny āha" iti pāṭhaḥ syāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:5307: anupalabdhis tāval liṅgatvena tair iṣṭaivety āha -- evaṃ ca [168.3] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:5309: āśaṅkya ^5tanmata eva sthitvā āha -- saty api [168.4] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:5310: etad eva tanmatyaiva nidarśanenopapādayann āha -- nahi [168.5] iti |[179]na
GSP28dhebta_u:5312: anumānata upalabdhim eva tadīyāṃ darśayitum āha -- indriyatvāt [168.8] iti
GSP28dhebta_u:5313: | prāpyakārī [168.9] viṣayaṃ prāpya tena saha saṃyujya tatra jñānaṃ janayatīty arthaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:5314: e^6tac cārthakathanam avaseyam na tu anugamānaprayoga eṣa |
GSP28dhebta_u:5317: kītana(tadanaikāntikatvakīrtana)m evopasaṃharann āha -- tad evam i[168.11]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:5318: {p. 373} anaikāntikatvābhidhānaṃ ca teṣāṃ vaiśeṣikasūtre yathāśruti draṣṭavyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:5320: te hi rūpād ity udbhūtasamākhyātād iti viśeṣya ^7nāyanaraśmyavayavina upalabdhiṃ nivartayantīti
GSP28dhebta_u:5327: kuto vyabhicārāvakāśa [168.15] iti tayopalabdhilakṣaṇa^8prāptyā vartamānasyānupalabdhir iti ca
GSP28dhebta_u:5331: [179] mūle "bhavanti" ity eva mudritaṃ kiṃtu "na bhavanti" ity eva pāṭho
GSP28dhebta_u:5334: nanunaiyaikair yadupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptiśabdena mahattvādikam ucyate tasyāpy anavadyatvāt saivopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptir bhavatāpi kasmān nocyate kiṃ punar āhopuruṣikayānyābhidhīyata ity āśaṃkyāha mahattvādikaṃ tv i[168.16]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:5335: tam evā[60a]^1saṃbhavam āśrayābhāvadvāreṇa pratipādayitum āha nahī[168.17]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:5340: kiṃ bhūteneti āha tatpratibhāse[168.18]ti tasya rūpādeḥ pratibhāsaḥ pratibhāsata iti kṛtvā svarūpam eva tasya vivekaḥ pracyutis tadvatā |
GSP28dhebta_u:5344: idānīṃ dravyam abhyupagamya mahattvādeḥ tadupalambhakatvam apākartṛkāma āha na ce[168.20]ti
GSP28dhebta_u:5346: svahetusamudbhūte 'pi tatrāmahati dravyātmani tasyākiñcitkaratvād iti bhāvaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:5348: mahattvena tadbuddher api tata evotpatter iti cābhipretya na ca svarūpeṇāmahata [168.20] iti
GSP28dhebta_u:5349: ekasminn eva pakṣe sa doṣo darśito 'neneti
GSP28dhebta_u:5351: atha tatsaṃbandhe mā bhūd asya svato mahattā kiṃ naś chinnam arthāntarabhūtamahattvarūpeṇāsya grahaṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīty āha -- [168.21] --
GSP28dhebta_u:5357: na tu ca mahatvā(tva)n nāma kiñcit na cātra sa(tat) kasyācid upalaṃbhakaṃ nāmety api vaktavyam
GSP28dhebta_u:5361: rūpa^5sya na tathā grāhakatvam i[168.24]ti sambandhanīyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:5363: {p. 384} grāhakaṃ tasya bhāvas tattvam iti cārtho draṣtavyaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:5368: svarūpeṇa prātisvikena ātmanā grahaṇe saty anyasyopalabdhau tasyeti pratyāsatteḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:5370: ayam asyāśayo rūpaṃ hi gṛhyamāṇam evopalambhakaṃ yuktaṃ, nānyathā |
GSP28dhebta_u:5371: na tac ca dravyarūpeṇa gṛhyate tadgrāhiṇo jñānasya bhrāntatvaprasaṃgāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:5373: tathāpy asya tathātvam upagacchāmo yadi tato bhedena tatpratibhāsaḥ ^7syān na caitad astīti pratipādayann āha dravyarūpasye[168.23]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:5376: etac ca dūṣaṇaṃ mahattvepy upalaṃbhe draṣtavyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:5382: nirguṇam api dvitīye kṣaṇe saguṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīty āha na ce[168.27]ti
GSP28dhebta_u:5390: nanu ca pūrvarūpanāśe tasyaiva nāśād rūpāntarāvirbhāve cānyasyaiva bhāvāt kathaṃ yad eva mahattvādikaṃ prati prāgapratipannādhārabhāvaṃ tad
GSP28dhebta_u:5391: evādhā[60b]^1ratāṃ yāyād iti ced ayam aparo 'stu doṣo 'syety abhiprāyād adoṣa eṣaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:5392: ihāpi mahattvādikaṃ prati dravyam ādhāro nopapadyata iti darśayann āha -- na ce[169.1]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:5396: yathā cākṣaṇikaḥ krameṇākrameṇa vārthakriyām upakalpayituṃ na kalpyate tathoditaṃ purastāt
GSP28dhebta_u:5397: | samavāyikāraṇasyeti prakaraṇāt mahattvādikaṃ prati samavāyikāraṇasyāsyopalambhasya dravyasyety artho 'vaseyaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:5398: syād etad yadi nāmānantaroditayā nītyā taṃ prati tasyādhārabhāvo nopapadyate tathāpi tadanādhāra eva tatsamavayikāraṇaṃ kiṃ na bhavatīty āha yata [169.3] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:5401: yatas tathā vyapadeśam aśnata ity āha -- na ce[169.4]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:5403: ayam asyāśayo labdhātmasattvenaiva hi tathā janayitavyaṃ na tv āgṛhītamahattvādirūpeṇa tenotpattavyam
GSP28dhebta_u:5404: kāryakāraṇabhāvābhāvenāta^4ddhetukatvaprasaṃgāt kṣaṇika[ta]yā tu dvitīyekṣaṇe 'sattvāt na svotkalitakāryajananam iti -- paścād ādhāra [183]bhāvo [169.5] na cety anuvartate, svahetvāgatasya tadādhārarūpasyāvināśād iti bhāvaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:5407: {p. 385} tadabhāvepi katham asaṃbhavīty āha -- yasmād i[169.6]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:5412: iti[169.11]r hetau śāstrakāraḥ prakaraṇātvārtikakāraḥ| abhāvaśabdena abhāvo abhāvavyavahāraś
GSP28dhebta_u:5413: cābhipretya(ta) ity abhiprāyeṇa āha -- abhāvavyavahārahetuś ce[169.13]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:5414: yā tv i[169.13]tyādi bruvataś cāyam abhiprāyo -- yadi vyāpakādyanupalabdhyabhiprāyeṇābhāvavyavahārayetur veti vaktum adhyavasyāha -- naitad rūpāt abhāvaśabdenāpy abhāvavyavahārasya viṣayeṇa viṣayiṇo nirdeśasambhavena vaktuṃ śakyatvāt bruvan viśiṣṭām evānupalabdhim abipraitīti upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptānupalabdher vyāpāram imaṃ kathayatā ca vārtikakṛtā sāmarthyād yad atropadarśitaṃ anyatra tu sākṣād abhihitam tad api darśayann āha -- yā tv anupalabdhī[169.15]tyādi
GSP28dhebta_u:5416: kutaḥ punas tad anyavastuvijñānam evecchantīti jñāyata ity apekṣāyāṃ yojyam -- vijñānaṃ vānyavastunīti vacanād i[169.21]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:5419: nanu bhavanmate kim upadhī(m upalabdhā) kaścid ātmāsti, yenaivam ucyate ity āha -- upalabhamānaś co vyaktam etad ity asminn arthe yasmād arthe vā |
GSP28dhebta_u:5422: tat kim upalabdhijanakas tathāvidha-upalabhamāna ucyata ity āśaṃkyāha
GSP28dhebta_u:5423: kāmam evam uca(cya)tām [61a]^1tathāpīndriyādeḥ kathaṃ tattvam ity āha na ce[169.28]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:5425: janakatvam iti prakaraṇāt upalabdhijanakatvam ity arthaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:5429: hetvanavasthitau ca kāryārthino niyatakāraṇopādānaṃ na syād iti bhāvaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:5430: āśrayatvāt tarhy asau kartā ^2bhaviṣyatīty āha -- āśrayatvam
GSP28dhebta_u:5432: kṣaṇikatve utpattikṣaṇamātrasattve sati sthiter upādātirekiṇyā abhāvāt
GSP28dhebta_u:5433: na pātābhāvas tasyāḥ [170.14] patanasyaivāsaṃbhavād iti bhāvaḥ
GSP28dhebta_u:5434: | kuto na patanaṃ tasyā yato na pātābhāvaḥ sthitir ity āha -- tasyāḥ
GSP28dhebta_u:5438: nirguṇatvāt, nirguṇatvañ ca guṇānāṃ "aguṇatvaṃ dravyāśritatvaṃ ce"ti
GSP28dhebta_u:5439: vacanāt, gurutvaṃ ca guṇaḥ "gurutvaṃ jalabhūmyoḥ patanakāraṇam" iti vacanāc ca gurutvābhāvaḥ
GSP28dhebta_u:5440: mā bhūd gurutvaṃ tasyāḥ patanaṃ tu kiṃ na bhavatīty āha -- saṃ[184]yogābhāva [170.15] iti
GSP28dhebta_u:5441: yadi gurutvād eva patanaṃ bhavet na ^4tarhi śākhādau phalānyavatiṣṭheteti saṃyogābhāve
GSP28dhebta_u:5445: kṛtāntaḥ [170.16] siddhāntaḥ samavāyāt upalabdhes tatra samavāyād ity
GSP28dhebta_u:5449: ādhāryādhārabhāvaḥ sa cātmano nityasya sa saṃbhavatīti bhāvaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:5450: yady apy u^5palabdher na pātaḥ sambhavī tathāpy asau kim ādhāro na bhavatīty
GSP28dhebta_u:5451: āśaṅkya pūrvasmin pakṣa eva prativacanaṃ darśayati |
GSP28dhebta_u:5453: apatanadharmakatvaṃ ca tasyā gurutvābhāvād anantaram eva pratipāditam |
GSP28dhebta_u:5454: anenaitad darśayati -- patanadharmaṇo jalādeḥ pātapratibandhakaḥ kaścid ādhāro bhavatu yāvad ya^6di tatrāpi kaścit ko
GSP28dhebta_u:5456: na tv apatanadharmaṇa iti tad āhaprāmāṇikacakracūḍāmaṇiḥ--
GSP28dhebta_u:5476: nidarśanenopapadya^8māno 'rthaḥ sujñāto bhavatīty nidarśanāntaram āha yathā ca [170.27] iti
GSP28dhebta_u:5479: upadarśitadvayavad viśiṣṭa [171.3] uttarapadārthābhāvaviśiṣṭe arthe [171.3] tatsadṛśa iti yāvat |
GSP28dhebta_u:5486: tathā vidhisāmānayena samantāt svīkṛṛtottarapadārthapratiṣedhasya kathaṃ punar etat jñātavyam ity atrāyaṃ na ...ttarapadārthapratiṣedhamātravṛttiḥ prasahyavṛttir atra tu
GSP28dhebta_u:5487: uttarapadārthābhāvaviśiṣṭasadṛśavastuvṛttiḥ paryudāsavṛttiḥ ity āśaṅkāyām āha yatra [171.4] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:5488: yatraivam evaṃ tatra paryudāsavṛttitā [171.6] iti sambandhaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:5489: vidheḥ prādhā^2nyam a[171.4]bhidheyatayā bhāvarūpaṃ pratipādyata ity arthaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:5492: kṣatriyādiḥ svapadenātmavācakena nocyate paryudāsam arthapratipādake vākye iti boddhavyam na tu "samāsanimitte anvākhyānavākya" iti nityasamāsatvād asya tadasaṃbhavāt ^3itarathā "rajñāḥ puruṣamānaya" ityādivat kṣatriyānayane vivakṣite na brāhmaṇamānayetyādir api prayogaḥ prasajyeta |
GSP28dhebta_u:5493: yat tu [na] brāhmaṇo 'brāhmaṇa ity ucyate tad brāhmaṇo na bhavati
GSP28dhebta_u:5495: paryudāse prasajyapratiṣedhopy astīti kṛtvā, na punaḥ samāsārthamanvākhānavākyaṃ
GSP28dhebta_u:5496: ^4tat, kumbhaṃ karotīti kumbhakāraḥ kumbhasya samīpam upakuṃbham ityādivad iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:5497: yadi svapadena nocyate kathaṃ nāmāsav ucyeta iti cet |
GSP28dhebta_u:5499: anyaśabdasyaiva tatra prayogāt ekavākyatā ca tathārthakathane vākye nañarthavācakasyānyaśabdasya suvantenaia padāntareṇābhisambandhāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:5500: etad eva^5 sāmānyopadarśitaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ prakṛte yojayann āha vi[185]dhiś
GSP28dhebta_u:5502: evaṃ tatpratiṣedhaḥ pratīyata ity āha -- vivakṣitopalabdher anivartana [171.8]
GSP28dhebta_u:5504: kathaṃ tarhy asāv ucyata ity āha kiṃ tarhī[171.10]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:5505: katham anyaśabdenocyate na tu svaśabdenety āha anyaśabdasyaive[171.11]ti^6 |
GSP28dhebta_u:5506: vākya iti tattvārthakathane vākya [171.11] iti pratyeyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:5507: tatrāpi kathamanyaśabdaprayoga ity apekṣāyāṃ yojyaṃ paryudāsāśrayeṇe[171.10]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:5508: etad eva darśayati anyopalabdhir anupalabdhir i[171.11]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:5514: ekavākyatvaṃ na vākyabhedaṃ(daḥ) sāmānādhikaraṇyam ity arthaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:5515: tad eva darśayann āha -- anyā[186]upalabdhir anupalabdhir
GSP28dhebta_u:5519: kasyacid arthasya prasaṅgam upadarśanam adhikāraṃ kṛtvā yo niṣedha uttarapadārthapratiṣedhamātraṃ yatrābhi^8dheyam ity arthaḥ mayūravyaṃsakāditvāc ca {p. 388} samāsaḥ |[187]tadviparītaḥ upadarśitaparyudāsaviparītaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:5520: vaiparityam eva sukhapratipattyartham upadarśayann aha -- tatra hī[171.14]tyādi |
GSP28dhebta_u:5522: vidhiḥ kasyacid arthasya vidhānaṃ arthāt sāmarthyāt gamyate [171.14] yadā vidhipratītis tadārthād iti ca draṣṭavyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:5523: [62a] ^1tathāhi "abhihite na bhavanti dvitīyādyāḥ vibhaktayaḥ" ity ukter viśeṣapratiṣedhasya
GSP28dhebta_u:5524: śeṣadhīnāntarīyakatvād iti lakṣaṇāt sāmarthyād anabhihite bhavatīti gamyate |
GSP28dhebta_u:5525: sūryaṃ na paśyantīti nātra pradṛ(naño 'tradṛ)śinā tiñantena saṃbaddho na tu subanteneti vākyabhedaḥ
GSP28dhebta_u:5527: sūryadarśanādiḥ svapadena [171.15] svavācakena sūryaṃ na paśyantīti anenocyate |
GSP28dhebta_u:5529: prasajyavṛttinañsamāse tatsaṃbhavād iti sarvañ caitat prakaraṇādito jñātuṃ śakyam iti sarvam avadātam |
GSP28dhebta_u:5534: prāsaṃgikaṃ parisamāpayya saṃprati prakṛtam anudhunva(nubandhna)nn āha tad evam i[171.16]ti |[188]bhāvato [171.26] vastunaḥ paramārthata iti
GSP28dhebta_u:5537: sopy arthāntarabhūtaḥ sambandhaḥ^3 kathaṃ tayor iti
GSP28dhebta_u:5538: paryanuyoge tadanyakalpanā, tatrāpy evam ity anavasthā prastutavastuvyavasthāparipaṃthinī syāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:5541: [188] sambandhābhāvataḥ S iti tu na yuktaṃ, "sambandho bhāvato" iti tu anuṭīkānurodhena samyak pāṭhaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:5542: tatra vijñāne kiṃ bhūtaṃ sadghaṭarūpam tatra svākāram arpayatīty apekṣāyāṃ yojyam tathāvidham yathāvidhaṃ pradeśarūpaṃ tathāvidhaṃ sat vyavadhānaviprakarṣādirahitam ity arthaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:5544: etad eva sphuṭayann āha tad i[172.20]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:5550: evaṃ cācakṣāṇena krameṇaiva tāni purovartīni tulyayogyatārūpāṇi vastūni gṛhya^5nte jñānena tu yugapad iti sāmarthyād darśitam |
GSP28dhebta_u:5560: ayam asyāśayo yadi saty apy ekasminn asmin karaṇe 'nekatra ghaṭādike karmaṇi kartranekatvād anekakriyodayo varṇyate tarhi kartrekatvāt kriyaikatvam iti sāmarthyād āyātam {p. 389}
GSP28dhebta_u:5561: tataś ca na karaṇaikatvānuvidhānaṃ kriyaikatvasyeti kim anenoktenāpīti |
GSP28dhebta_u:5562: syād etat yathā tatra kartāro^7 bahavaḥ pratipattāras tathā
GSP28dhebta_u:5563: karaṇānyapīndriyāṇi bahūny eva tataś ca karaṇabāhulyād evānekatra karmaṇi kriyābāhulyam iti karaṇaikatvāt kriyaikatvaṃ vyavasthitam iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:5565: yato jvalyamāne dīpe pratyekam ekasminn evendriye pradīpe vā karaṇe sarveṣām eva pratipatṝṇām
GSP28dhebta_u:5568: ayam asyābhiprāyo yaḥ kila labdhātmasattāka eva paścāt svātantryeṇa kāṃcit kriyām abhiniveśayati sa kartā, yaś ca kriyāsiddhau sādhakatamaḥ sa karaṇam ucyate |
GSP28dhebta_u:5569: tathā sata eva kadācit kriyāyogād arthāntarabhūtā kriyā jāyate kṣaṇamātrasthāyī ca kṛtsnā(sno) bhāva [62b] ^1iti kathaṃ sattvam āsādya tathākārī tathā pratipatsyate kriyāsvarthā(kriyām arthā)ntarabhūtām
GSP28dhebta_u:5571: saṃprati kṣaṇikākṣaṇikayor asādhāraṇadūṣaṇam āha -- na ce[173.8]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:5574: idānīm ekajñānasaṃsargād ity atraikaśabdārthaṃ nirūpayitum āha
GSP28dhebta_u:5577: nirākārapakṣe dvyādisaṃkhyānirāsārtha ekaḥ śabdaḥ sākārapakṣepicitrādvaitavādimatena tathaivaikaśabdaḥ
GSP28dhebta_u:5579: paramārthatas tv ekasminn eva dravye paramāṇusamūhātmake prati paramāṇu tadākāradhārīṇya^3r
GSP28dhebta_u:5580: vāgdarśanaṃ saṃkṣepāny eva(darśanaprasaṃge yāny eva) jñānāny utpadyanta iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:5581: asmiṃś ca pakṣe yac codyam, yaś ca parihāras tad dvayam api
GSP28dhebta_u:5583: yogyatāyā [173.23] iti prakaraṇāt pratiṣedhyatadviviktapradeśayoḥ svajñānopajananayogyatāyā ity arthaḥ ekasmin jñāne saṃsraṣṭuṃ śīlaṃ yayos tau tathoktau^4 |
GSP28dhebta_u:5587: kā punar atra tayoḥ pratyāsattiḥ sambhavinīty āha -- ekajñāne[174.1]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:5589: yadā tajjñānaṃ tadā jñātṛdharmalakṣaṇānupalabdhir yadā tatsvabhāvas tadā jñeyadharmalakṣaṇā tadviviktajñānam e^5va paryudāsavṛttyānupalabdhir ucyatām, na tu tatsvabhāvo vetikumārilo [174.11] mīmāṃsāvārtikakāro manyata iti śeṣaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:5590: kartṛkarmasthatvavivakṣayopalabdher dvaitād anupalabdher api tathaiva dvaitam āyātaṃ nyāyata iti manyate |
GSP28dhebta_u:5592: {p. 390} āśaṃkya dvayor apy upayogāviśeṣaṃ pratipādayann āha
GSP28dhebta_u:5595: athaikaikatraikaikaṃ nāstīti kathaṃ dvayos tattvārtham iti cet |
GSP28dhebta_u:5598: tathāhi yasmāt kevalapradeśākāraṃ jñānaṃ mayā saṃvedyate tasmāddhaṭo nāstīti vyavaharamāṇasyāpi pradeśo vijñānāvac chedakatvenopayujyata eva |
GSP28dhebta_u:5600: tato nāsti ghaṭa iti vyavaharatopi darśanaṃ pradeśopādhibhāvena vyāpriyata eveti |
GSP28dhebta_u:5606: 'smākaṃ sthānaṃ[189]sthitaṃ vyavasthānaṃ matam iti yāvat tasmin |
GSP28dhebta_u:5609: [175.18] caśabdād agrahaṇaṃ cāvatiṣṭhate tayor iti prakara[63a]^1ṇāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:5612: etasmin vyākhyāne bhāvapradhānaḥ sādhanaśabdovārtikakārasya vivakṣita unnetavya ity abhiprāyeṇa sādhanatvam i[176.6]ti vyācaṣṭe |
GSP28dhebta_u:5617: abhāvasya nāstīti jñānajanane [176.10] nityaṃ tajjananaprasaṅga [176.10] iti yojayitvā kuta etad ity apekṣā^2yām
GSP28dhebta_u:5619: tadanapekṣatvam eva katham asyety apekṣāyām anādheyātiśayaṃ [176.10]
GSP28dhebta_u:5623: ekaṃ(ekāṃ) vidhām abhidhāya aparām upadarśayitum āha athave[176.11]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:5624: sādhanam eva [176.12] sādhakam eva niścāyakam eveti^3 yāvat
GSP28dhebta_u:5632: {p. 391} prakārāntareṇāpy abhāvavyavahārasiddher avibandhāt kiṃ tavaitatpakṣāśrayaṇaprayatneneti parapakṣa evāśaṃkyāparasyaivābhiprāyaṃ
GSP28dhebta_u:5638: ghaṭābhāvavyavahāram iti pratipadyata ity asyānuvartanād uktam kevalapradeśābhiprāyeṇa sākṣād grahaṇam [177.15] |
GSP28dhebta_u:5642: evaṃ hi lokapratītir anukūlitā bhavatīti bhāvaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:5643: madhye ghaṭābhāvapratīter bhāvāt pāraṃparyeṇāpi [177.18] ity ācaṣṭe paraḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:5647: para eva viśeṣam āśaṃkya pariharann āha nanv asty eve[178.8]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:5651: evaṃ sati ko guṇa ity āha --sāṃkhya(khyaḥ)
GSP28dhebta_u:5652: svamate guṇaṃ darśayann āha tathe[178.18]ti tathā sahī(tī)ti yojyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:5655: [179.1] talliṅgam evaṃ sati bhavatīty artho 'vaseya iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:5658: tad api pararūpeṇa na kiñcid ity abhiprāyeṇāha -- pararūpeṇa [179.16] tasyāpi tuccharūpatvād
GSP28dhebta_u:5664: kathaṃ punas tathātve parasya tatrābhāvo na syād ity āha -- yo hī[179.22]ti rūpāntarantu sadṛśarūpāntarantu
GSP28dhebta_u:5668: viṣayeṇa vāmunā viṣayiṇo vidhānasya vidhīyamānadharmasya -- nirdeśo draṣṭavyaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:5673: pratītāv ity antarbhū[63b]^1to ñijartho draṣṭavyas tenākāraṇasya pratyāyakājanakasya pratītau pratyāyane sāmarthyāsambhavāt [180.2] prakaraṇāt tasya [180.5]
GSP28dhebta_u:5675: arthāntarasya sato {p. 392} gamakatve hi tajjanitatvaṃ sāmarthyaṃ vācyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:5676: nacārthāntaraprasajyapratiṣedhena sakalaśaktivikalena tajjanitaṃ yenāsya tathābhāvo bhaved iti bhāvaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:5677: avaśyaṃ kiṃ tena tatkāraṇena bhāvyaṃ yenākāraṇasyety u^2cyamānaṃ śobhetety āha tādātmye[180.3]ti
GSP28dhebta_u:5682: syād etad yadi tattvavyavasthāpakād eva pramāṇād ghaṭasyādheyabhūtasyābhāvaḥ siddhyati, tarhi tasya ghaṭāsaṃsṛṣṭarūpatvasidhyartham abhāvapramāṇam abhyupeyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:5685: pratyādhā^3rabhāvo 'syābhāvapramāṇapratiṣedhyaḥ prāpta ity āśaṃkāyāṃ yathā dvayam apy etat tata eva prasiddhyati tathā pradarśayituṃ dvividho
GSP28dhebta_u:5697: iti, ghaṭād anya eva sānu(san) -- tatsaṃyogīti vivakṣitam tad eva kaivalyaṃ spaṣṭayann āha -- ghaṭaṃ pratī[180.11]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:5698: tasya pradeśasya tadvivekena [180.12] ghaṭa^5rūpavivekena ca pratyakṣeṇa grahaṇe sati |
GSP28dhebta_u:5710: yad vā pratyakṣasiddhatā tadaiva neti yojyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:5711: yad vā sā parānabhyupagatāpekṣyate kiṃ tadā pratyakṣasiddhatety āśaṃkāyāṃ
GSP28dhebta_u:5716: saṃyoga eva samavāyaśabdenokta iti vyācakṣāṇaś ca dhūmo hi saṃyogī hetur ity abhipraiti |
GSP28dhebta_u:5717: kutaḥ punaḥ svaśabdenaiva {p. 393} go nokta ity āha --
GSP28dhebta_u:5720: yad vā bhedena bhinnena vācakena yo vyapadeśam ā(śa ā)khyānaṃ tatrānādarād iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:5721: kiṃ punaḥ samavāya eva nocyata ity āha pareṣāṃ tv i[180.3]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:5722: evaṃ tāvadbhaṭṭārcaṭovyācaṣṭa anye punar asthāna evāsya mativibhramo jāta ity ācakṣate |
GSP28dhebta_u:5723: tathāhi dhūmāvayavidharmiṇi parvate vā dhūmatve(mavattve)na dhūmatvena ca hetunā
GSP28dhebta_u:5724: sāgni[64a]^1tvaṃ sādhyata ity ekārthasamavāyyeva dhūmo hetur iti pare saṃsacate (saṃcakṣate)
GSP28dhebta_u:5725: purastāc cāyaṃ tasmād dhūma evātra dharmī kartavyaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:5726: sāgnir ayaṃ dhūmo dhūmatvād ityudyotakaramatam adarśayad idānīṃ tu tadvismṛtyaivaṃ vyācakṣāṇovārtikakāram apy avajñayātra(jñāpātra)m āpādayatīti -- kim atra brūma iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:5733: prasaṅgoranityā(ṅgenetyā)dinā ^2ca pariharatā anena yadīśvarasenamatānupraveśena kaścid anyabhāvatadabhāvayor amīṣām anyatamaṃ sambandham icchati tadabhāvopadarśanena sa tāvat kaṇṭhoktenaiva nirasyate
GSP28dhebta_u:5734: | sāmarthyāc ca yepinaiyāyikā-- "na vayam anayor gamyagamakabhāvaṃ
GSP28dhebta_u:5736: pratīyate" ity abhi^3manyante tepy anyabhāvatadabhāvayoḥ sambandhābhāvena
GSP28dhebta_u:5737: viśeṣyaviśeṣaṇabhāvānupapatteḥ kathaṃ tajjanmanaḥ pratyakṣasya vārtāpi yena tadavaseyo 'sattvād bhavitum arhatīti nirastā bhavantīty abhiprāyeṇānyabhāvatadabhāvayoḥ sambandhābhāvo vibhāvita iti veditavyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:5738: asyaivārthasya punar uktatāṃ parihartum āha ^4pūrvaṃ hi [181.11] iti |

GSP28dhebta_u:6077: adhunatanāḥ punar anvayavyatirekiṇaṃ paṃcalakṣaṇam anvayinaṃ vyatirekiṇaṃ caturlakṣaṇalakṣaṇam ācakṣata iti sāmānyenanaiyāyikagrahaṇe vyākhyāyamāne tanmatāvedanamasyāveditaṃ syād iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:6082: tathā jñātatvaṃ cā[206.6]paraṃ rūpam iti prāguktam anuvartate |
GSP28dhebta_u:6087: yathā kila kenacit kutūhalinā kaścit tapasvī strīrūpadhāriṇī tṛtīyāṃ prakṛtiṃ paricaraṇāyogyāṃ śabdavācyām udvāhya putraṃ tadarthakriyāṃ vā vyapadeśena prārthyate tena tulyam idaṃ yadavinābhāvavikalaṃ hetum upadarśya dharmiṇi sādhyakathanam iti manvānaḥ paropahāsapūrvakamāhācaryaḥśaṇḍham mūlamanūdyasyātvaṃ(rthaṃ?) prakṛte yojayan darśayati -- tasminn
GSP28dhebta_u:6093: tallakṣaṇaṃ^7 putraṃ mṛ[212]gyate [207.17] prārthyate yācyata iti yāvat |
GSP28dhebta_u:6094: nanu cānyatrāvinābhāvyapi hetus tatra sādhyaṃ vibhāvayed iti ko 'yam upahāsa ity āha nahī[207.20]ti
GSP28dhebta_u:6096: ambhaś cedaṃ nādeyam iti prayoge caitad ucyata ity avaseyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:6100: ambhas tv ādiṣu [207.25] hetuyopanīteṣu tathā darśanāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:6103: vyāpakābhāve vyāpyasyāpy avaśyam abhāva iti bhāvaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:6106: ata eve[208.21]ti bādhakapramāṇe sati sādhyābhāvād eva |
GSP28dhebta_u:6109: hetoḥ sāmarthyaṃ hetusāmarthyaṃ tatpratipādayann āha paraḥ [209.2] |
GSP28dhebta_u:6111: {p. 404} darśayann iti [209.2] hetau śaturvidhānāt tatrābādhāyā anyathātvapradarśanād ity arthaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:6114: yatrāsau tadartham abhidhānīyaḥ sa hetuprayogasya viṣayaḥ [209.6] |
GSP28dhebta_u:6117: vai[209.9]śabdo 'kṣamāyāṃ bādhānupalabdhir abādhetyādi yad ucyate tatra kṣamyata ity arthaḥ
GSP28dhebta_u:6120: tasyā [209.10] itir mātrārthānāṃ bhayahetur apādānam ity apādānatvād apādāne pañcamīyam
GSP28dhebta_u:6122: praśnārthasya kiṃ śabdasyāprayogepi kākur eva śiraḥkampasahitā praśnaṃ prakāśayatīty abhiprāyeṇa pṛcchatī[209.16]ti vyācaṣṭe |
GSP28dhebta_u:6123: bādhānupalabdhir abādheti abhidhānād uktam etad i[209.16-17]ty abhiprāyavān paraḥ prāhoktam
GSP28dhebta_u:6125: kim arthaṃ prayujyate [209.18] sa hetur iti sāmarthyāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:6131: tadbhāvāyogād viṣayatvāyogāt sādhakapramāṇasyānumānasyāvṛtter yad uktaṃ "vyastohetor anāśraya" iti bhāvaḥ |[214]kiṃ yathā bādhāvinābhāvayor i[213.9]ti pāṭho yuktarūpaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:6132: kiṃśabdaviyukte tu pāṭhe saśiraḥkampayākāṃkṣā evaṃvadataḥ praśno 'bhiprāyagato draṣṭavyaḥ
GSP28dhebta_u:6138: viruddhasyāpi viparyaye samyagdhetutvāt tadabhiprāyeṇa viparyayasya ce[213.23]ty uktam
GSP28dhebta_u:6146: tathāvidhe[215.12] tathā {p. 405} bhūtaviśeṣavati paṭū tathāvidhe sādhye kvacid dharmiṇi [215.13] saṃbhavati sati |
GSP28dhebta_u:6148: vedaprāmāṇyanirākartṛṣv i[217.14]ti pratyakṣādyadhikāropi tenāsaṃvādādītyādiṣv ity abhipretaṃ -- yad āha --vārtike kumārilaḥ--
GSP28dhebta_u:6153: [215] Ślokavārtike tu -- "pratyakṣādyagatāthatvādīdṛgbuddhādivākyavat" iti uttarādharma saugatair i[217.14]tivārtikakārāt pūrvair iti vivakṣitam |
GSP28dhebta_u:6162: keṣāṃ na kaściddhetuḥ syād ityāha ekasaṃkhyāvādinām i[218.1]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:6166: na kathañcid vyavacchedahetukaṃ[216][218.9] kenāpi prakāreṇa nityānityavyavacchedahetutvam
GSP28dhebta_u:6183: yad asya sāmarthyam āsīt tat tadupadarśanenotkīlitaṃ {p. 406} apanītaṃ [219.8] iti vyācakṣāṇaś cotkīlitam apanītaṃ sādhanasāmarthyaṃ yasya śrāvaṇatvalakṣaṇasya hetoḥ sa tathokto mūlagrantha iti darśayati |
GSP28dhebta_u:6184: nanu tāni vastūni te ca puruṣāḥ pratihetunaitadviparītarūpopadarśanadvārā tathābhūtāyāḥ saṃpadaḥ
GSP28dhebta_u:6185: pracyāvyante, na tu tena hetuneti kim ucyate tāni vastūni nityatvasaṃpadaḥ
GSP28dhebta_u:6186: pracyāvya tāṃś ca puruṣāṇ svargāpavarasampada [219.8] iti cet, satyam etat kevalaṃ yasmād asau vidyamāna eva svayaṃ prāpitāyās tathābhūtāyāḥ saṃpadaḥ
GSP28dhebta_u:6187: pracyāvyamānā na samānajātīyena pareṇa ^5tāni vastūni tāṃś ca puruṣāṃs trāyasva trāyasveti phūtkāraṃ viplavam ābhāṣamāṇānīva svajīvitam apekṣamāṇa ivopekṣate |
GSP28dhebta_u:6188: tasmāt pracyāvyā vayaṃ taṃ paraṃ prayuktaṃ ivety abhiprāyād adoṣatraya (?) iti cet, sarvañcaitat kiṃ yo vastuto asaṃbhavāt pratihetur ityādidūṣaṇam avādhitaviṣayatve 'pi lakṣaṇe pratihetupa^6dam
GSP28dhebta_u:6190: ata evasmābhir etann idānam eva kiṃ vastuto 'saṃbhavadbādhatvam abādhitaviṣayatvam abhipretamutāpratibhāsamānabādhatvam api kiṃ tadaiva kiṃ vā anyeṣām api |
GSP28dhebta_u:6192: anyeṣām api kiṃ tadaivātha kālāntare 'pītyādi vikalpya sarvatra yathā ^7yogaṃ dūṣaṇam upanayadbhir ātmanirākaraṇe '...ādhi[ta]tvam ātmasādhanasya pratisaṃdhānalakṣaṇasya hetor viśeṣaṇam apahastitam |
GSP28dhebta_u:6199: anarthapratilambha eva syāt [221.1] arthapratilambho na syād evety arthaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:6202: yady evaṃ bāhyasyaiva hetutvam astu tatkim anena prayāsenety āha -- sādhye[221.3]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:6203: kathaṃ tarhi vikalpārūḍhānāṃ sāmānyākārāṇāṃ paramārthato bāhyāṅgāsaṃsparśināṃ saṃpādakatvaṃ sādhyasādhanabhāvaḥ [69a]^1kāryādirūpatvaṃ cety āśaṅkyāha --
GSP28dhebta_u:6208: [221.4] ekasminn apy arthe nānārūpaṃ kṛtakatvānityatvādi, ekatvaṃ sāmānyam anugāmirūpaṃ, vyatirekaṃ tayoḥ paraspara(raṃ) dharmiṇaś ca bhedaṃ hetau
GSP28dhebta_u:6220: vyapadeśa^3nibandhanam iti ca vyapadeśa "indriyam asthānam etad rājana
GSP28dhebta_u:6225: jñānasya bāhyaliṅgarūpatvaṃ nirākṛtya sāmānyākārarūpatvam api nirākurvann āha vikalpāvabhāsī ca [221.7] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:6232: vikalpākārād bhedena pratyetum aśakyatvāt pratibimbasyeva pratibimbakasyāpohasya athavā anayā vacanabhaṅgyā buddhayākāro 'pi
GSP28dhebta_u:6234: kathaṃ tasya sāmānyātmatvavyvasthety āha -- yasmād i[221.10]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:6238: tathā ca jñānaṃ kiṃ na rūpaṃ liṅgasyety āha -- tathātve ca [221.11] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:6242: rūpa[222]m abhidhīyate [221.17] evaṃvidhaṃ liṅgasya rūpam ity abhidhīyate |
GSP28dhebta_u:6253: na hi teṣv asatsv i[222.2]ti bruvato 'yaṃ bhāvo yadi tatra sādhyaṃ na bhavet tadā tadavyabhicārivastudarśanapranāḍikayā tatra jñānam eva na bhavet |
GSP28dhebta_u:6254: yadi ca liṅge dhūmādau mahattvādisamavāyo na
GSP28dhebta_u:6255: syāt, yadi ca tasyendriyeṇa saṃyogo na^7 bhavet, tadā tadviṣayaṃ pratyakṣam eva na bhavet
GSP28dhebta_u:6256: asati ca tasmin na liṅgini vijñānam utpadyeta tathālokā bhāve 'pi tathaiva liṅgijñānānutpattir jñātavyā |
GSP28dhebta_u:6267: "sapakṣe bhāvena" [222.19] kiṃ bhūtenety āha -- vipakṣe [222.19] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:6268: sarvatra vipakṣe yo 'bhāvaḥ tadviśiṣṭena [222.21] kiṃ bhūtena sarvatra
GSP28dhebta_u:6270: tādātmyatadutpattī lakṣaṇe nimitte yasya bhāvasya sa tathā tadviśiṣṭena [222.21] |
GSP28dhebta_u:6271: nanu ca darśanādarśananibandhanau sapakṣāsapakṣayo[69a]^1r bhāvābhāvāv apy anyonyaviśiṣṭāv eva tat ko 'tiśayo 'nenokta ity āśaṅkyāha -- etad uktaṃ bhavatī[222.22]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:6285: pratiyogyapekṣayā tadviviktapadārthalakṣaṇasya paramatāśrayaṇena caivam abhidhānam siddhyanti [224.1] vyavahārayogyatām upayānti |
GSP28dhebta_u:6288: tathā ca ayatnasiddhaḥ sarvaḥ sarvadarśīty āśayaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:6293: |sūtrakārīyaniścitagrahaṇasāphalyam upavarṇayatāvārtikakṛtāsvānumatir atra darśitaivety abhiprāyeṇa ācāryavacanam iva kṛtvā iha asmābhiś ca [224.21]
GSP28dhebta_u:6296: sarvatra tadabhāve avaśyam abhāvo neti pūrvakam anuvartanīyam |
GSP28dhebta_u:6300: 'vaseyo yata evaṃ tasmād [224.20] yataḥ pramāṇād anayor bhāvābhāvayor bhavati niścayas tadadhīnatā tayor bhāvābhāvayoḥ sattā vyavasthety asyārthasya jñāpanārthaṃ niścitavacanaṃ kṛtam iti |ācāryadignāgakṛtaniścitagrahaṇārthe bhūyaḥ saṃhriyamāṇevartikakāreṇa katham asmā^5bhir ity ucyata ity āśaṃkyāha -- asmābhir i[225.9]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:6302: niścitagrahaṇe [225.9] asmākam abhimatatvād i[225.10]ti vacanena caivaṃācāryasyābhiprāyaṃ darśayati |
GSP28dhebta_u:6303: tac ced asmākam abhimatam eva tadāsmābhir evoktam iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:6304: evaṃ tāvad anena vyākhyātaṃ lakṣyate punar ayam asyārthaḥ -- {p. 409} etad arthaṃ sūtrakāreṇapramāṇasamuccaye^6 -- mayā ca viniścayādau niścitagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam ity abhipretyācāryavārtikakāreṇāvābhyām ity asminn arthe 'smābhir
GSP28dhebta_u:6306: dvayor arthayor bahuvacanaṃ kena vacaneneti "asmadordvayoś ca" ity aneneti brūma iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:6307: ato 'pi nyāyāt iti pāṭhoḥ ata eva nyāyāt [225.12] iti tu pramādapāṭhaḥ
GSP28dhebta_u:6310: sapakṣe bhāva ucyata [226. ] ity anena ca sādhye saty eva bhāvo lakṣitas tathā abhāvo 'sapakṣa [226.1] ity anena asati sādhye abhāva eva
GSP28dhebta_u:6312: vyāvṛttikṛtaṃ bhedam upādāya [226.9] iti tatrābhāvavyāvṛttyā bhāvo vyavasthāpyate |
GSP28dhebta_u:6314: paramārthato bhedo nāsti [226.10] iti bruvato^8yaṃ bhāvaḥ tasmin saty eva bhāvo bhavitṛtvaṃ
GSP28dhebta_u:6315: tadabhāvo cābhāva evābhavitṛtvaṃ evam eva hetoḥ svagata evāyaṃ dharmo 'ta
GSP28dhebta_u:6316: eva yatrānvayas tatra vyatireka iti svabhāvahetusādhyam etad avatiṣṭhate |
GSP28dhebta_u:6318: nanu ca yady anayoḥ parasparāntarbhāvo na bhavet tarhi katham ekaṃ vākyam ubhayaṃ gamayet
GSP28dhebta_u:6320: bhinnalakṣaṇam eva [226.15] vyāvṛttito bhinnasvabhāvam eva santaṃ tataś ca bhinnatvāt anayor liṅgarūpatvāc ca pṛthagavayavāntaratvaṃ yuktam
GSP28dhebta_u:6322: yady ekaḥ svabhā...............yaduktapūrvaṃ tadavastham evety āha paraspara [226.16] ityādi
GSP28dhebta_u:6325: bhāvābhāvayor aparasparākṣepād iti siddhāntavādinābhihitaṃ kim anena tadapratividhāyakena na tv i[226.17]tyādinoktena ity āśaṅkya pūrvapakṣavādimata eva ...............darśayitum āha -- ayam abhiprāya [226.17] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:6326: tadabhāvo 'bhāvo gamyate anyathā tadarthaivāsyā vākyasya na syād ityā^3.........ta iti vartate |
GSP28dhebta_u:6331: tadbhāve bhāvarūpa eve[226.23]ti vicārata etad avatiṣṭhate |
GSP28dhebta_u:6332: yata ity abhiprāyeṇoktaṃ ekavākyeneti pīno devadatta ityādinā tata evaikavākyā[225]ntarabhāvād
GSP28dhebta_u:6337: tadantarbhāvamātreṇa [227.18] ekavākyārthāntarbhāvamātreṇa niyamavadvākyavyapakṣeyā kadācid dṛṣṭena tadantarbhāvāt |
GSP28dhebta_u:6338: ekarūpāntarar bhāvāt tu dvitīyagati[227.27]r neti vartate |
GSP28dhebta_u:6340: yathā tayā ka^5......ta tathā bhinnarūpāv eveti |
GSP28dhebta_u:6346: syād etat ye tāvat jñātatvaśabdena jñānam evābhidadhate te santūktayā nītyā nirākṛtāḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:6348: jñātatvaṃ^6 .........nirākriyante ity āśaṅkāyām āha tad ayam atra [228.20]
GSP28dhebta_u:6351: prakaraṇam upasaṃharann āha -- tad evam i[228.28]ti |
GSP28dhebta_u:6352: trīṇi pakṣadharmānvayavyatirekātmakāni lakṣaṇāni yasya sa tathokta iti sarvam avadātam |
GSP28dhebta_u:6353: tattvaprakāśikāṃ ṭīkāṃ paṭīyasīm īdṛśīṃ parārtham uddiśya praṇayatā niyataṃ mayāpi kim api puṇyaṃ upārjitaṃ tad apy ahaṃ parārtham upanayām iti manvāno 'nekajanmābhyastakṛpāyogāt sātmībhūtaparārthakaraṇo 'yaṃ
GSP28dhebta_u:6356: samudāyā[rthaḥ ^8munīśarādddhā]ntanayapradīpam [229.2] vivṛ[226]tya yat puṇyam upārjitaṃ tat jagato viśuddhiṃ vidheyāt [229.3] iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:6357: kāyavāṅmanomaunayogān munayaḥ pratyekabuddhādayas teṣāṃ īśaḥ śāstā buddho bhagavān savāsanakleśaparihāṇiyogenāta(?)bhyas tasya prakarṣaprāptayā tāyitvāt tasya nayo nītiḥ pravacanaṃ tasya rāddhāntaḥ siddhāntas tasya
GSP28dhebta_u:6362: tasya mārgaḥ [229.1] panthāḥ siddhānta ity arthaḥ |
GSP28dhebta_u:6363: kṣataḥ khaṇḍitaḥ tadvairūpyāpādanād aśeṣaḥ kutarkamārgo yena sa tathā |
GSP28dhebta_u:6367: vimalacittasaṃtati parāṃ [229.4] prakṛṣṭāṃ sarvāvaraṇaprahāṇād iti sarvam anavadyam iti |
GSP28dhebta_u:6371: nāstīha sūktaṃ mama yat punaḥ syāt gurorjitāreḥsa khalu prasādaḥ ||
GSP28dhebta_u:6372: kutūhalenaiva yadṛcchayā vā mātsaryato doṣajighṛkṣa^3[yā vā]
GSP28dhebta_u:6376: parārtham uddiśya yathārthamarcaṭaṃvivṛṇya puṇyaṃ yadupārjitaṃ mayā |
GSP28dhebta_u:6377: nihantu tenāvaraṇāni vidviṣo janontarāyeṇa vinaiva sarvathā ||
